Arme à feu.

es-ES.name: Magnum .44
es-ES.card_text:
Arma: arma de fuego.
Ataque: 2 de daño a distancia, con una maniobra opcional por combate.

card_text:
Weapon: gun.
Strike: 2R damage, with 1 optional maneuver each combat.
name: .44 Magnum

card_text:
+1 stealth action.
Put this card in play. During your unlock phase, you may move 1 pool from your prey's pool to this card or move the pool on this card to your pool. Your prey can burn the Edge to move the counters on this card to his or her pool and burn this card.
name: 419 Operation

card_text:
Unique.
The bearer gets +1 hunt.
name: Aaron's Feeding Razor

card_text:
+1 stealth action.
Hunt at +4 hunt. After successful resolution, a referendum is called to call a blood hunt on this vampire (independent of the action, just as if they had committed diablerie).
name: Abactor

card_text:
Only usable by a vampire being burned. Usable by a vampire in torpor.
[dem] Remove this vampire from the game instead (diablerie, if any, is still successful), and put this card into play. You may not play this card if you already have an Abandoning the Flesh in play. Lock during a bleed action to give an acting vampire with Dementation [dem] +1 bleed.
name: Abandoning the Flesh

card_text:
+1 stealth action. Requires a Sabbat vampire.
Put this card on this acting Sabbat vampire and unlock him or her. This Sabbat vampire gets +1 intercept against Ⓓ actions directed at his or her controller. A vampire may have only one Abbot.
name: Abbot

card_text: [COMBAT] Lock this imbued before range is determined to end a combat between a monster and a mortal. If the mortal is a minion other than this imbued, you may move a conviction [1 CONVICTION] to this imbued from your hand or ash heap.
name: Abjure

card_text:
+1 stealth action.
[for] Put this card on the acting vampire and put 3 ablative counters on this card. While in combat, this vampire may remove any number of ablative counters from this card to prevent that amount of non-aggravated damage. Burn this card when it has no more ablative counters.
[FOR] As above, but this vampire may also prevent aggravated damage in combat in this way.
name: Ablative Skin

card_text:
Master: Discipline. Trifle.
Put this card on a Laibon or on a vampire with Protean [pro]. This vampire gains one level of Abombwe [abo]. Capacity increases by 1: the vampire is one generation older. Cannot be placed on a vampire with superior Abombwe [ABO].
name: Abombwe

card_text:
+1 stealth action. Requires a ready non-sterile vampire.
Burn a ready unlocked werewolf ally you control to put this card in play. It becomes a unique Independent Abomination with 4 capacity, superior Protean [PRO] and +1 strength. Move up to 4 blood from the acting vampire to this vampire. This vampire gets an additional strike (limited) each round and an optional maneuver each combat. He may enter combat with a ready minion as a Ⓓ action.
name: Abomination

card_text:
Gehenna. Do not replace until a Methuselah is ousted.
Requires at least one other Gehenna card in play. During each Methuselah's unlock phase, he or she may put the top card of his or her library in play. That card represents a nameless, textless ghoul ally with 2 life, 2 strength and 1 bleed. If the ally is burned, it is removed from the game. When a Methuselah is ousted, burn this card. Remove all such allies from the game when this card leaves play.
name: Absimiliard's Army

card_text:
Master: out-of-turn.
Requires a ready justicar or Inner Circle member. This card is playable during your minion phase. Only usable when a vampire is about to be burned by a blood hunt. Cancel that blood hunt.
name: Absolution of the Diabolist

card_text:
[dom] Strike: dodge.
[myt] Strike: ranged. Steal 1 blood.
[MYT] Strike: ranged. Steal 1 blood and steal 1 master: Discipline card from the opposing vampire (put it on this striking vampire).
name: Absorb the Mind

card_text:
Demon with 4 life. 3 strength, 0 bleed.
Abyssal Hunter can inflict 1 damage on any minion as a Ⓓ action. During your unlock phase, Abyssal Hunter inflicts 1 damage on a ready vampire you control. Burn Abyssal Hunter if any ranged aggravated damage is inflicted on it (even if prevented).
name: Abyssal Hunter

fr-FR.name: École, terrain de chasse
fr-FR.card_text:
Lieu unique. Terrain de chasse.
Durant votre phase de redressement, un vampire disponible que vous contrôlez peut gagner 1 point de sang. Un vampire ne peut gagner de points de sang que d'un seul terrain de chasse à chaque tour.

es-ES.name: Zona de caza: Academia
es-ES.card_text:
Lugar único. Zona de caza.
Durante tu fase de enderezamiento, un vampiro preparado que controles puede ganar 1 de sangre. Un vampiro puede ganar sangre de sólo una zona de caza por turno.

card_text:
Unique location. Hunting ground.
During your unlock phase, a ready vampire you control can gain 1 blood. A vampire can gain blood from only one hunting ground each turn.
name: Academic Hunting Ground

card_text: Minions without Necromancy [nec] or Obtenebration [obt] get -1 intercept.
name: Acheron Vortex

card_text:
Unique.
Put this card on a vampire controlled by another Methuselah and choose a circle. While this vampire is in torpor, Blood Brothers of the chosen circle get +1 bleed against this vampire's controller. Any minion can burn this card as a Ⓓ action.
name: Achilles' Heel

fr-FR.name: Beauté douloureuse
fr-FR.card_text: Mettez cette carte sur un Toréador. Si ce Toréador est bloqué, le contrôleur du serviteur qui bloque brûle 1 point de réserve avant la résolution du blocage.
fr-FR.flavor_text:
Viens-tu du ciel profond ou sors-tu de l'abîme,
Ô Beauté ! ton regard, infernal et divin,
Verse confusément le bienfait et le crime
Charles Baudelaire, "Hymne à la beauté"

es-ES.name: Belleza dolorosa
es-ES.card_text: Ponle esta carta a un Toreador. Si este Toreador es bloqueado, el controlador del siervo bloqueador quema 1 de reserva sanguínea antes de la resolución del bloqueo.
es-ES.flavor_text:
¿Vienes del cielo profundo o surges del abismo,
Oh, Belleza? Tu mirada infernal y divina,
Vuelca confusamente el beneficio y el crimen...
Charles Baudelaire, "Himno a la belleza"

card_text: Put this card on any Toreador. If this Toreador is blocked, the blocking minion's controller burns 1 pool before block resolution.
flavor_text:
From heaven or hell, O Beauty, came you hence?
Out from your gaze, infernal and divine,
Pours blended evil and beneficence...
Charles Baudelaire, "Hymn to Beauty"
name: Aching Beauty

card_text: Put this card in play with 1 blood for each Giovanni you control. During your master phase, you can move 1 blood from this card to a Giovanni you control. Burn this card if it has no blood. Any non-Ventrue minion can burn this card as a Ⓓ action.
name: Acquired Ventrue Assets

card_text:
[cel] Additional strike (limited).
[CEL] Strike: dodge, with an additional strike (limited).
name: Acrobatics

card_text:
[pro] This vampire treats all aggravated damage from the opposing minion's strike as normal damage.
[PRO] Prevent all aggravated damage from the opposing minion's strike.
flavor_text:
A permanent state of transition is man's most noble condition.
Juan Ramon Jiminez
name: Adaptability

card_text:
Requires an anarch.
[ani] Only usable during a bleed action. +1 bleed (limited).
[chi] Only usable during the polling step of a political action. This anarch gets +3 votes.
[pot] If this anarch is blocked, they get +1 strength in the resulting combat.
name: Adhocracy

card_text:
Unique master.
Put this card in play. Lock to discard one card if you control a ready Sabbat vampire. Lock to draw two cards if you control a ready Black Hand vampire. During your discard phase, control of The Admonitions passes counter-clockwise until it is controlled by a Methuselah who controls a ready Sabbat vampire (or is burned if there are none).
name: The Admonitions

card_text:
Only usable by a vampire with capacity 4 or more.
The bearer can lock this card during the polling step of any referendum before votes and ballots are cast to get +1 vote. A vampire can have only one Agate Talisman.
name: Agate Talisman

card_text:
Master: Discipline. Trifle. Unique.
Put this card on a vampire you control and choose a Discipline. This vampire gains 1 level of that Discipline. Burn this card during your discard phase.
name: Agent of Power

card_text:
Master.
Put this card in play and choose a Methuselah. While this card is in play, the chosen Methuselah's hand size is reduced by one. Any vampire may burn this card as a Ⓓ action.
name: Aggressive Tactics

card_text:
Only usable at long range. Not usable during the first round of combat.
[obt] Strike: 1R aggravated damage.
[OBT] As above, and if the opposing vampire would go to torpor during the resolution of this strike, instead they are burned.
name: Ahriman's Demesne

card_text:
+1 stealth action. Unique.
Put this card in play, and this Ahrimane may burn 1 blood to unlock at the end of the action. You may burn this card to cause a Ⓓ action directed at an ally or location you control to fail. You may burn this card during a Ⓓ action against you to give an Ahrimane you control +1 intercept.
name: Ahrimane Protectorate

fr-FR.name: Aide des chauves-souris
fr-FR.card_text:
[ani] Frapper à toute portée : 1 point de dégâts, avec 1 manœuvre optionnelle.
[ANI] Comme ci-dessus, avec 1 poursuite optionnelle.
fr-FR.flavor_text:
Pendues tête en bas comme des rangées de guenilles repoussantes
Et souriant de toutes leurs dents dans leur sommeil. Des chauves-souris !
D.H. Lawrence, "La Chauve-souris"

es-ES.name: Ayuda de murciélagos

[ani] Ataque: 1 de daño a distancia, con 1 maniobra opcional.
[ANI] Como antes, con 1 acoso opcional.

Colgando boca abajo como hileras de trapos viejos y repugnantes
Y sonriendo mientras duermen. ¡Murciélagos!
D.H. Lawrence, "Murciélago"

card_text:
[ani] Strike: 1R damage, with 1 optional maneuver.
[ANI] As above, with 1 optional press.
flavor_text:
Hanging upside down like rows of disgusting old rags
And grinning in their sleep. Bats!
D.H. Lawrence, "Bat"

card_text:
[dom] Ⓓ Bleed with +1 bleed.
[obe] Ⓓ Bleed with +1 bleed. Vampires with Dementation [dem], mortals, and mages get -1 intercept against this action.

Seulement utilisable durant une action de morsure.
[pre] +1 en morsure, avec +1 en morsure supplémentaire si ce vampire est Toréador (limité).
[PRE] +2 en morsure, avec +1 en morsure supplémentaire si ce vampire est Toréador (limité).

card_text:

[pre] +1 bleed, with an additional +1 bleed if this vampire is Toreador (limited).

card_text:
Weapon. Gun.
2R damage each strike, with an optional maneuver each combat. When bearer strikes with this gun, he or she gets an optional additional strike (limited) this round, only usable to strike with this gun.

card_text:

Akhenaten can burn himself to burn a Follower of Set controlled by your prey as a Ⓓ action. If he is burned, shuffle him into his owner's library.

card_text:
Only usable during a referendum. Usable by a locked vampire. Title.
Put this card on this Laibon Akunanse to represent the unique Laibon title of Akunanse Kholo (worth 2 votes). Not usable if there are any older ready untitled Laibon Akunanse. card_text:
Master: unique location.

card_text:
[cel] +1 stealth.

fr-FR.card_text:
Lieu unique.
Après qu'un Assamite que vous contrôlez mord avec succès un Mathusalem, mettez les points de réserve perdus par ce Mathusalem sur cette carte. Brûlez X compteurs de cette carte durant l'étape de vote d'une action politique pour donner +X voix à un vampire que vous contrôlez.

es-ES.name: Alamut

Lugar único.
Después de que un Assamita que controles sangre con éxito a un Matusalén, pon en esta carta la reserva sanguínea perdida por ese Matusalén. Quema X de sangre de esta carta durante la fase de votación de una acción política para darle +X votos a un vampiro que controles.

card_text:
Unique location.
After an Assamite you control successfully bleeds a Methuselah, put the pool lost by that Methuselah on this card. Burn X counters from this card during the polling step of a political action to give a vampire you control +X votes.

card_text:
Requires a justicar or Inner Circle member.
Choose a ready Camarilla vampire. If this referendum is successful, search your library for an equipment card and place this card and the equipment on the chosen vampire. Pay half the cost (round down) of the equipment. This vampire may enter combat with any vampire controlled by another Methuselah as a +1 stealth Ⓓ action. This vampire cannot commit diablerie. A vampire may have only one Alastor.

card_text:
Unique dhampir with 2 life. 1 strength, 0 bleed.
Requires at least two Gehenna cards in play. Alia can play cards that require basic Auspex [aus] or Obeah [obe] as a vampire. She may move a vampire in your torpor region to your ready region as a +1 stealth action. Ⓓ actions directed at her cost an additional pool.

card_text:
Not usable in combat with an ally or an older vampire.
[ani][for] Strike: combat ends.
[ANI][FOR] Only usable before range is determined. Combat ends.

card_text:
Unique.
Put this card in play with 1 counter for each Tremere and Gargoyle you control. During an action, you can burn 1 counter from this card to give a slave Gargoyle you control +1 bleed or +1 strength. Add 1 counter on this card after a Tremere or Gargoyle enters play during your influence phase. Burn this card if it has no counters.

card_text:
Unique mummy with 3 life. 2 strength, 0 bleed.
Amam can enter combat with a minion as a Ⓓ action. Amam can burn a vampire in torpor to gain 1 life as a Ⓓ action. If a minion opposing Amam in combat is burned, Amam can gain 1 life. If Amam is burned, shuffle him into his owner's library.

card_text: Only usable by a vampire who can commit diablerie. Only usable when the opposing vampire should go to torpor. Diablerize the opposing vampire instead. Not usable by a vampire being burned or going to torpor.
flavor_text:
Thou shalt not slay thy sire and drink his heart's blood.
The Book of Nod

card_text:
Unique wraith with 2 life. 1 strength, 0 bleed.
Ambrosius can move a retainer from your ash heap to a ready vampire you control and put 3 pathos counters on that retainer as an action. During your unlock phase, burn 1 pathos counter from that retainer. Remove the retainer from the game if it has no pathos counters. Ambrosius is immune to non-aggravated damage.

card_text:
Vehicle.
After a combat between this acting minion and a blocking minion, you may lock the Ambulance to continue the action as if unblocked. If the action is blocked again, burn this card. This minion may lock the Ambulance to attempt to burn an incapacitated imbued as a +1 stealth Ⓓ action. A minion may have only one vehicle.

fr-FR.name: Embuscade

fr-FR.flavor_text:
Nous frapperons depuis les ombres quand le moment sera venu, et ils tomberont tous devant nous.
Cameron, Lasombra

es-ES.flavor_text:
Atacaremos desde las sombras cuando llegue el momento, y todo caerá ante nosotros.
Cameron, Lasombra

card_text: Ⓓ Enter combat with a locked minion. This acting minion gets 1 optional maneuver during that combat.
flavor_text:
We will strike from the shadows when the time is right, and all will fall before us.
Cameron, Lasombra
name: Ambush

card_text:
[chi] Maneuver, only usable to go to long range.
[CHI] Strike: dodge, with an optional press, only usable to end combat.
flavor_text:
Be wary then; best safety lies in fear.
Shakespeare, "Hamlet", act I, scene 3

card_text:
Unique.
This vampire can burn 1 blood to play a card requiring basic Temporis [tem] from your hand. This equipment can be used only once each turn.
name: Amulet of Temporal Perception

card_text:
Master: unique location. Hunting ground.
During your unlock phase, you may move 1 blood from the blood bank to a ready vampire you control. A vampire can gain blood from only one hunting ground card each turn.
flavor_text:
Definitely an E ticket!
Julie, Brujah antitribu

card_text:
Master.
Put this card on a vampire with capacity above 6. This vampire cannot have or use any ranged weapons except the Ivory Bow. (If he or she currently has any, they are burned.)
name: Anachronism

card_text:
Werewolf with 4 life. 2 strength, 1 bleed.
Ananasi gets an optional maneuver each combat. Once each combat, she can burn a life during the press step to get a press and set the range in the next round of that combat, if any. She can gain a life as a +1 stealth action. Once each turn, she may play a card that requires basic Animalism [ani] as a vampire.
name: Ananasi Vampirephile

card_text:
Unique master. Requires a ready anarch.
Put this card into play. You may lock this card to give an anarch you control +1 intercept for the current action. You may lock this card when an anarch successfully hunts to give that anarch an extra blood from the blood bank.
name: The Anarch Free Press

card_text:
Equipment.
The anarch with this equipment gets +1 stealth on actions that require an anarch. Titled non-Anarch vampires get +1 strength in combat with this minion. A minion may have only one Anarch Manifesto.
name: Anarch Manifesto, An

card_text:
Master: unique location.
Lock to give an anarch +1 stealth for the current action.
flavor_text:
The Freedom Train will get you back east, at least as far as Staten Island. If you want to cross the bridge when you get there, you'll probably be on your own.
Almiro Suarez, Tremere anarch

card_text:
Master.
Put this card in play. A Methuselah who does not control a ready anarch burns 1 pool during his or her unlock phase. Any vampire can call a referendum to burn this card as a +1 stealth political action.
flavor_text:
The Ventrue are working with us on this? Those anarchs must be more annoying than I thought.
Brujah, Rome 2002 Winter Storyline

card_text:
Requires an anarch.
Successful referendum means each ready anarch gains 1 blood from the blood bank, and each Methuselah who controls at least one anarch gains 1 pool from the blood bank.

card_text:
+1 stealth action. Requires a ready, non-anarch, titled vampire.
This vampire becomes Anarch. If he or she had a city title, put this card on him or her as a title card to represent the title of baron of the same city. Minions without titles cannot block this action.

fr-FR.name: Anarch fauteur de trouble
fr-FR.card_text:
Unique.
Mettez cette carte en jeu. Durant votre phase de redressement, vous pouvez donner le contrôle de l'Anarch fauteur de trouble à votre proie et soit incliner jusqu'à deux vampires sous son contrôle, soit brûler un équipement sur l'un de ses serviteurs.
fr-FR.flavor_text:
Je suis l'accusateur et le vengeur du sang...
William Blake, "Le Fantôme d'Abel"

es-ES.name: Alborotador anarquista

Única.
Pon esta carta en juego. Durante tu fase de enderezamiento, puedes darle el control del /Alborotador anarquista/ a tu presa y girar hasta dos vampiros que controle o bien quemar un equipo de uno de sus siervos.
es-ES.flavor_text:
Soy el acusador y vengador de la sangre...
William Blake, "El fantasma de Abel"

card_text:
Unique.
Put this card in play. During your unlock phase, you can give control of the Anarch Troublemaker to your prey and either lock up to two vampires they control or burn an equipment on one of their minions.
flavor_text:
I am the accuser and avenger of blood...
William Blake, "The Ghost of Abel"

fr-FR.flavor_text:
Nous sommes tous frères d'oppression, et aujourd'hui les frères d'oppression sont associés aux autres tout autour du monde.

Todos somos hermanos de la opresión, y hoy, los hermanos de la opresión se identifican entre sí en todo el mundo.

We are all brothers of oppression, and today, brothers of oppression are identified with each other all over the world.
Malcolm X

card_text:

Choose a ready vampire. If the referendum is successful, put this card on that vampire. If the vampire with this card is reduced to zero blood in combat, he or she is burned, and the Methuselah controlling the opposing minion gains pool equal to the burned vampire's capacity.

card_text:
Unique master.
Put this card on a Laibon with capacity above 4. This Laibon has +1 bleed and gets an additional vote in any referendum he or she calls.

[aus] [REACTION] Reduce a bleed against you by 1.

flavor_text:
Take care, let us not die from blessings like the giants did.

card_text:
Unique.
The bearer gets +1 intercept during actions requiring Dominate [dom] or Presence [pre].

Pas plus d'un seul exemplaire ne peut être joué ou appelé par partie.

card_text:

card_text:
Only usable at close range.
[aus] Strike: dodge.

flavor_text:
Just relax; this won't hurt, much.

Unlock an imbued, or equip a ready imbued you control with an equipment from your hand (requirements must be met; pay cost as normal). Not usable during combat.
flavor_text:
They also serve who only stand and wait.
John Milton, "On His Blindness"

+1 stealth action.
[aus] Put this card on this acting vampire and choose another minion you control. Burn this card if this minion unlocks. During your unlock phase, you may choose not to unlock this minion as normal. The chosen minion gets +2 intercept.
[AUS] As above, and the chosen minion also gets +1 bleed.

card_text:
Only usable during a referendum.
[ani][obf] This vampire gains 1 vote.

Discipline.
Mettez cette carte sur un vampire. Ce vampire reçoit +1 niveau d'Animalisme [ani] et +1 capacité. Ne peut être mis sur un vampire avec le niveau supérieur d'Animalisme [ANI].

es-ES.name: Animalismo
es-ES.card_text:
Disciplina.
Ponle esta carta a un vampiro. Este vampiro obtiene +1 nivel de Animalismo [ani] y +1 de capacidad. No se le puede poner a un vampiro con Animalismo superior [ANI].

es-ES.flavor_text:
Dormir... tal vez soñar—¡Ay! allí hay algo que detiene al mejor.
¡Qué sueños vendrán en ese sueño de la muerte!
William Shakespeare, "Hamlet", acto III, escena 1

card_text:

card_text:
Weapon, Gun.
3R damage each strike, only usable once each round.

card_text:
[dom] Only usable when an ally attempts to block. The attempt fails and lock that ally. That ally cannot attempt to block this action again.
[DOM] As above, and put this card on the ally. This ally does not unlock as normal. During this ally's next unlock phase, burn this card.

card_text:
Only usable during a bleed action.
[dom] +1 bleed (limited).
[DOM] +1 bleed that does not count against the limit.

card_text:
Requires a Camarilla vampire.
Choose a ready prince. Successful referendum means the prince loses his or her title.

card_text:
Unique.
Put this card in play. Lock during your minion phase to unlock a ready Daughter of Cacophony. Any titled vampire can call a referendum to burn this card as a +1 stealth political action.

card_text:
[dom] Lock X-1 allies or younger vampires.

card_text:
Master: location.
You may lock this card during your master phase to transfer equipment and/or move blood between any two ready Sabbat vampires you control.

card_text:
Master: location.
Each Sabbat vampire you control gets +1 intercept when attempting to block Ⓓ actions directed against Sabbat vampires you control. A Methuselah may have only one Communal Haven: Temple in play.
flavor_text:
No sooner is a temple built to God, but the Devil builds a chapel hard by.

card_text:
+1 stealth action. Requires an Independent or Anarch vampire.
Ⓓ Burn a vampire who has diablerized a vampire of the same clan as this acting vampire since your last turn.
flavor_text:
We're killed, so we kill in return. Endless repetition.

card_text:
+1 stealth action.
[nec] Move an ally or retainer that has been burned from play since your last turn from your ash heap to your hand.
[NEC] As above, but move it to your ready region (ignore requirements and cost) with life equal to its starting life. If it is a retainer, move it to the acting minion.

card_text:
[pot] Strike: hand strike at +2 damage.
[thn] Strike: 2 aggravated damage.
[THN] Strike: 3 aggravated damage.
flavor_text:

card_text:
[obf] Ⓓ Burn an equipment card.
[OBF] Ⓓ Burn a location.
flavor_text:
Imagination is the one weapon in the war against reality.

card_text:
Only usable before range is determined.
This minion equips with a non-unique weapon card from your hand (requirements and cost apply as normal). The weapon cannot cost 3 or more pool or inflict (with a regular strike) aggravated damage or 4 or more damage.

card_text:
+1 stealth action.
Put this card on this acting Daughter of Cacophony. During your next unlock phase, burn this card to restore this vampire to full capacity with blood from the blood bank.
flavor_text:
We scored backstage passes and all that. I don't remember much after the show, but look! She signed my T-shirt!

card_text:
Unique equipment.
When the vampire with this card announces an action, he or she may burn this card to prevent vampires from blocking that action. If he or she does so, this vampire cannot play cards requiring Disciplines until the action is complete.

card_text:
+1 stealth action.
[ser] Ⓓ Bleed. If more than 1 pool is bled with this action, ignore the excess.
[dai] Requires an infernal vampire. Put this card on this vampire. This vampire treats aggravated damage as normal damage and gets +1 strength and -1 stealth.
[DAI] As [dai] above, and this vampire gets flight [FLIGHT]. During your influence phase, this vampire can burn 1 blood to unlock.

_name: Condemn the Sins of the Father
card_text:
+1 stealth action.
[qui] Ⓓ Choose a clan. Lock all younger vampires of the chosen clan.
[QUI] As above, and each of those vampires burns 1 blood.
name: Condemn the Sins of the Father

card_text:
+1 stealth action. Condemnation.
[ser] Ⓓ Lock a younger vampire.
[dai] Requires an infernal vampire. Ⓓ Put this card on a ready minion. Bleed actions cost the attached minion 1 additional blood (allies cannot pay blood costs). Burn all other condemnation cards on this minion.
[DAI] As [dai] above, and the attached minion's controller burns the top card of their library during their unlock phase.
flavor_text:
But the Brujah are not as disciplined. Betrayal swiftly shifts their focus.

name: Condemnation: Betrayed

card_text:
+1 stealth action. Condemnation.
[obf] Ⓓ Lock a younger vampire.
[dai] Requires an Infernal vampire. Ⓓ Put this card on a ready minion. The minion with this card has -1 stealth. Burn all other Condemnations on this minion.
[DAI] As [dai] above, and the minion's controller burns 1 pool each time the minion is successfully blocked.
name: Condemnation: Doomed

card_text:
+1 stealth action. Condemnation.
[pre] Ⓓ Lock a younger vampire.
[dai] Requires an Infernal vampire. Ⓓ Put this card on a ready minion. The minion with this card has -1 strength. Burn all other Condemnations on this minion.
[DAI] As [dai] above, and the minion cannot use presses in combat.
flavor_text:
The devil's strength is the weakness of humanity. And you Camarilla embrace that weakness.
Giotto Verducci, Baali

card_text:
+1 stealth action. Condemnation.
[chi] Ⓓ Lock a younger vampire.
[dai] Requires an infernal vampire. Ⓓ Put this card on a ready vampire. The vampire with this card has -3 votes. Burn all other Condemnations on this minion.
[DAI] As above, and this vampire burns 1 blood each time a referendum passes.
flavor_text:
A thought unspoken is no less a thought.

[dom] +2 bleed (limited).

To and fro he hurried, clapped his hands, ran from one rope to the other, spurring on his six singers with mouth and hands, like the conductor of an orchestra urging highly trained musicians.

[pot] Strike: 2R damage.

[dem] +1 en morsure (limité).

[dem] +1 bleed (limited).

card_text:
[obf] Reduce a younger vampire's or an ally's bleed against you by 1.

card_text:
Master: archetype.
Put this card on a vampire you control. If your prey loses pool when it is neither your turn nor your prey's turn, you may lock this card to move 1 blood from the blood bank to this vampire. A vampire can have only one archetype.
flavor_text:
It's all about being charming. We do a little lobbying, you know. It's in our mutual interest, a win-win situation, this sort of crap.

card_text:
Only usable before before range is determined on the first round.
[ani] This vampire gets one press each round, only usable to continue combat. He or she is obliged to use this press and cannot use equipment. This continues until 3 rounds pass with no cards played.
[ANI] As above, but the presses are optional.

card_text:
Gehenna. Do not replace until your next discard phase.

flavor_text:
More bombs? More fire? More accidents? What of the Masquerade?

Choisissez un clan. Si le référendum passe, chaque Mathusalem gagne 1 point de réserve pour chaque vampire du clan choisi sous son contrôle.
fr-FR.flavor_text:
Même en jouant avec ton frère, aie un témoin.

Elige un clan. Si el referéndum prospera, cada Matusalén gana 1 de reserva sanguínea por cada vampiro del clan elegido que controle.
es-ES.flavor_text:
Hasta cuando juegues con tu hermano, ten un testigo.
Hesíodo, "Los trabajos y los días"

card_text:
Boon.
Choose a clan. Successful referendum means each Methuselah gains 1 pool for each vampire of the chosen clan they control.
flavor_text:
When you deal with your brother, be pleasant, but get a witness.
Hesiod, "Works and Days"

flavor_text:
There are those not of our blood who would seek to harm us. Such cretins must be punished!
Helena Casimir, Ventrue

card_text:
Only usable when an action is blocked.
[vis] The opposing minion takes 1 damage during strike resolution each round of the resulting combat when the range is close.
[VIS] Cancel the resulting combat and put this card into play. This card represents an ally with 2 life and 2 strength. This ally enters combat with the blocking minion. This ally gets an optional press during the combat. Burn this card after combat or if the combat is canceled.

card_text:
Requires a ready archbishop, priscus, cardinal or regent. +1 stealth action.
Put this card on a location you control. You may burn this card to cause an action directed at the location to fail.
flavor_text:
A night of memories and of sighs
I consecrate to thee.
Walter Savage Landor, "Rose Aylmer"

card_text: Allocate X points among two or more Methuselahs, where X is the number of Methuselahs in the game. Successful referendum means each Methuselah burns 1 pool for each point assigned.

card_text:
+1 stealth action.
[ser] Ⓓ Steal 1 blood or life (becoming blood) from a ready minion.
[SER] Ⓓ Put this card on a ready minion. During the attached minion's unlock phase, they burn 1 blood or life. If they cannot, they go to torpor. Burn this card after this acting minion enters combat or leaves the ready region. A minion can have only one Consignment to Duat.

card_text:
+1 stealth action. Requires an anarch. Unique.
Put this card in play with 1 counter. During your unlock phase, put a counter on this card. During each other Methuselah's unlock phase, he or she must burn X pool and/or cards at random from his or her hand, where X is the number of counters on this card. Any vampire may burn this card as a Ⓓ action that costs 1 pool.

card_text:
[ACTION] +1 stealth action. Ⓓ Enter combat with a wraith ally or burn a wraith retainer.
[REACTION] Only usable when a minion or retainer is being burned by any means except diablerie. Usable during combat. Usable by a locked Nagaraja. Remove that minion or retainer from the game instead. This Nagaraja gains 1 blood if the minion was a vampire or gains X+1 blood, where X is the blood or pool cost of that ally or retainer.
name: Consume the Dead

card_text:
+1 stealth action. Requires an Infernal vampire. Unique.
[dai] Put this card on the acting vampire. During each other Methuselah's unlock phase, he or she burns 1 pool if this vampire is ready.
[DAI] As [dai] above, and once per combat, this vampire can put a corruption counter on the opposing minion as a strike. If the number of your corruption counters on the minion equals or exceeds the capacity of that vampire or the cost of that ally, you may burn all of your corruption counters on that minion to gain control of him or her after strike resolution (ending combat).
name: Contagion

card_text:
Master: out-of-turn.
Only usable when a minion you control is bleeding. You may play this card during your turn. Cancel a minion card that would change the target of the bleed as it is played (no cost is paid). If more than 1 pool is bled in this action, ignore the excess.
name: Contingency Planning

card_text:
Contract.
Choose an Assamite and put this card on a ready minion. The chosen Assamite can enter combat with the attached minion as a +1 stealth Ⓓ action.
name: Contract

card_text:
Master.
Move 1 blood from each ready Pander you control to a Pander in your uncontrolled region.
flavor_text:
i'm sifting through the ashes
of what i have become
Nine Inch Nails, "Now I'm Nothing"
name: Convergence

card_text:
Equipment.
Put 4 blood counters on this card. During your unlock phase, if the vampire with this equipment is ready, you may move 1 blood from this card to this vampire. Burn this card when it has no counters.
flavor_text:
Get yourself a cooler, lay yourself low
Coincidental murder, with nothing to show
Aerosmith, "Same Old Song and Dance"
name: Cooler

card_text:
Requires a ready unlocked Blood Brother of the same circle as another one you control in combat.
[san] Only usable at the end of a round if the minion opposing the Blood Brother you control is still ready and combat is about to end. After this round, this Blood Brother locks and enters combat with the opposing minion. The first round of combat, the opposing minion cannot play any strike cards.
[SAN] As [san] above, and this Blood Brother gets an optional maneuver on the first round of combat.
name: Coordinate Attacks

card_text:
Master.
Search your crypt to find a Samedi. Show it to all players and place it in your uncontrolled region with 1 blood from the bank.
flavor_text:
Joseph Eldred -- died of a self-inflicted wound in his neck. Weapon not found.
Seneca County, NY, Coroner's Inquest
name: Coroner's Contact

card_text:
Master: trifle.
Put this card on any Black Hand vampire. This vampire may lock this card to prevent 1 point of damage in combat or to gain a blood. This card doesn't unlock as normal. This vampire may burn a blood to unlock this card during his or her unlock phase.
name: Corporal Reservoir

card_text:
Master: unique location. Hunting ground.
During your unlock phase, you may move 1 blood from the bank to a ready vampire you control. A vampire can gain blood from only one hunting ground card each turn.
flavor_text:
A room full of suits slaughtered by a pack of bloodsucking thieves? Sounds like poetic justice to me.
Mitchell, The Headhunter, Pander

card_text:
Ghoul with 1 life.
[vic] If the minion with this retainer blocks a Ⓓ action, he or she gets an optional maneuver on the first round of the resulting combat.
[VIC] As above, and this minion gets +1 intercept against Ⓓ actions.
name: Corpse Balloon

card_text:
Ghoul with 1 life.
Vampire with this retainer may burn X blood to get +X intercept for the current action.
flavor_text:
You who all things spurn
And wound, when death shall come,
Even the wolves will scorn
Your cadaver, starved and numb.
Paul Verlaine, "Grotesques"
name: Corpse Minion

card_text:
Ghoul with 1 life. 0 strength, 0 bleed.
[vic] When the Construction enters play, you may remove from the game any number of ally, retainer, or vampire cards from your ash heap or hand. The Construction gains one life for each card removed in that way. The Construction gets +1 strength for each life counter it has. During your unlock phase, the Construction burns 1 life.
[VIC] As above, and the Construction has an additional life.
name: Corrupt Construction

card_text:
+1 stealth action.
Ⓓ Put 1 corruption counter on a minion controlled by your prey. If the number of your corruption counters on the minion equals or exceeds their capacity or cost, you can burn those counters to steal the target minion.
name: Corruption

card_text:
Requires a prince, justicar, or Inner Circle member.
If this referendum is successful, each Follower of Set burns 2 blood. Each Follower of Set with zero blood then goes into torpor.
name: Corruption's Purge

card_text: Choose another ready unlocked vampire you control of the same sect as this reacting vampire. These two vampires attempt to block, using the sum of their intercept to see if the block succeeds. If successful, both lock and then you choose one to be the blocking vampire (and the other ceases to be blocking).
name: Coterie Tactics

card_text:
Requires a Seraph.
Only usable when a minion is attempting to block. If a Sabbat vampire is attempting to block, that block attempt fails (do not lock that vampire). That vampire cannot block this action. Otherwise, the blocking minion gets -1 intercept.
name: Council of Seraphim

card_text:
Mortal with 1 life. 0 strength, 1 bleed.
Courier gets -1 intercept when attempting to block a vampire. When a minion you control successfully bleeds, you may look at the top card of the library of the Methuselah being bled, and you may lock the Courier to discard that card.
name: Courier

fr-FR.name: La cabale
fr-FR.card_text:
Unique. Triviale.
Mettez cette carte en jeu. Vous pouvez l'incliner pour ajouter 2 points de sang à un vampire disponible que vous contrôlez. Durant votre phase de défausse, votre prédateur prend le contrôle de cette carte.

es-ES.name: La cofradía
es-ES.card_text:
Única. Nimiedad.
Pon esta carta en juego. Gírala para añadir 2 de sangre a un vampiro preparado que controles. Durante tu fase de descarte, tu depredador toma el control de /La cofradía/.

card_text:
Unique. Trifle.
Put this card in play. Lock to add 2 blood to a ready vampire you control. During your discard phase, your predator takes control of The Coven.
name: The Coven

card_text:
Requires a ready non-Camarilla vampire with a capacity above 7.
Put this card in play. Any non-Camarilla vampire may enter combat with any Camarilla vampire controlled by another Methuselah as a Ⓓ action. Any vampire may burn this card as a Ⓓ action. Camarilla vampires get -1 stealth when attempting that action.
name: Covenant of Blood

card_text:
[REACTION] Reduce a bleed against you by 1.
[REACTION] Only usable during a referendum. This Kiasyd gains 4 votes.
flavor_text:
We are false and evanescent, and aware of our deceit,
From the straw that is our vitals to the clay that is our feet.
Edwin Arlington Robinson, "The False Gods"
name: Covincraft

card_text:
Master. Do not replace until your discard phase.
Play Rock-Paper-Scissors with any other Methuselah. If you tie, you each discard a card at random. Otherwise, the loser discards his or her hand and draws a new hand.
flavor_text:
Who cares what games we choose?
Little to win, but nothing to lose.
The Strawberry Alarm Clock, "Incense and Peppermints"
name: Cracking the Wall

card_text:
[tha] Maneuver, only usable to go to long range.
[vis] Maneuver or press.
[VIS] Only usable before range is determined. Opposing minion takes 1R damage each round of combat during the press step. A vampire can play only one Crawling Chamber at superior each combat.
name: Crawling Chamber

card_text:
+1 stealth action. Requires a non-sterile vampire.
Put this card into play; it represents a 2-capacity slave Gargoyle of the same sect enslaved to the acting vampire's clan with basic Visceratika [vis] and flight [FLIGHT]. You may search your hand, library and/or ash heap for a master: Discipline to place on this Gargoyle. Move up to 3 blood from the acting vampire to this Gargoyle. This Gargoyle cannot act this turn.
name: Create Gargoyle

card_text:
+1 stealth action. Requires a ready non-sterile archbishop, priscus, cardinal or regent.
Put this card in play; it becomes a 1-capacity vampire. You may go through your library (shuffle afterward), ash heap or hand to find a Discipline card for this card. You may move a blood from the acting vampire to this vampire. This vampire is not considered unique, cannot act this turn, and is the same clan as the acting vampire.
name: Creation Rites

card_text:
Master: archetype. Trifle.
Put this card on a Sabbat vampire you control. Once per turn, when a minion opposing this vampire in combat dodges or ends combat as a strike, this vampire gains 1 blood from the blood bank. A vampire can have only one archetype.
flavor_text:
Beware
Of entrance to a quarrel; but being in,
Bear't that the opposed may beware of thee.
William Shakespeare, "Hamlet", act I, scene 3
name: Creep Show

card_text:
[thn] Strike: hand strike, and put this card on the opposing minion. You still control this card. When this striking vampire announces an action, you may burn this card to prevent this minion from blocking. A minion may have only one Creeping Infection.
[THN] As [thn] above, and this striking vampire gets +1 bleed when bleeding this minion's controller.
name: Creeping Infection

fr-FR.name: Sabotage insidieux
fr-FR.card_text:
Action à +1 en discrétion.
X est le nombre d'exemplaires de cette carte que vous contrôlez. Mettez cette carte en jeu. Durant votre phase de redressement, votre proie brûle 1 point de réserve. N'importe quel serviteur peut brûler cette carte en action (D).

es-ES.name: Sabotaje progresivo
es-ES.card_text:
Acción con +1 de sigilo.
X es el número de /Sabotajes progresivos/ que controles. Pon esta carta en juego. Durante tu fase de enderezamiento, tu presa quema 1 de reserva sanguínea. Cualquier siervo puede quemar esta carta con una acción (D).

card_text:
+1 stealth action.
X is the number of Creeping Sabotages you control. Put this card in play. During your unlock phase, your prey burns 1 pool. Any minion can burn this card as a Ⓓ action.
name: Creeping Sabotage

fr-FR.name: Casino des horreurs
fr-FR.card_text:
Lieu unique.
Vous pouvez l'incliner lorsqu'un vampire que vous contrôlez annonce une action non dirigée pour donner +1 en discrétion à ce vampire, même si de la discrétion n'est pas encore nécessaire.

es-ES.name: Casino de los Horrores
es-ES.card_text:
Lugar único.
Gírala cuando un vampiro que controlas anuncia una acción indirecta para dar a dicho vampiro +1 de sigilo, aunque el sigilo no sea necesario.

card_text:
Unique location.
Lock as a vampire you control announces an undirected action to give that vampire +1 stealth, even if stealth is not yet needed.
name: Creepshow Casino

card_text:
Master: unique location.
Lock during your unlock phase to burn a vampire in torpor with no blood.
name: Crematorium

card_text:
Requires an Anarch. Only usable after resolution of a successful action requiring an Anarch or making this vampire Anarch.
[pro] Unlock this Anarch.
[qui] Unlock another ready Anarch.
[tha] Put this card in play. During your minion phase, you can burn 1 pool to unlock a ready Anarch you control.
name: CrimethInc.

card_text:
Only usable when this vampire is being diablerized. Usable by a locked vampire. Usable by a vampire in torpor.
[ani] The diablerie is canceled and the diablerist burns 1 blood.
[ANI] Burn both the diablerist and this vampire. (The diablerie is still considered successful.)
flavor_text:
O dearly bought revenge, yet glorious!
Milton, "Samson Agonistes"

card_text:
Unique melee weapon.
Strength+1 damage as a strike. If this weapon successfully inflicts damage on an opponent in combat, add a soul counter to it at the end of that round. This weapon does one additional point of damage each strike for each soul counter on this card. Remove all soul counters from this card if another minion gains control of it.

card_text:
Unique location.
Lock after resolution of a successful action directed at you (or a card you control) to inflict 1 environmental damage on the acting minion.
flavor_text:
You should not insult the crocodile until after you have crossed the river.

Pas plus d'un seul exemplaire ne peut être joué par partie.

Nous jouons à des jeux très dangereux avec la vie et personne ne connaît nos règles.
Parke Godwin

Jugamos muy peligrosamente con la vida y nadie conoce nuestras reglas.

We play very dangerous games with life and no one knows our rules.

card_text:

card_text:

card_text:

card_text:
Master: out-of-turn.
Cancel a minion card as it is played. No cost is paid. (If it was an action card, the acting minion doesn't lock. If it was a strike card, the minion chooses another strike.)

card_text:
Unique.

card_text:
[pot] Only usable at close range at the end of a round of combat in which this vampire successfully inflicted more damage than the opposing vampire. The Admonitions
name: Follow the Blood

card_text:
[pre] [COMBAT] Strike: combat ends.
[PRE] [ACTION MODIFIER] Only usable as the action is announced. Vampires must burn 1 blood to attempt to block this action. Non-zombie allies cannot block this action.
flavor_text:
And when I walk the streets
Kings and queens step aside.
George Thorogood, "Bad to the Bone"
name: Force of Personality

card_text:
Only usable by a locked vampire.
[for] Ⓓ Bleed with +1 bleed. After resolution, this vampire takes 2 unpreventable aggravated damage even if the action is blocked.
[FOR] As above, but with +2 bleed, and the acting vampire takes only 1 unpreventable aggravated damage.
name: Force of Will

fr-FR.name: Réveil forcé
fr-FR.card_text:
Seulement utilisable par un vampire incliné.
Ce vampire se réveille (il n'a pas besoin d'être redressé pour jouer des cartes de réaction et tenter de bloquer jusqu'à la fin de l'action). S'il ne bloque pas cette action, il brûle 1 point de sang avant résolution de l'action.

es-ES.name: Despertar forzado
es-ES.card_text:
Sólo utilizable por un vampiro girado.
Este vampiro se despierta (ignora el requisito de estar enderezado para jugar cartas de reacción e intentar bloquear hasta el final de la acción). Si no bloquea esta acción, quema 1 de sangre antes de la resolución de la acción.

card_text:
Only usable by a locked vampire.
This vampire wakes (they ignore the requirement to be unlocked for playing reaction cards and attempting to block until the end of the action). If they do not block this action, they burn 1 blood before action resolution.
name: Forced Awakening

fr-FR.name: Marche forcée
fr-FR.card_text:
Un vampire ne peut en jouer qu'un seul exemplaire par tour.
[cel][for] Seulement utilisable après résolution d'une action réussie. Redressez ce vampire.
[CEL][FOR] +1 en discrétion. Après résolution de l'action, si l'action a été réussie, ce vampire peut brûler 1 point de sang pour se redresser.

es-ES.name: Marcha forzada
es-ES.card_text:
Un vampiro puede jugar sólo un ejemplar de esta carta por turno.
[cel][for] Sólo utilizable tras la resolución de una acción exitosa. Endereza a este vampiro.
[CEL][FOR] +1 de sigilo. Tras la resolución de la acción, si ha tenido éxito, este vampiro puede quemar 1 de sangre para enderezarse.

card_text:
A vampire can play only one Forced March each turn.
[cel][for] Only usable after resolution of a successful action. Unlock this vampire.
[CEL][FOR] +1 stealth. After action resolution, if the action was successful, this vampire can burn 1 blood to unlock.
name: Forced March

card_text:
[for] Only usable by a locked vampire immediately after he or she blocks (play after combat, if any). Unlock this reacting vampire.
[FOR] Only usable by a locked vampire during a Ⓓ action directed against you (or something you control). Unlock this vampire.
name: Forced Vigilance

card_text: Strike: prevent 2 damage from the opposing minion's next hand strike this round (including any currently-resolving hand strike). If another round of combat occurs, this minion gets first strike on his or her initial strike that round.
name: Forearm Block

card_text: [COMBAT] [1 CONVICTION] Only usable before range is determined on the first round of combat resulting from a block. Look at the opposing minion's controller's hand. You may then choose to cancel combat. If you do, and this imbued was blocking, the action continues as if unblocked.
name: Foresee

fr-FR.name: Présage de destruction
fr-FR.card_text:
Seulement utilisable durant une action de morsure.
[dom] +1 en morsure (limité).
[DOM] +3 en morsure si le Mathusalem ciblé a 9 points de réserve ou moins (limité).

es-ES.name: Presagiar la destrucción
es-ES.card_text:
Sólo utilizable durante una acción de sangrado.
[dom] +1 de sangrado (limitada).
[DOM] +3 de sangrado si el Matusalén objetivo tiene 9 o menos de reserva sanguínea (limitada).

card_text:
Only usable during a bleed action.
[dom] +1 bleed (limited).
[DOM] +3 bleed if the target Methuselah has 9 or fewer pool (limited).
name: Foreshadowing Destruction

card_text:
Master: unique location.
You may lock this card to give a Malkavian you control +X stealth until the end of the turn, where X is the amount of blood the Malkavian burns. You may only increase your stealth to 1 greater than the blocking minion's current intercept. Any minion can burn this location as a Ⓓ action.
name: Forest of Shadows

card_text:
Only usable when an action to equip a non-unique melee weapon from your hand is successful.
[pot] Put this card on the weapon. This weapon inflicts +1 damage each strike.
[POT] As above, and the cost of this weapon is reduced by 1 blood or 1 pool.
name: Forger's Hammer

card_text:
Requires a ready vampire with capacity 5 or more.
Ⓓ Bleed. If the bleed is successful, this acting vampire gains 1 blood.
name: Forgery

card_text:
Not usable on a bleed action.
[obf] +2 stealth.
[OBF] +3 stealth.
flavor_text:
I fled Him down the nights and down the days
I fled Him down the arches of the years,
I fled Him down the labyrinthine ways...
Francis Thompson, "The Hound of Heaven"
name: Forgotten Labyrinth

fr-FR.name: Forme de corruption
fr-FR.card_text:
[ser] Mettez cette carte en jeu. Si votre proie reçoit à nouveau l'Avantage, vous pouvez ajouter 1 compteur à cette carte. Si le nombre de compteurs sur cette carte égale ou dépasse la quantité de points de sang sur un vampire contrôlé par votre proie durant votre phase de maître, vous pouvez brûler cette carte pour voler ce vampire. Un Mathusalem ne peut en avoir qu'un seul exemplaire.
[SER] Comme ci-dessus et votre proie brûle 1 point de réserve après que vous brûlez cette carte.

es-ES.name: Forma de corrupción
es-ES.card_text:
[ser] Pon esta carta en juego. Cada vez que tu presa obtenga la Ventaja, añade 1 ficha a esta carta. Si el número de fichas de esta carta iguala o supera la cantidad de sangre de un vampiro controlado por tu presa durante tu fase heril, puedes quemar esta carta para robar ese vampiro. Un Matusalén puede tener sólo una /Forma de corrupción/.
[SER] Como antes, y tu presa quema 1 de reserva sanguínea después de que quemes esta carta.

card_text:
[ser] Put this card in play. If your prey gets the Edge anew, you can add 1 counter to this card. If the number of counters on this card equals or exceeds the amount of blood on a vampire controlled by your prey during your master phase, you can burn this card to steal that vampire. A Methuselah can have only one Form of Corruption.
[SER] As above, and your prey burns 1 pool after you burn this card.
name: Form of Corruption

fr-FR.name: Forme de brume
fr-FR.card_text:
[pro] Frapper : esquiver.
[PRO] Frapper : fin de combat. Si ce vampire agit et que l'action a été bloquée, il peut brûler 1 point de sang après la fin du combat pour continuer l'action avec +1 en discrétion comme si elle n'avait pas été bloquée, même si de la discrétion n'est pas encore nécessaire. Un vampire ne peut en jouer qu'un seul exemplaire au niveau supérieur par action.
fr-FR.flavor_text:
Et pourtant je suis et je vis — ballotté, vaporeux.
John Clare, "Je suis"

es-ES.name: Forma de niebla
es-ES.card_text:
[pro] Ataque: esquiva.
[PRO] Ataque: el combate termina. Si este vampiro está actuando y la acción fue bloqueada, puede quemar 1 de sangre después de que termine el combate para continuar la acción con +1 de sigilo como si no hubiera sido bloqueada, aunque el sigilo no sea necesario. Un vampiro puede jugar sólo un ejemplar de esta carta a superior por acción.
es-ES.flavor_text:
Y sin embargo soy, semejante a vapores.
John Clare, "Yo soy"

card_text:
[pro] Strike: dodge.
[PRO] Strike: combat ends. If this vampire is acting and the action was blocked, they can burn 1 blood after combat ends to continue the action at +1 stealth as if unblocked, even if stealth is not yet needed. A vampire can play only one Form of Mist at superior each action.
flavor_text:
...and yet I am, and live, like vapours tossed.
John Clare, "I Am"
name: Form of Mist

card_text:
[pro] Maneuver.
[PRO] Press.
flavor_text:
Nobody knows where I was,
and now I am no longer there.
Gwendolyn Brooks, "Boy Breaking Glass"
name: Form of the Ghost

card_text:
[ser] [ACTION MODIFIER] +1 stealth.
[SER] [COMBAT] Maneuver.
flavor_text:
Dear indolent, I love to see
In your body bright
How shimmering like silk the skin
Reflects the light!
Charles Baudelaire, "The Dancing Serpent"
name: Form of the Serpent

card_text:
Master: Discipline.
Put this card on a vampire. This vampire gains 1 level of Fortitude [for]. Capacity increases by 1: the vampire is one generation older. Cannot be placed on a vampire with superior Fortitude [FOR].
name: Fortitude

card_text:
Master.
Search your library for a Gehenna event card. Show it to all players and add it to your hand. Discard down to your hand size afterward. Only one Fortschritt Library may be played per game.
flavor_text:
Our diviners find signs and portents everywhere they look. The Red Star burns.
Etrius' journal
name: Fortschritt Library

card_text:
Mortal with 1 life.
During your minion phase, you may look at one card picked at random from your prey's hand.
flavor_text:
Women excel in the manifestation of certain qualities which are associated with mystery...
Charles Godfrey Leland, "Gypsy Sorcery and Fortune Telling"
name: Fortune Teller

card_text:
Master: unique location.
Lock to give a Ravnos +1 stealth for the current action.
name: Fortune Teller Shop

card_text:
Only usable if a vampire would successfully hunt.
[qui] The acting vampire gets -1 hunt and, after action resolution, takes 1 unpreventable environmental damage. Lock this reacting vampire.
[QUI] As above, but do not lock this reacting vampire.
name: Foul Blood

fr-FR.name: Exposition de la fondation
fr-FR.card_text:
Lieu unique.
Chaque Toréador antitribu non titré que vous contrôlez reçoit +1 voix. N'importe quel vampire peut brûler cette carte en action (D) qui coûte 1 point de sang.
fr-FR.flavor_text:
C'est une sorte de torture que de regarder ce spectacle.
Waldorf, Toreador antitribu

es-ES.name: Exposición de la Fundación
es-ES.card_text:
Lugar único.
Cada Toreador antitribu no titulado que controles consigue +1 voto. Cualquier vampiro puede quemar esta carta con una acción (D) que cuesta 1 de sangre.
es-ES.flavor_text:
Es como una tortura tener que ver el espectáculo.
Waldorf, Toreador antitribu

card_text:
Unique location.
Each non-titled Toreador antitribu you control gets +1 vote. Any vampire can burn this card as a Ⓓ action that costs 1 blood.
flavor_text:
It's like a kind of torture to have to watch the show.
Waldorf, Toreador antitribu
name: Foundation Exhibit

card_text:
+1 stealth action.
Put this card on a younger Laibon in your uncontrolled region and move 4 blood from the blood bank to that vampire. (This card remains in play.) A vampire may have only one Founders of the Ebony Kingdom. Burn this card if the vampire leaves the uncontrolled region.
name: Founders of the Ebony Kingdom

card_text:
Event.
Requires at least two Gehenna cards in play. When this card is played, burn all Gehenna cards and conviction [1 CONVICTION] cards, then send all vampires with capacity 3 or less to torpor. No Gehenna cards may be played while this card remains in play.
name: The Fourth Cycle

card_text:
+1 stealth action. Requires a ready prince or justicar.
Move 3 blood from the blood bank to a younger vampire in your uncontrolled region.
flavor_text: Those thou dost create are thine own children.
name: Fourth Tradition: The Accounting

card_text:
[cel] X is 0. Strike: dodge.
[str] This vampire gets X additional strikes (limited) each round. Those additional strikes can only be hand strikes. [str] is not a Discipline.
[STR] As [str] above, and this vampire gets +1 strength for the remainder of this combat.
name: Fractura

card_text:
[pot] Strike: destroy equipment.
[POT] As above, with 1 damage.
name: Fractured Armament

_name: Fragment of the Book of Nod
card_text:
Unique master.
Put this card in play. Lock to draw 2 cards from your library (discard afterward). Any vampire can take control of the Fragment for his or her controller as a Ⓓ action.
name: Fragment of the Book of Nod

card_text:
+1 stealth action. Requires an anarch.
Ⓓ Put this card on the acting anarch and choose a ready minion. If the anarch with this card is blocked, this card is burned. Then the blocking minion enters combat with the chosen minion instead of this anarch (or the action ends with no combat if that combat cannot occur).
name: The Framing

card_text:
Master.
Choose a prince or primogen, or burn 3 pool to choose a justicar. The chosen vampire loses his or her title.
name: Framing an Ancient Grudge

fr-FR.name: Pulsion monstrueuse
fr-FR.card_text:
Seulement utilisable après résolution de l'action.
[for] Seulement utilisable si l'action a été réussie. Redressez ce vampire.
[FOR] Seulement utilisable si l'action a été bloquée. Redressez ce vampire.

es-ES.name: Impulso sobrenatural
es-ES.card_text:
Sólo utilizable tras la resolución de la acción.
[for] Sólo utilizable si la acción tuvo éxito. Endereza a este vampiro.
[FOR] Sólo utilizable si la acción fue bloqueada. Endereza a este vampiro.

card_text:
Only usable after action resolution.
[for] Only usable if the action was successful. Unlock this vampire.
[FOR] Only usable if the action was blocked. Unlock this vampire.
name: Freak Drive

card_text:
Only usable before range is determined.
[san] Lock this Blood Brother and any number of ready unlocked members you control of this circle. Once each round before range is determined, or whenever your combatant leaves the ready region, you may choose one of these ready Blood Brothers to become the combatant instead (and combat continues).
[SAN] As above, and each of these Blood Brothers gets an optional press this combat.
name: Free Fight

card_text:
Requires an Independent or Anarch vampire.
Allocate X points among one or more ready vampires, where X is half the capacity of the acting vampire (rounded up). No more than 3 points points can be allocated to each vampire. Successful referendum means each vampire burns 1 blood for each point allocated. In this referendum, non-priscus titles are worth 1 less vote each, priscus title is worth 1 less ballot, and burning the Edge is worth 1 additional vote.
name: Free States Rant

card_text:
Master: out-of-turn. Frenzy.
Only usable before range is chosen. Choose a vampire in combat. In this round, that vampire cannot use equipment and cannot use presses to end combat. This round has a press, only usable to continue combat.
name: Frenzy

card_text:
Requires an Anarch.
[for] Reduce a bleed against you by 2.
[nec] +1 intercept.
[obt] Only usable after a vampire successfully bleeds you. The acting vampire burns 2 blood.
name: Friend of Mine

card_text:
Master.
Take control of a minion controlled by a Methuselah with 3 or fewer pool. Not usable to take control of a vampire with capacity 7 or more. Only one From a Sinking Ship can be played in a game.
flavor_text:
This is not what I signed up for.
Theo Bell, Brujah archon.
name: From a Sinking Ship

fr-FR.name: Assaut frontal
fr-FR.card_text: Mettez cette carte en jeu. Chaque serviteur disponible que vous contrôlez peut entrer en combat contre un serviteur contrôlé par votre proie en action (D). Vous gagnez 1 point de réserve après qu'un serviteur disponible contrôlé par votre proie est brûlé ou envoyé en torpeur. Durant votre phase d'influence, brûlez cette carte et brûlez 1 point de réserve pour chaque serviteur disponible contrôlé par votre proie.

es-ES.name: Asalto frontal
es-ES.card_text: Pon esta carta en juego. Cada siervo preparado que controles puede entrar en combate con un siervo controlado por tu presa con una acción (D). Ganas 1 de reserva sanguínea después de que un siervo controlado por tu presa sea quemado o enviado al letargo. Durante tu fase de influencia, quema esta carta y quema 1 de reserva sanguínea por cada siervo preparado controlado por tu presa.

card_text: Put this card in play. Each ready minion you control can enter combat with a minion controlled by your prey as a Ⓓ action. You gain 1 pool after a ready minion controlled by your prey is burned or sent to torpor. During your influence phase, burn this card and burn 1 pool for each ready minion controlled by your prey.
name: Frontal Assault

card_text:
+1 stealth action. A Methuselah can have only one Frozen Object.
[ser] Ⓓ Look at any Methuselah's hand and discard all equipment cards from it.
[tem] Put this card on this vampire. If this vampire blocks a directed action, you can burn this card to inflict 2 unpreventable environmental damage on the acting minion before block resolution.
[TEM] Put this card in play. You can burn this card after a minion successfully bleeds you to inflict 2 unpreventable environmental damage on the bleeding minion.
name: Frozen Object

card_text:
Gehenna. Do not replace until a vampire commits diablerie.
Put 10 counters on this card. Remove one counter each time another Gehenna card is put in play. A blood hunt cannot be called on a vampire whose capacity is greater than the number of counters on this card when he or she diablerizes a younger vampire.
flavor_text:
I'm starting to hear whispers of warehouses and old office buildings converted to internment centers -- and buffets.
Okulos, Nosferatu
name: Fueled by Heart's Blood

card_text:
Usable by a locked vampire.
[nec] Unlock a mummy, wraith, or zombie ally you control.
[NEC] Unlock up to two mummy, wraith, or zombie allies you control.
name: Funeral Wake

card_text:
Master. Trifle.
Put this card on a ready non-titled, non-Anarch vampire you control. The vampire with this card is considered Anarch. If this vampire changes sects, burn this card.
flavor_text:
The neonate childe escaped. So intent on Galaric were the Ventrue that they ignored the childe until he was long gone from their grasp.
Salvador Garcia, Brujah anarch
name: Galaric's Legacy

card_text:
Master.
Only usable if you have at least 1 victory point. Lose 1 victory point and put this card in play. During your unlock phase, move 1 pool from your prey's pool to your pool. If you are ousted, your predator gains an additional victory point. At the end of the game, if you have not been ousted, you gain an additional victory point.
name: Gambit Accepted

fr-FR.name: Jeu de Malkav
fr-FR.card_text: Chaque autre Mathusalem choisit en secret un nombre entre 1 et 5 inclus ; vous choisissez un nombre entre 1 et 6 inclus. Chaque Mathusalem tend sa main avec le nombre choisi de compteurs dedans. Révélez les choix simultanément. Chaque Mathusalem gagne la quantité de points de réserve qu'il a choisie sauf si un autre Mathusalem a choisi exactement 1 de moins que lui, auquel cas il brûle cette quantité de points de réserve à la place.

es-ES.name: Juego de Malkav
es-ES.card_text: Cada uno de los demás Matusalenes elige en secreto un número entre 1 y 5 inclusive; tú eliges un número entre 1 y 6 inclusive. Cada Matusalén extiende el puño cerrado con el número de fichas elegido dentro. Revela las elecciones simultáneamente. Cada Matusalén gana la cantidad de reserva sanguínea que haya elegido, a no ser que otro Matusalén haya elegido exactamente una ficha menos que él, en cuyo caso, quema esa cantidad de reserva sanguínea en vez de ganarla.

card_text: Each other Methuselah secretly chooses a number between 1 and 5 inclusive; you choose a number between 1 and 6 inclusive. Each Methuselah holds a hand out with the chosen number of counters in it. Reveal the choices simultaneously. Each Methuselah gains the amount of pool they chose unless another Methuselah chose exactly 1 less than they did, in which case, they burn that amount of pool instead.
name: Game of Malkav

card_text:
Requires a ready Sabbat vampire.
Ⓓ Enter combat with an older vampire controlled by another Methuselah. At the end of that combat, if only one combatant is ready, that ready vampire gains blood equal to the opposing vampire's capacity from the blood bank.
flavor_text:
Is this why you arranged for us to be alone together? So you could try to 'talk sense' into me? Or were you just feeling suicidal?
Tara, Brujah Prince of San Diego
name: Games of Instinct

card_text:
Only usable when the action is announced.
If the action is blocked, the resulting combat is at close range. Other effects cannot change this; skip the determine range step during that combat.
flavor_text:
He who is skilled in the attack flashes forth from the topmost heights of heaven, making it impossible for the enemy to guard against him.
Sun Tzu, "The Art of War"
name: Gang Tactics

card_text:
Master: unique location.
During your influence phase, lock to move 1 blood from the blood bank to a Brujah antitribu in your uncontrolled region.
name: Gang Territory

card_text:
Master.
Put this card on a Gangrel. This vampire gets -1 bleed.
name: Gangrel Atavism

card_text:
Master: out-of-turn.
Cancel a blood hunt called on a Gangrel antitribu. You may play this card during your turn.
flavor_text:
In America there are factions, but no conspiracies.
Alexis de Tocqueville, "Democracy in America"
name: Gangrel Conspiracy

card_text:
Title.
In this referendum, each Gangrel gets an extra vote. Choose a ready Camarilla Gangrel. If this referendum is successful, put this card on the chosen Gangrel to represent the unique Camarilla title of Gangrel Justicar. This could lead to a contested title.
name: Gangrel Justicar

card_text:
Unique master.
Put this card in play. Each Gangrel you control gets +1 strength. This card may be burned by any minion who is not Ravnos as a Ⓓ action.
name: Gangrel Revel

card_text:
Ally with 3 life. 2 strength, 0 bleed.
Gargoyle Slave cannot use ranged weapons. Gargoyle may prevent one damage each combat. If Gargoyle has less than 3 life, he or she can gain one life as a +1 stealth action.
name: Gargoyle Slave

card_text:
Master: unique location.
Lock and burn 1 pool during your unlock phase to exchange a card in your ash heap that requires an anarch for a card from your hand. Lock before range is determined to end combat between an anarch you control and another anarch.
name: Garibaldi-Meucci Museum

card_text:
Melee weapon.
Strike: strength damage, only usable at close range. If the opposing vampire would go to torpor during the strike resolution step of this strike and the bearer remains ready, the bearer may burn this card to burn the opposing vampire instead. This is not considered diablerie.
name: Garrote

card_text:
Melee weapon.
3 damage each strike. This weapon is only usable once each combat.
name: Gas-Powered Chainsaw

card_text:
+1 stealth action. Unique.
Put this card in play, locked, and choose a younger Gangrel in your uncontrolled region. During the influence phase, you may lock this card to move that Gangrel from your uncontrolled region to your ready region, with any counters he or she has, unless that Gangrel would contest a vampire in play. Any vampire can burn this card as a Ⓓ action that costs 1 pool.
name: Gather

card_text:
+1 stealth action. Requires an Anarch.
[nec] This Anarch unlocks. Move a card from your ash heap to your hand. 
[pre] This Anarch unlocks and gets +1 stealth until the end of the turn.
[vic] This Anarch unlocks and gets +1 strength until your unlock phase.
name: Gear Up

card_text:
[obf] Strike: dodge, with an optional maneuver.
[OBF] Only usable before range is determined. For each strike made against this vampire, flip a coin. If it's tails, the strike has no effect on this vampire. This lasts until heads is flipped or combat ends. A vampire can play only one Gemini's Mirror at superior each combat.
name: Gemini's Mirror

card_text:
Choose X ready Blood Brothers you control who belong to the same circle as this reacting vampire (including this vampire). Each chosen vampire must burn a blood, or this card has no effect.
[san] +X intercept.
[SAN] +X intercept, and this vampire may play cards as if he or she possessed all of the chosen Blood Brothers' Disciplines for the remainder of the action.
name: Gestalt

card_text:
+1 stealth hunt action.
Choose a minion or retainer in any ash heap who was burned from play since your last turn. Remove the chosen minion or retainer from the game to add X blood to this Harbinger of Skulls, where X is the capacity of the chosen vampire or the starting life of the chosen ally or retainer.
name: Ghost-Eater

card_text:
Ghoul with 4 life. Requires a ready vampire.
When this vampire is blocked, he or she may burn this retainer and unlock instead of entering combat. (This does not unlock the blocker.)
name: Ghoul Escort

card_text:
Ghoul with 1 life. Requires a ready Laibon.
The vampire with this retainer may move it to another ready vampire as a +1 stealth action. If the action is successful, the new employer gains 1 blood from the blood bank, and the acting vampire unlocks at the end of the turn. If the action is blocked, cancel combat, burn the Messenger, and do not lock the blocking minion.
name: Ghoul Messenger

card_text:
Ghoul with 2 life. 1 strength.
During the initial strike resolution each round, the Ghoul Retainer inflicts 1 damage or may use a weapon not used by the employing minion (or another retainer) that round (either before or after). This is not a strike, although it does count as "using" the weapon.
name: Ghoul Retainer

card_text:
Only usable when the action to recruit a mortal ally is announced.
If this action is successful, put this card on that ally and add 1 additional life to the ally from the blood bank. This ally is considered a ghoul and not a mortal. Once each combat, this ally can play a strike card that requires basic Potence [pot] as a vampire.
name: Ghouled

card_text:
Ghoul with 2 life. 1 strength, 0 bleed.
Ghouled Street Thug may strike for 1R damage. Ghouled Street Thug may play cards requiring basic Potence [pot] as a vampire with a capacity of 2. If a card would give him blood, give him life instead.
name: Ghouled Street Thug

card_text:
Unique ghoul with 2 life. 1 strength, 0 bleed.
The Ghouls of Plaza Morería can strike: 1R damage. They get 1 optional maneuver each combat. They can burn 1 blood from a ready vampire and put 1 container counter on themselves as a +1 stealth Ⓓ action. Any ready Assamite can burn X container counters from them to gain X blood as a +1 stealth action.
name: The Ghouls of Plaza Morería

card_text:
Unique wraith with 2 life. 1 strength, 1 bleed.
If another minion you control is in combat, Gianna can lock and burn herself to burn an equipment on the opposing minion, or lock during strike resolution to inflict 1 unpreventable damage on the opposing minion.
name: Gianna di Canneto

fr-FR.name: Sang de géant
fr-FR.card_text:
Pas plus d'un seul exemplaire ne peut être joué par partie.
Choisissez n'importe quel vampire. Le vampire choisi gagne assez de points de sang pour atteindre sa capacité maximale.

es-ES.name: Sangre del gigante
es-ES.card_text:
Sólo se puede jugar un ejemplar de esta carta por partida.
Rellena a un vampiro hasta su plena capacidad con sangre del banco de sangre.
es-ES.flavor_text:
Ox ya es difícil de manejar. Habría sido imparable si hubiera bebido la sangre del gigante. ¡No podíamos permitirlo!
Ventrue, Trondheim, Trama de 2002

card_text:
Only one Giant's Blood can be played in a game.
Fill any vampire to full capacity with blood from the blood bank.
flavor_text:

es-ES.flavor_text:

Radu Bistri, Tzimisce

card_text:
Unique.

Occasionally, I think I see it beat. Just dancing shadows, perhaps, but fortune follows.

card_text:
+1 stealth action.

flavor_text:
If you would be so kind as to step into my office, I shall be so kind as to let you delight in my presence.

card_text:
Only usable during a bleed action.
[aus][chi] +1 bleed (limited). You cannot play another action modifier to increase this bleed. If an ally or younger vampire is currently attempting to block this action, that block fails and that minion cannot block this action.
[AUS][CHI] As above, but with +2 bleed (limited).

card_text:
Unique location.
Any Assamite can add 1 blood to this card as an action. During your influence phase, you can move any amount of blood from this card to an Assamite in your uncontrolled region.

card_text:
Only usable by a ready unlocked vampire not involved in the combat.
[nec] Prevent 1 damage to an ally in combat.
[obe] Only usable if an ally would be burned in combat. Instead, add 1 life to that ally if they have no life, and they cannot enter (or be involved in) combat, perform actions, or block this turn; end combat.
[OBE] As [obe] above, but add 2 life if they have no life, not to exceed their starting life.

Vous pouvez l'incliner pour déplacer des points de sang, des équipements et/ou des compagnons entre deux vampires disponibles que vous contrôlez. Non utilisable durant une action.
fr-FR.flavor_text:
La nuit. La pluie. Un ciel blafard que déchiquette
De flèches et de tours à jour la silhouette
D'une ville gothique éteinte au lointain gris.
Paul Verlaine, "Effet de nuit"

Lugar único.
Gírala para pasar sangre, equipo o criados entre dos vampiros preparados que controles. No se puede usar durante una acción.

La noche. La lluvia. Un cielo incoloro que desgarra
De flechas y de torres a plena luz la silueta
De una ciudad gótica apagada en la gris lejanía.
Paul Verlaine, "Efecto nocturno"

card_text:
Unique location.

Night. Rain. The lurid sky that lets
The spires and towers show grey silhouettes

If the Herald has less than 5 life during your unlock phase, add 1 life. During your influence phase, burn 1 pool or burn the Herald.

+3 stealth action.
[pot] Put this card on this vampire. This vampire gets +1 strength. This vampire can strike: burn equipment. Burn this card if this vampire is in torpor. A vampire can have only one Heroic Might.

card_text:
[dai] Strike: 2R damage.

[REACTION] [1 CONVICTION] Only usable during a monster's Ⓓ action targeting this imbued. The action fails.

The surgical strike is better. Do damage. Disappear. Repeat.

[aus] Reduce a bleed against you by 1.

[obf] [COMBAT] Cancel a combat card that requires Auspex [aus] as it is played. No cost is paid.

card_text:

If this referendum succeeds, put this card on the acting Laibon. This Laibon gets +1 bleed. Cards which require a non-Laibon title cannot be played on this Laibon nor while this Laibon is acting. A minion may have only one Hiding in the Open.

card_text: Choose any Follower of Set. Successful referendum means this card is put on the chosen vampire. This vampire gets +1 vote. If a vampire blocks this vampire, the blocking vampire burns 1 blood before block resolution.

card_text:

+1 stealth, +2 stealth if this action is undirected. If the action succeeds, you may discard up to two cards from your hand (draw afterward).

card_text:
Master: unique location.

For the remainder of this action, cards that require any Disciplines cost this Laibon 1 less blood, and your hand size is one card larger.

As nightfall does not come at once, neither does oppression... it is in such twilight that we all must be aware of change in the air -- however slight -- lest we become victims of the darkness.
William O. Douglas

card_text: Only usable if playing for ante. Successful referendum means each Methuselah decides whether to ante the next card in his or her library or be ousted from the game. Decisions should be made simultaneously, as follows: each Methuselah holds out a hand with zero or one blood in it. Open hands simultaneously. A pool in a Methuselah's hand indicates that he or she chooses not to be ousted.

card_text:
Unique werewolf with 3 life. 1 strength, 0 bleed.
High Top gets +1 intercept. High Top may enter combat with any minion controlled by another Methuselah as a Ⓓ action. High Top gets an additional strike (limited) each round and an optional maneuver once each combat. He may play cards requiring basic Celerity [cel] as a vampire with a capacity of 4. If High Top has less than 3 life during your unlock phase, he gains 1 life.

If the bearer is an anarch, any vampire attempting a Ⓓ action targeting this anarch doesn't unlock as normal on his or her next unlock phase (even if the action isn't successful). Any werewolf may burn this equipment and enter combat with this minion as a +1 stealth Ⓓ action. A minion may have only one haven and only one vehicle.

+1 stealth action.

Unique master.

card_text:
+1 stealth action.
[pot] Draw three cards. Discard afterward.

Master: unique location.

card_text:
[dai] +1 stealth.

I talked about an apparition...

Starting with your prey and going clockwise, each Methuselah with any ready titled vampires may elect to cast all of his or her vampires' votes and ballots in favor for 1 pool. Each time a Methuselah declines, this Ishtarri burns 1 blood to add 1 pool to that amount. Continue until a Methuselah accepts or this Ishtarri fails to burn a blood. When results are tallied, each vampire casting votes or ballots against this referendum burns 2 blood.

Master.

Requires an anarch. More than one discipline can be used to play this card. Ⓓ Bleed.
[cel] Unlock this anarch if the bleed is successful.

[chi] Combat ends. Move the bottom card of your crypt to your ready region. He or she does not contest any other minions or titles in play. +1 stealth action. Unique.

Prise. Seulement utilisable au contact avant que les frappes ne soient choisies. Un vampire ne peut en jouer qu'un seul exemplaire par round.

This vampire may play a Blood Hunt card from your hand or ash heap as a prince. This vampire gets 3 additional votes in blood hunt referendums.

card_text:
[chi] Only usable before range is chosen. This vampire gets +1 strength for the remainder of combat. When combat ends, if the opposing minion is ready, the opposing minion gains an amount of blood (or life) equal to the amount he or she lost due to damage this combat. A vampire can play only one Imposing Phantasm each combat.

Wherever a man is against his will, that to him is a prison.

Weapon.
