es-ES.name: Almas gemelas
es-ES.card_text:
[dem] (D) Sangra a cualquier Matusalén. Gana 1 de reserva sanguínea si este sangrado tiene éxito (de 1 o más).
[DEM] Como antes, con +1 de sangrado.
es-ES.flavor_text:
Como gotas de agua, mezcladas en una.
William Cowper, "El reloj"

card_text:
[dem] Ⓓ Bleed any Methuselah. Gain 1 pool if this bleed is successful (for 1 or more).
[DEM] As above, with +1 bleed.
flavor_text:
Like kindred drops, been mingled into one.
William Cowper, "The Timepiece"
name: Kindred Spirits

fr-FR.name: Conflit sur le bétail
fr-FR.card_text: Allouez 4 points entre deux Mathusalems ou plus. Si le référendum passe, chaque Mathusalem brûle 1 point de réserve pour chaque point alloué.

es-ES.name: Disputa de recursos ganaderos
es-ES.card_text: Asigna 4 puntos entre dos o más Matusalenes. Si el referéndum prospera, cada Matusalén quema 1 de reserva sanguínea por cada punto asignado.

card_text: Allocate 4 points among two or more Methuselahs. Successful referendum means each Methuselah burns 1 pool for each point allocated.
name: Kine Resources Contested

card_text:
[for] Prevent all damage from the opposing minion's strike. If the strike was made with a melee weapon, that weapon is destroyed.
[FOR] Play after range is determined and before strikes are chosen. If the opposing minion inflicts damage with a hand strike this round (even if the damage is prevented), he or she takes an equal amount of damage during strike resolution as well.
name: King of the Mountain

card_text:
Only usable during a referendum. Boon.
This Guruhi gets 3 additional votes. If this Guruhi casts votes in favor, and the referendum passes by the number of votes this Guruhi cast or fewer, put this card in play. While this card is in play, that acting vampire may not block this Guruhi. You may burn this card during any Methuselah's unlock phase to move up to 3 blood from that vampire to this Guruhi.
name: King's Favor

card_text:
Master.
If you have 5 or fewer pool, gain 3 pool. Otherwise, gain 1 pool. In either case, put this card in play. You cannot use transfers to move counters to or from your uncontrolled minions. If you control the Edge during your unlock phase, burn this card.
name: King's Rising

card_text:
Master: unique location. Hunting ground.
During your unlock phase, you may move 1 blood from the blood bank to a ready vampire you control. Any other Methuselah may give you a pool during his or her unlock phase to lock this card to move 1 blood from the blood bank to a ready vampire he or she controls. A vampire can gain blood from only one hunting ground card each turn.
name: Kingston Penitentiary, Ontario

card_text:
+1 stealth action.
[ser] Ⓓ Burn a retainer or a non-unique equipment.
[tem] Ⓓ Burn an ally, retainer or non-unique equipment.
[TEM] Move a non-unique equipment card from any Methuselah's ash heap to this vampire. If the equipment card comes from your ash heap, pay half the cost rounded down, otherwise pay no cost.
name: Kiss of Lachesis

card_text:
Only usable when a vampire who does not have Fortitude [for] attempts to block this acting minion.
[for] The block attempt is canceled, the blocking vampire burns 2 blood, and the current action is ended (without combat).
[FOR] As above, and send the blocking vampire to torpor.
name: The Kiss of Ra

card_text: Unique mortal with 2 life. 2 strength, 0 bleed.
name: The Knights

card_text:
Requires an infernal vampire. Only usable during a referendum.
Choose a younger vampire. The chosen vampire abstains. This can cancel that vampire's votes and ballots.
name: Knotted Cord

card_text:
Weapon. Gun.
1R damage each strike, with an optional maneuver each combat. When bearer strikes with this gun, he or she gets an optional additional strike (limited) this round, only usable to strike with this gun.
name: Kpist m/45

card_text:
[vic] Strike: strength+1 ranged damage. If this striking minion takes more than 3 damage this combat, he or she goes to torpor.
[VIC] As above, with an optional press, only usable to continue combat, and once each round for the remainder of combat, this vampire may strike to steal two blood at close or long range.
name: Kraken's Kiss

fr-FR.name: Radio d'informations KRCG
fr-FR.card_text:
Lieu unique.
Vous pouvez l'incliner pour donner +1 en interception à un serviteur que vous contrôlez. Vous pouvez l'incliner et brûler 1 point de réserve pour donner +1 en interception à un serviteur contrôlé par un autre Mathusalem.

es-ES.name: Radio de noticias KRCG
es-ES.card_text:
Lugar único.
Gírala para darle a un siervo que controles +1 de intercepción. Gírala y quema 1 de reserva sanguínea para darle a un siervo controlado por otro Matusalén +1 de intercepción.

card_text:
Unique location.
Lock to give a minion you control +1 intercept. Lock and burn 1 pool to give a minion controlled by another Methuselah +1 intercept.
name: KRCG News Radio

card_text:
Unique master.
Put this card in play. Lock to give +1 intercept to a Ravnos with capacity above 4 you control.
name: Kumpania

card_text:
Requires a Laibon.
Choose a younger vampire with capacity 6 or less. If this referendum succeeds, put this card on that vampire. Directed actions cost this vampire an additional blood. This vampire cannot block older vampires. Any vampire may call a referendum to burn this card as a +1 stealth political action.
name: Kuta

fr-FR.name: Le labyrinthe
fr-FR.card_text:
Lieu unique.
Vous pouvez l'incliner pour donner +1 en discrétion à un Nosferatu que vous contrôlez.
fr-FR.flavor_text:
Mais de manière confuse, j'aspire horriblement
À rencontrer une chose maigre, naine, fétide et poilue
Avec une peau répugnante et des yeux chassieux...
Francis Saltus, "La Passade d'une courtisane"

es-ES.name: El laberinto
es-ES.card_text:
Lugar único.
Gírala para darle +1 de sigilo a un Nosferatu que controles.
es-ES.flavor_text:
Pero de manera vaga, anhelo locamente
Encontrarme con algo delgado, enano, fétido y peludo
Con piel repugnante y ojos saltones y legañosos.
Francis Saltus, "El capricho de una cortesana"

card_text:
Unique location.
Lock to give a Nosferatu you control +1 stealth.
flavor_text:
But in vague ways, I most insanely yearn
To meet some lean, dwarfed, fetid, hairy thing
With loathsome skin and bulging eyes of rheum...
Francis Saltus, "A Courtesan's Whim"
name: The Labyrinth

card_text:
Requires an anarch. Do not replace until after combat. Strike: hand strike or use a melee weapon strike.
[for] This strike is at +1 damage, with an optional maneuver.
[pot] This strike is at +2 damage.
[vic] This strike is at +1 damage, with an optional press. If another round of combat occurs, range is automatically close.
name: Lam Into

card_text:
Only usable before range is determined.
[pot] This vampire gets +2 strength this round.
[tem] The opposing minion cannot maneuver this round.
[TEM] The opposing minion cannot strike during the initial strike phase this round (other strike resolution effects are not affected).
name: Lapse

fr-FR.name: Ordinateur portable
fr-FR.card_text:
Électronique.
Son possesseur reçoit +1 en morsure. Un serviteur ne peut en avoir qu'un seul exemplaire.

es-ES.name: Ordenador portátil
es-ES.card_text:
Electrónico.
El portador obtiene +1 de sangrado. Un siervo puede tener sólo un ejemplar de esta carta.

card_text:
Electronic.
The bearer gets +1 bleed. A minion can have only one Laptop Computer.
name: Laptop Computer

card_text:
Unique master.
Put this card in play. When any other Methuselah is ousted, the current turn ends (after the current action is concluded, if any), and this card is burned. The predator of the ousted Methuselah (if more than one was ousted, go clockwise from the left of the Methuselah whose turn just ended) takes the next turn.
flavor_text:
There may come a day when I'll dance on your grave
Unable to dance I'll still crawl across it
The Grateful Dead, "Hell in a Bucket."
name: Last Stand

card_text:
Requires an anarch.
Only usable when a blood hunt referendum passes and would burn this anarch. Move this anarch to the uncontrolled region (breaking any temporary control effects). Any cards and counters on this vampire remain with him or her (but are out of play as long as the vampire remains uncontrolled).
name: Lay Low

card_text:
Unique master.
Put this card on a ready Harbinger of Skulls you control. The Harbinger of Skulls with this card can burn up to 2 blood from a ready vampire as a +1 stealth Ⓓ action. Any Sabbat vampire can burn this card as a Ⓓ action.
flavor_text:
This sadistic Inquisitor comes in and they all scurry to the shadows. It'll take months to get Quira settled down again. But try to correct him, and you're likely to face auto-da-fé yourself.
Lachlan, Archbishop of Chicago
name: Lazarene Inquisitor

card_text:
[tha] Strike: hand strike at +1 damage.
[vis] As [tha] above, and once this round this vampire can burn 1 blood to get 1 press, only usable to continue combat.
[VIS] As [vis] above, but at +2 damage.
name: Lead Fist

card_text:
Master: out-of-turn. Unique.
Only usable when a ready titled vampire controlled by another Methuselah is burned or sent to torpor. Usable during your turn. Put this card in play and put X counters on this card where X is the number of votes that vampire has. That Methuselah burns X pool during each of his or her unlock phases. During his or her unlock phase, if he or she controls a ready vampire with a capacity of 8 or more or with a title, burn this card.
name: Leadership Vacuum

card_text:
[obf] Maneuver, only usable to go to long range.
[spi] Maneuver.
[SPI] Strike: combat ends.
name: Leapfrog

card_text:
Vehicle.
Each time you draw to replace a card this minion played as an acting minion, you may draw an additional card (discard afterward). A minion may have only one vehicle.
flavor_text:
Pieterzoon's got a plane waiting, or if you've arranged one I can get you there, but we gotta go now.
Theo Bell, Brujah archon
name: Learjet

card_text:
Equipment.
If the action to equip with the Leather Jacket is successful, unlock the acting minion at the end of the turn. Bearer may burn Leather Jacket to prevent all the damage from the opposing minion's strike. A minion may have only one Leather Jacket.
name: Leather Jacket

card_text:
A vampire may play only one Leathery Hide each round.
Prevent four non-aggravated damage from the opposing minion's strike.
name: Leathery Hide

card_text:
Requires a ready mortal, ghoul, or mage.
Ⓓ Steal a blood (it becomes a life) from a vampire controlled by another Methuselah and unlock this ally. Burn any conviction [1 CONVICTION] cards on this ally. This ally may play cards requiring Potence [pot] as a vampire until his or her next unlock phase.
name: Leech

card_text:
Master: out-of-turn.
Only usable when an ally would be burned in combat. Combat ends. Put this card on that ally; that ally is not burned. Put 1 life on the ally from the blood bank if he or she has no life. Lock the ally. This ally does not unlock as normal. If he or she enters combat, he or she is burned. Burn this card during his or her next unlock phase.
name: Left for Dead

card_text:
+2 stealth action. Requires an unmerged advanced vampire.
Unlock this vampire, search your crypt (shuffle afterward), uncontrolled region, and/or ash heap for their base version, and merge them with it.
name: Legacy

card_text:
Master.
Put this card on a vampire with a capacity above 6 controlled by another Methuselah. This vampire cannot hunt as normal. He or she may hunt by stealing 1 blood from another vampire as a Ⓓ action.
name: Legacy of Caine

card_text:
Requires a Sabbat vampire.
If this referendum is successful, put this card in play. Each non-titled Pander has 1 vote. Any Sabbat vampire may call a referendum to burn this card as a +1 stealth political action.
name: Legacy of Pander

card_text:
Requires a ready prince, justicar or Inner Circle member.
Only usable when another vampire you control enters combat. Lock this reacting vampire and end combat. Each of the vampires involved in that combat goes to torpor.
name: Legacy of Power

fr-FR.name: Manipulations légales
fr-FR.card_text:
[pre] (D) Mordre à +2 en morsure.
[PRE] Comme ci-dessus et gagnez 1 point de réserve si la morsure est réussie (pour 1 ou plus).
fr-FR.flavor_text:
Crois-moi... s'il y a bien quelque chose que je ne supporte pas, c'est la duplicité.
Christopher Hampton, "Les Liaisons dangereuses", acte I, scène 5

es-ES.name: Manipulaciones legales
es-ES.card_text:
[pre] (D) Sangra con +2 de sangrado.
[PRE] Como antes, y gana 1 de reserva sanguínea si el sangrado tiene éxito (de 1 o más).
es-ES.flavor_text:
Créeme... Si hay algo que no puedo soportar es el engaño.
Christopher Hampton, "Las amistades peligrosas", acto I, escena 5

card_text:
[pre] Ⓓ Bleed with +2 bleed.
[PRE] As above, and gain 1 pool if the bleed is successful (for 1 or more).
flavor_text:
Believe me... if there's one thing I cannot abide, it's deceitfulness.
Christopher Hampton, "Dangerous Liaisons", act I, scene 5
name: Legal Manipulations

card_text:
+1 stealth action.
Ⓓ Inflict 1 damage on a vampire controlled by your predator or prey or take control of an ally controlled by your predator or prey.
flavor_text:
The leopard's coat is beautiful, but his heart is evil.
Baluba proverb
name: Legend of the Leopard

fr-FR.name: Vampire légendaire
fr-FR.card_text:
Unique.
Mettez cette carte sur un vampire de capacité 7 ou plus qui est entré dans votre région disponible durant votre dernière phase d'influence. Ce vampire reçoit +2 en morsure et +2 voix. N'importe quel vampire peut appeler un référendum pour brûler cette carte en action politique à +1 en discrétion.

es-ES.name: Vampiro legendario
es-ES.card_text:
Única.
Ponle esta carta a un vampiro con capacidad 7 o más que haya entrado en tu zona preparada durante tu última fase de influencia. Este vampiro obtiene +2 de sangrado y +2 votos. Cualquier vampiro puede proponer un referéndum para quemar esta carta con una acción política con +1 de sigilo.

card_text:
Unique.
Put this card on a vampire with capacity 7 or more who entered your ready region during your last influence phase. This vampire gets +2 bleed and +2 votes. Any vampire can call a referendum to burn this card as a +1 stealth political action.
name: Legendary Vampire

card_text:
Requires a ready vampire with capacity above 7. +1 stealth action.
Put this card on this acting vampire. This non-Sterile vampire can put a Master Discipline card from your hand or ash heap in play to represent a fledgling with 1 level of that Discipline and discard the rest of your hand as a +2 stealth action. The fledgling is a 1-capacity, non-unique vampire of the same clan as this vampire. The fledgling cannot act or block or play cards if this vampire is not ready.
name: Legion

card_text:
Do not replace until your next unlock phase.
+1 intercept. Not usable by a vampire with more than 0 intercept.
name: Legwork

card_text:
Unique mortal with 2 life. 1 strength, 0 bleed.
Leonardo can add 1 blood to a ready vampire as a +1 stealth action.
flavor_text:
Unnoticed in the house
Of Hades, too, you'll wander
Flittering after faded corpses.
Sappho
name: Leonardo, Mortician

card_text:
Master: out-of-turn. Boon.
Only usable when a minion you control would successfully block. The action resolves as if unblocked instead. Put this card on the acting minion. This minion cannot block your minions. Burn this card if you block this minion again, or when this minion's controller has less than 6 pool.
name: Lesser Boon

card_text:
[aus][for] Only usable when damage is successfully inflicted on this vampire. Look at the opposing minion's controller's hand, and this vampire gets an optional press this round. A vampire can play only one Lessons in the Steel each round.
[AUS][FOR] As above, and that Methuselah discards a card of your choice.
flavor_text:
Knowledge by suffering entereth,
And life is perfected by death.
Elizabeth Barrett Browning, "A Vision of Poets", Conclusion
name: Lessons in the Steel

card_text:
Master.
Lock all ready Tremere.
flavor_text: The rulers of the Tremere clan, the Circle of Seven, reside in their chantry in Vienna. All Tremere obey the decrees of the Circle of Seven without question.
name: Letter from Vienna

card_text:
Only usable during a bleed action.
Burn the Edge to get +1 bleed that does not count against the limit. You cannot gain the Edge this action. If you would get the Edge, it is burned instead.
flavor_text:
It is a mistake to try to look too far ahead. The chain of destiny can only be grasped one link at a time.
Sir Winston Churchill
name: Leverage

card_text: Choose a Methuselah who has received a victory point since your last turn. Successful referendum means the Methuselah must immediately lock all of his or her minions; the minions do not unlock as normal during the Methuselah's next unlock phase.
name: Lextalionis

card_text:
Master. Requires an anarch.
Put this card on an anarch. Allies cannot block this anarch. Cards that require Dominate [dom] or Presence [pre] cost other minions an additional blood while this anarch is acting, attempting to block, or in combat.
name: Libertas

card_text:
Requires a ready titled non-Anarch vampire. +1 stealth action.
Choose up to two Anarch vampires with capacities of 5 or less. Each chosen vampire is locked and does not unlock as normal on his or her next unlock phase.
name: Liberty Club Intrigue

fr-FR.name: Bibliothèque, terrain de chasse
fr-FR.card_text:
Lieu unique. Terrain de chasse.
Durant votre phase de redressement, un vampire disponible que vous contrôlez peut gagner 1 point de sang. Un vampire ne peut gagner de points de sang que d'un seul terrain de chasse à chaque tour.

es-ES.name: Zona de caza: Biblioteca
es-ES.card_text:
Lugar único. Zona de caza.
Durante tu fase de enderezamiento, un vampiro preparado que controles puede ganar 1 de sangre. Un vampiro puede ganar sangre de sólo una zona de caza por turno.

card_text:
Unique location. Hunting ground.
During your unlock phase, a ready vampire you control can gain 1 blood. A vampire can gain blood from only one hunting ground each turn.
name: Library Hunting Ground

fr-FR.name: Faveur à vie
fr-FR.card_text:
Hors-tour. Faveur.
Donnez des points de réserve à un Mathusalem qui n'a plus de points de réserve pour le garder en jeu et mettre cette carte en jeu. Durant chacune de ses phases de redressement, vous pouvez voler 1 point de réserve de ce Mathusalem. Vous gagnez tout point de victoire que ce Mathusalem devrait gagner à sa place, jusqu'à ce que vous soyez éliminé ou jusqu'à ce que vous ayez gagné 1 point de victoire grâce à cette carte. Brûlez cette carte après que vous avez gagné 1 point de victoire grâce à cette carte.

es-ES.name: Favor de por vida
es-ES.card_text:
Fuera de turno. Favor.
Dale reserva sanguínea a un Matusalén sin reserva sanguínea para mantenerlo en la partida, y pon esta carta en juego. Durante cada una de sus fases de enderezamiento, puedes robarle 1 de reserva sanguínea a ese Matusalén. Cualquier punto de victoria que gane ese Matusalén lo ganas tú en su lugar, hasta que seas eliminado o hasta que hayas ganado 1 punto de victoria por esta carta. Quema esta carta después de que hayas ganado 1 punto de victoria por ella.

card_text:
Out-of-turn. Boon.
Give pool to a Methuselah with no pool to keep them in the game, and put this card in play. During each of their unlock phases, you can steal 1 pool from that Methuselah. You gain any victory point gained by that Methuselah instead of them, until you are being ousted or until you have gained 1 victory point from this card. Burn this card after you have gained 1 victory point from this card.
name: Life Boon

fr-FR.name: Vivre en ville
fr-FR.card_text:
Triviale.
Ajoutez 1 point de sang à un vampire disponible.
fr-FR.flavor_text:
Je ne touche pas aux clients qui pourraient leur manquer, mais les solitaires font des proies idéales. Les trafiquants pensent que je pratique l'esclavage en dilettante.
Ingrid Galt, Anarch

es-ES.name: Vida en la ciudad
es-ES.card_text:
Nimiedad.
Añade 1 de sangre a un vampiro preparado.
es-ES.flavor_text:
Evito pagar a clientes que puedan echar en falta, pero los solitarios son un buen blanco. Los contrabandistas creen que, además, trafico con esclavos.
Ingrid Galt, anarquista.

card_text:
Trifle.
Add 1 blood to a ready vampire.
flavor_text:
I steer clear of paying customers who might be missed, but solos are fair game. The black marketers think I'm doing a little slave trade on the side.
Ingrid Galt, Anarch
name: Life in the City

card_text:
+1 stealth action.
[nec] Ⓓ Remove a vampire in any Methuselah's ash heap from the game and put this card in play under the control of that Methuselah. During this acting vampire's unlock phase, this acting vampire's controller can look at the hand of this Methuselah. Any minion can burn this card as a +1 stealth action.
[NEC] As above, but during any unlock phase.
name: Lifeless Tongues

card_text:
Electronic.
The bearer gets 1 optional maneuver during the first round of combat. You can move any aim card the bearer uses to this card, face up and out of play (even if it is canceled). The bearer can play an aim card on this equipment as if from your hand; it is then removed from the game.
name: Light Intensifying Goggles

card_text:
[cel] Additional strike (limited).
[CEL] This vampire may burn X blood to gain X additional strikes (limited).
flavor_text:
Celerity is never more admired
Than by the negligent.
William Shakespeare, "Antony & Cleopatra", act III, scene 7
name: Lightning Reflexes

card_text:
Master.
Put this card in play. As a master phase action, you may lock this card to search your library for a master: Discipline card and choose a ready non-Bahari vampire you control who has no blood. That vampire gains the Discipline card (if any) and 3 blood and becomes Bahari.
name: Lilith's Blessing

card_text:
[mel] Allocate 4 points among one or more Methuselahs. Successful referendum means each Methuselah burns 1 pool for each point allocated.
[MEL] As above, and choose any Methuselah. Successful referendum means the chosen Methuselah gains 1 pool.
name: Lily Prelude

card_text:
Unique location.
Lock to reduce the cost of an action card played by a vampire you control by 1 blood (this location is not locked if that card is canceled as it is played). Any vampire can steal this location as a Ⓓ action.
name: The Line

card_text:
[vic] Strike: burn the opposing ally or burn 3 blood from the opposing younger vampire. If the opposing vampire has no blood after strike resolution, combat ends.
[VIC] Play before range is determined in combat with a younger vampire. This vampire cannot strike this round. As his or her initial strike next round, this vampire may strike to diablerize the opposing younger vampire.
name: Liquefy the Mortal Coil

card_text:
Do not replace until your discard phase.
Burn 7 cards from the top of your library to gain 3 pool.
flavor_text:
How little you know about the age you live in if you think that honey is sweeter than cash in hand.
Ovid
name: Liquidation

card_text:
+1 stealth action.
This acting Samedi and all younger Samedi in your uncontrolled region each gain a blood from the bank.
flavor_text:
Dark hills at evening in the west,
Where sunset hovers like a sound
Of golden horns that sang to rest
Old bones of warriors under ground...
Edwin Arlington Robinson, "The Dark Hills"
name: Little Mountain Cemetery

fr-FR.name: Manoir vivant
fr-FR.card_text:
Tant qu'elle est en jeu, cette carte d'équipement représente un lieu et ne compte pas comme équipement.
Ce vampire reçoit +1 en morsure. Il peut brûler cette carte avant l'étape de manœuvre pour arrêter le combat. Un vampire ne peut en avoir qu'un seul exemplaire.

es-ES.name: Mansión viviente
es-ES.card_text:
Mientras esté en juego, esta carta de equipo representa un lugar y no cuenta como equipo.
Este vampiro obtiene +1 de sangrado. Puede quemar esta carta antes de determinar la distancia para terminar el combate. Un vampiro puede tener sólo un ejemplar de esta carta.

card_text:
While in play, this equipment card represents a location and does not count as equipment.
This vampire gets +1 bleed. They can burn this card before range is determined to end combat. A vampire can have only one Living Manse.
name: Living Manse

card_text:
Unique melee weapon.
Strength damage each strike. Imbued inflict +X damage each strike with this weapon. Using Cleave with this weapon will not burn this weapon.
flavor_text:
If you can't kill the damn thing, stop wasting your time.
Lupe "Cabbie22" Droin, Defender
name: Living Wood Staff

card_text:
Only usable when recruiting an ally.
[vic] If the action is successful, put this card on the ally and lock the ally. Actions that require Dominate [dom] or Presence [pre] do not affect this ally. This ally has -1 bleed and cannot use maneuvers.
[VIC] As above, but the ally is not locked.
name: Lobotomy

card_text:
Requires a ready Sabbat vampire. This equipment card represents a location and does not count as equipment while in play. Unique.
The Sabbat vampire with this location may move 2 blood from the blood bank to any other ready Sabbat vampire as a +1 stealth action.
name: Local 1111

card_text:
This action is at +1 stealth if it is undirected.
Put this card on any minion. Other Methuselahs' actions targeting this minion cost monsters an additional blood or life. If this minion is a monster, he or she burns a blood or life when he or she attempts an action or a block. This minion may burn this card as an action. A minion can have only one Lock.
name: Lock

card_text:
+1 stealth hunt action.
[pro] Hunt, and put this card on this vampire. This vampire can burn this card and 1 blood to get +1 stealth. A vampire can have only one Loki's Gift.
[PRO] Ⓓ As above, and burn 1 blood from any vampire. This vampire can burn this card as above, or can burn it during the polling step of any referendum to get +2 votes.
name: Loki's Gift

card_text:
Master: unique location.
Lock to give any minion +1 intercept for the current action.
flavor_text:
He... remarked that the smuts in London were not so bad as they used to be when he was a student there.
Bram Stoker, "Dracula"
name: London Evening Star, Tabloid Newspaper

card_text:
Master: archetype.
Put this card on a vampire you control. During your influence phase, if this vampire successfully performed an action this turn and none of your other minions attempted any actions this turn, he or she gains 1 blood from the blood bank, if he or she is ready. A vampire can have only one archetype.
name: Loner

card_text:
Requires an anarch. Only usable as the action is announced. If this action is blocked, apply the following effect (before combat occurs):
[dem] Lock a younger non-blocking vampire controlled by the blocking minion's controller.
[tha] Move 2 blood from a non-blocking vampire controlled by the blocking minion's controller to this vampire.
[vic] This acting vampire's hand damage is aggravated in the resulting combat.
name: Loose Cannon

card_text:
+1 stealth action.

card_text:

Unique master.

Unique.

Unlike you, I am Awake, I see the threads that spin all around you.

[for] [COMBAT] This round, this vampire treats aggravated damage as normal damage and Flash Grenades have no effect on this vampire.

[chi] Only usable after this vampire plays an action modifier that requires Chimerstry [chi]. Move that action modifier card from your ash heap to your hand (discard down afterward). Not usable if the action modifier was canceled as it was played.

card_text:
Master.

Whoever has the nerve, the willingness to sacrifice everything and anything, that person is most worthy of the obedience and respect of the others.

[dem] Strike: 1 damage. This damage cannot be prevented by equipment or cards that require Fortitude [for]. If the opposing vampire attempts to strike with a weapon this round, he or she does no damage.

Electronic.

[qui] Ⓓ Burn a hunting ground.

+1 stealth action.

Master: unique location. Hunting ground.

card_text:

Unique.

Toutes les structures politiques sont basées sur le pouvoir.

Única.
Pon esta carta en juego. Gírala durante la fase de votación de una acción política para darle a cada Lasombra que controles +1 voto.

Unique.

All political structure is based on power.

card_text:
Master: unique location.

card_text:
Master: unique location.
You may use a master phase action to move 1 blood from the blood bank to this card. Any Ventrue you control may move 1 blood to this card as a +1 stealth action. You may lock this card and burn X blood from it to give a Ventrue attempting to block a political action +X intercept. Any vampire can call a referendum to steal this card for his or her controller as a +1 stealth political action.

card_text:
Unique location.
Lock during any Methuselah's master phase to move 1 blood from a ready Giovanni or Laibon you control to your pool or from your pool to a ready vampire you control. Any Giovanni or Laibon can steal this location as a +1 stealth Ⓓ action.

card_text:
Master: unique location.

card_text:
Master: unique location.

card_text:
Master: unique location. Requires a ready Laibon.

Lugar único.

card_text:
Unique location.

Any vampire controlled by another Methuselah can burn all the counters from this card as a Ⓓ action.

Master: unique location.
Put 5 blood on this card when it is played. During each of your unlock phases, move 1 blood from this card to your pool. Any Sabbat vampire controlled by another Methuselah may move all the blood on the Powerbase to his or her controller's pool as a Ⓓ action. Burn this card if it has no blood.

Lieu unique.

Lugar único.
Durante tu fase de influencia, puedes añadir 1 de sangre a un vampiro de tu zona incontrolada. Cualquier vampiro puede robar este lugar con una acción (D).

card_text:
Unique location.
During your influence phase, you can add 1 blood to a vampire in your uncontrolled region. Any vampire can steal this location as a Ⓓ action.

card_text:
Master: unique location.
As a master phase action, you may burn 1 pool to move 3 blood counters from the blood bank to this card or move 1 blood counter from this card to your pool. Burn this card when the last blood counter on it is removed.

card_text:
Unique location.
You can use a master phase action to add 1 counter to this card. Any Giovanni you control can move up to 2 blood from themselves to this card as a +1 stealth action. Lock and burn X counters from this card during the polling step of a political action to get +X votes. Any minion can burn all counters from this card as a Ⓓ action.
name: Powerbase: Rome

card_text:
Master: unique location. Elysium.
You may lock any other unique location you control to end combat involving an acting vampire you control before range is chosen. Any vampire may steal this location for his or her controller as a Ⓓ action.
name: Powerbase: Savannah

card_text:
Master: unique location. Requires a ready Laibon.
Lock this location to reduce the cost of a card you play by 1 pool (this location is not locked if that card is canceled as it is played). Any Laibon may steal this location for his or her controller as a Ⓓ action.
name: Powerbase: Tshwane

card_text:
Master: unique location.
During your unlock phase, you may move up to 3 pool to this card and add 1 blood from the blood bank for each pool you move, or you may move 2 blood from this card to your pool. A vampire controlled by another Methuselah may move all the blood on this card to his or her controller's pool as a Ⓓ action.
name: Powerbase: Washington, D.C.

card_text:
Master: unique location.
While you have the Edge, any vampire you control may add 2 blood from the blood bank to a younger vampire in your uncontrolled region as a +1 stealth action. If that action is blocked, burn the Edge (before combat, if any). Any Methuselah may burn the Edge during his or her master phase to steal this card.
name: Powerbase: Zürich

card_text:
+1 stealth action.
[cel] Ⓓ Choose a card by name. Your prey must discard a copy of that card, if possible.

fr-FR.name: Précognition
fr-FR.card_text:
[aus] +1 en interception.

fr-FR.flavor_text:
"Une mémoire qui n'opère que dans le passé n'a rien de bien fameux", déclara la Reine.
Lewis Carroll, "De l'autre côté du miroir"

[aus] +1 de intercepción.

card_text:
[aus] +1 intercept.

flavor_text:

[aus] Unlock a younger vampire or an ally.

[abo] [REFLEX] Cancel a frenzy card played on this vampire as it is played.

[THN] As above, but with 1 additional life.

card_text:

[aus] Strike: dodge.

card_text:

[cel] Strike: 1R damage or use a ranged weapon strike. This strike cannot be dodged.

card_text:
Only usable if this Giovanni is about to enter combat with a Camarilla vampire, or is the target of a Camarilla vampire's directed action, or during the polling step of a political action called by a Camarilla vampire in the terms of which this Giovanni is chosen. Usable by a locked Giovanni.
End the action. (Do not lock this vampire if they are blocking.)

name: Proxy Kissed

[pre] Only usable during a bleed action. Burn 1 pool to get +1 bleed (limited).

[chi] Only usable by a vampire attempting to block. Cancel an action modifier that requires Chimerstry [chi] or Obfuscate [obf] as it is played.

[cel] Press.

card_text:
[aus] Strike: 1R damage. Any effect which would make damage from this strike aggravated leaves the damage normal instead. If this striking vampire is Black Hand, the damage from this strike is unpreventable.

card_text:
+1 stealth action.
[aus] Put this card on a minion you control. The minion with this card gets +2 intercept. Burn this card during your unlock phase.

Darkness and glory rejoicingly blending,

flavor_text:
...didst enter, wildly dancing, through
The doorways of my sense unlatched

Only usable when an ally or younger vampire successfully blocks before locking the blocker.
[pre] Cancel the current action and unlock this acting vampire. The blocking minion is not locked.
[dai] The block fails, and the action continues. The blocking minion cannot attempt to block this action again.

card_text:

card_text:
[pre] Ⓓ Bleed at +2 bleed.

card_text:
Requires a titled Sabbat vampire.

card_text:
Only usable at close range at the end of a round of combat in which this minion inflicted more damage at close range than the opposing vampire. Not usable by a minion being burned or going into torpor.

Only usable during a referendum.
[dom] Force a younger vampire to abstain. This can cancel that vampire's votes and ballots.

Pull the strings! Pull the strings!

card_text:

Wraith with 1 life. 1 strength, 0 bleed.

[cel] Maneuver.

fr-FR.card_text:
Seulement utilisable durant l'étape de vote d'une action politique.
[cel][pre] Choisissez un vampire qui a exprimé des voix ou bulletins durant ce référendum. Le vampire choisi est incliné et s'abstient (ceci annule les voix et bulletins du vampire choisi).
[CEL][PRE] Comme ci-dessus et le vampire choisi brûle 1 point de sang.

es-ES.name: Lengua de escalpelo
es-ES.card_text:
Sólo utilizable durante la fase de votación de una acción política.
[cel][pre] Elige a un vampiro que haya emitido votos en este referéndum. El vampiro elegido se gira y se abstiene (esto cancela los votos y papeletas del vampiro elegido).
[CEL][PRE] Como antes, y el vampiro elegido quema 1 de sangre.

card_text:
Only usable during the polling step of a political action.
[cel][pre] Choose a vampire who has cast votes or ballots in this referendum. The chosen vampire is locked and abstains (this cancels the chosen vampire's votes and ballots).
[CEL][PRE] As above, and the chosen vampire burns 1 blood.
name: Scalpel Tongue

card_text:
Unique mortal with 3 life. 0 strength, 1 bleed.
Scapelli may strike for 2R damage. Once each combat, Scapelli may press to continue combat.
name: Scapelli, The Family "Mechanic"

card_text:
+1 stealth action.
[nec] Move a minion card from your ash heap to the top of your library.
[myt] Search your library for a minion card (shuffle afterward), reveal it, and move it to the top of your library.
[MYT] As [myt] above, with an additional +1 stealth.
name: Scarlet Lore

card_text:
Ammo.
Only usable before resolution of a gun's strike. This gun inflicts +2 damage at close range and -2 damage at long range each strike for the remainder of this combat. No more than one ammo card can be used on a gun each combat.
flavor_text: Tara fired once, blindly, over the table and into the doorway. Her objective wasn't actually to hit anyone (though she certainly wouldn't mind), but to keep the thin-bloods back for another moment.
name: Scattershot

card_text:
+1 stealth action. Unique.
If this Nosferatu's capacity is 6 or more, he or she unlocks. Put this card in play. Whenever a referendum succeeds, you may lock this card to look at any Methuselah's hand.
name: SchreckNET

card_text:
[pre] Reduce a bleed against you by 1.
[str] The acting minion gets -1 stealth. [str] is not a Discipline.
[STR] As [str] above, and the action ends immediately (unsuccessfully) unless the acting minion burns 1 blood or life.
name: Scobax

fr-FR.name: Mépris d'Adonis
fr-FR.card_text:
Seulement utilisable durant l'étape de vote d'une action politique.
Tout Mathusalem exprimant (ou ayant un vampire exprimant) des voix ou bulletins contre le référendum brûle 1 point de réserve après dépouillement.

es-ES.name: El desprecio de Adonis
es-ES.card_text:
Sólo utilizable durante la fase de votación de una acción política.
Cualquier Matusalén que emita (incluso que tenga a un vampiro que emita) al menos 1 voto o papeleta contra el referéndum quema 1 de reserva sanguínea una vez se cuenten los resultados.

card_text:
Only usable during the polling step of a political action.
Any Methuselah casting (including having a vampire casting) votes or ballots against the referendum burns 1 pool once results are tallied.
name: Scorn of Adonis

card_text:
[ani] Strike: hand strike at +1 damage.
[ANI] As above, and this strike cannot be dodged.
name: Scorpion Sting

card_text:
[qui] Strike: hand strike or use a melee weapon strike and put this card on the opposing minion. The attached minion gets -1 strength (this does not affect the current strike resolution). Any vampire can burn this card as a +1 stealth action. A minion can have only one Scorpion's Touch.
[QUI] As above, and the attached minion burns 1 blood or life during their unlock phase.
name: Scorpion's Touch

card_text:
Requires a titled vampire.
Choose a vampire of the same sect. If this referendum is successful, put this card on the chosen vampire and unlock this acting vampire. The vampire with this card may enter combat with a vampire with capacity 4 or less or with an ally as a +1 stealth Ⓓ action.
name: Scourge

card_text:
Frenzy. Only usable against a vampire or werewolf.
[cel][pre] Strike: X-2 ranged damage, where X is this vampire's capacity minus the target's capacity or cost. If more than 4 damage is inflicted with this strike, ignore the excess.
[CEL][PRE] As above, with an optional maneuver.
name: Scourge of Alecto

card_text: During your discard phase, you can burn a vampire with capacity 2 or less, and your predator takes control of this card (even if you do not burn a vampire).
name: Scourge of the Enochians

card_text:
[dom] Ⓓ Bleed with +1 bleed.
[DOM] +1 stealth action. Move 2 blood from the blood bank to a younger vampire in your uncontrolled region.
flavor_text:
It's amazing how trusting these Camarilla bastards can be.
Jimmy Dunn, Pander
name: Scouting Mission

card_text: Choose a Methuselah. Successful referendum means each Methuselah burns 1 pool and the chosen Methuselah burns an additional pool.
flavor_text:
The Masquerade is unraveling as the mysticism of the mortals increases.
V.T., Vampire: The Masquerade
name: Screw the Masquerade!

card_text:
+1 stealth action.
Look at up to 3 cards from the top of your library and move up to 2 of them to your hand (shuffle and discard afterward).
name: Scrounging

card_text:
Only usable during a Ⓓ action against you.
[tha] +1 intercept.
[vis] As [tha] above, with an optional maneuver in the resulting combat if this vampire successfully blocks.
[VIS] Cancel an action card or action modifier card that requires Chimerstry [chi] or Obfuscate [obf] as it is played (no cost is paid).
name: Scry the Hearthstone

card_text:
Only usable when this vampire successfully bleeds a Methuselah.
[aus] Look at the next 7 cards in that Methuselah's library.
[AUS] As above, and if any of those cards are action cards that can be used to bleed, that Methuselah discards your choice of one of those cards.
name: Scrying of Secrets

card_text:
Unique equipment.
Only usable by a vampire with capacity above 5. This vampire can bleed at +1 bleed as a Ⓓ action. During each of your unlock phases, put a counter on this card if it has 3 or fewer counters. The first 2 counters each grant this vampire one level of Dominate [dom]. The next 2 each grant this vampire one level of Fortitude [for]. Remove all counters from this card if another minion gains control of it.
name: Seal of Veddartha

card_text:
Unique master.
Put this card in play. Lock during your master phase to make a ready non-titled, non-Anarch vampire you control Anarch.
name: Seattle Committee

card_text:
An imbued may burn only one Second Sight for the following effects each action.
Burn when a monster is acting to give this imbued +1 intercept for that action.
Burn when this imbued declares an action to give monsters -1 intercept for this action.
name: Second Sight

fr-FR.name: Deuxième Tradition : le Domaine
fr-FR.card_text:
Requiert un prince ou justicar.
+2 en interception. Utilisable également par un prince ou justicar incliné, même si de l'interception n'est pas encore nécessaire, pour brûler 1 point de sang pour se redresser et tenter de bloquer avec +2 en interception.
fr-FR.flavor_text: Nul ne peut mettre en doute ta parole en ton domaine.

es-ES.name: Segunda tradición: El Dominio
es-ES.card_text:
Requiere a un príncipe o justicar.
+2 de intercepción. También utilizable por un príncipe o justicar girado, aunque aún no se necesite intercepción, para quemar 1 de sangre para enderezarse e intentar bloquear con +2 de intercepción.
es-ES.flavor_text: Nadie podrá desafiar tu juicio mientras se halle en tu dominio.

card_text:
Requires a prince or justicar.
+2 intercept. Also usable by a locked prince or justicar, even if intercept is not yet needed, to burn 1 blood to unlock and attempt to block with +2 intercept.
flavor_text: None may challenge thy word while in thy domain.
name: Second Tradition: Domain

card_text:
Master: investment.
Put this card in play and move 2X blood from the blood bank to this card. You may use a master phase action to move 1 blood from this card to your pool. Burn this card when it has no counters.
name: Secret Horde

card_text:
Master: unique location.
You may draw a card each time you successfully bleed your prey. Discard to your hand size afterward.
name: The Secret Library of Alexandria

card_text:
Requires a Laibon.
Choose an ally or retainer. If the acting Laibon is a magaji, choose up to two allies or retainers instead. Successful referendum means the chosen allies and retainers are burned, and their controllers burn 1 pool (each Methuselah burns no more than 1 pool, regardless of the number of allies and retainers chosen).
name: The Secret Must Be Kept

card_text:
Master.
Put this card on a ready minion you control. If this minion is the target of a Ⓓ action while he or she is ready, you may burn this card to make the action fail. A minion can have only one Secret Passage.
name: Secret Passage

card_text:
Master: unique location. Haven.
Put this card on a minion you control. This minion cannot be the target of other Methuselahs' actions. Any Methuselah burns an additional pool when playing master cards on (or that target) this minion. Burn this card if this minion enters torpor. A minion may have only one haven.
name: Secure Haven

fr-FR.name: Séduction
fr-FR.card_text:
Seulement utilisable lors de l'annonce de l'action.
[dom] Choisissez un vampire plus jeune. Le vampire choisi ne peut pas bloquer cette action.
[DOM] Comme ci-dessus, mais choisissez n'importe quel vampire.
fr-FR.flavor_text:
Se relâcher est le secret ; s'abandonner à moi est le plus grand plaisir de tous...
Robbi Sommers, "Lilit"

es-ES.name: Seducción
es-ES.card_text:
Sólo utilizable al anunciar la acción.
[dom] Elige a un vampiro menor. El vampiro elegido no puede bloquear esta acción.
[DOM] Como antes, pero elige a cualquier vampiro.
es-ES.flavor_text:
Dejarse llevar es el secreto; renunciar a mí es el mayor placer de todos...
Robbi Sommers, "Lilit"

card_text:
Only usable as the action is announced.
[dom] Choose a younger vampire. The chosen vampire cannot block this action.
[DOM] As above, but choose any vampire.
flavor_text:
Letting go is the secret; giving up to me is the greatest pleasure of all...
Robbi Sommers, Lilith
name: Seduction

card_text:
+1 stealth action.
[tha] Ⓓ Put this card on one of your prey's vampires. If the vampire is a Follower of Set, he or she burns 2 additional blood when attempting an action; otherwise, he or she burns 1 additional blood when attempting an action. The vampire's special abilities cannot be used. Any vampire(s) may burn this card with two +1 stealth actions.
[THA] As above, but the vampire burns 2 additional blood when attempting an action; Followers of Set burn 3 additional blood.
name: Seeds of Corruption

card_text:
Only usable during the first round of combat.
[qui] Maneuver.
[QUI] Only usable before range is determined. Burn 1 blood to set the range for this round.
name: Selective Silence

card_text:
Unique melee weapon.
Strike: strength aggravated damage.
name: Sengir Dagger

card_text:
+1 stealth action.
[ani] Ⓓ Enter combat with a younger vampire.
[val] Ⓓ Enter combat with any minion. This acting vampire gets an optional press during this combat.
[VAL] As [val] above, and this acting vampire gets an optional maneuver during this combat.
name: Sense Death

card_text:
Requires a vampire with capacity above 6.
[ani] +1 intercept.
[ANI] Only usable by a locked vampire. This vampire unlocks and attempts to block.
name: Sense the Savage Way

card_text:
[aus] Only usable when a younger vampire is acting. +1 intercept.
[dai] +1 intercept. +2 intercept if the acting minion has a corruption counter.
[DAI] Only usable during a bleed action. +2 bleed (limited). Minions with corruption counters get -1 intercept when attempting to block this action.
name: Sense the Sin

card_text:
Master: trifle.
Put this card on a Laibon with Auspex [aus]. This Laibon with Auspex may lock this card during a referendum to get 1 additional vote. A vampire can have only one Sense Vibrations.
name: Sense Vibrations

card_text:
+1 stealth action.
[for] This vampire gains 2 blood.
[val] Rescue a vampire from torpor.
[VAL] As [val] above, and the rescued vampire gains 1 blood.
flavor_text:
It's not death if you refuse it. It is if you accept it.
James O'Barr, "The Crow"
name: Sense Vitality

card_text:
[chi] Ⓓ Burn any retainer or put this card on any ally. The minion with this card does not unlock as normal during the unlock phase as long as the acting vampire remains in play.
[CHI] As above, but put this card on any vampire in play.
name: Sensory Deprivation

card_text:
[chi] Ⓓ Put this card on a ready minion. You still control this card. The minion with this card may not act or block. Burn this card during the minion's controller's discard phase.
[CHI] As above, but burn this card during your next unlock phase.
flavor_text:
I have said that Danforth refused to tell me what final horror had made him scream out so insanely...
H.P. Lovecraft, "At the Mountains of Madness"
name: Sensory Overload

card_text:
Requires a Black Hand vampire.
Choose a non-Seraph Black Hand vampire with a capacity above 5. If this referendum is successful, put this card on the chosen vampire. That Black Hand vampire gains 2 blood and is a Seraph. Non-Sabbat vampires cannot cast votes or ballots in this referendum.
name: Seraph

card_text:
Requires a ready Seraph. Only usable when a non-Seraph Black Hand vampire is acting, after resolution.
Unlock the acting Black Hand vampire. A Seraph may play only one Seraph's Second each turn.
name: Seraph's Second

card_text:
Only usable as the action is announced.
[tha] The acting vampire gets +1 strength this action.
[THA] As above, but with +2 strength.
name: Serenading the Kami

card_text:
Master.
Move any amount of blood from one of your ready vampires to any combination of your other ready vampires.
name: Sermon of Caine

card_text:
[pre][ser] Strike: combat ends.
[PRE][SER] As above, and if the range is close, this vampire burns 1 blood to put this card on the opposing minion and lock him or her. The attached minion does not unlock as normal. Burn this card during his or her unlock phase.
name: Serpent's Numbing Kiss

card_text:
Discipline.
Put this card on a vampire. This vampire gets +1 level of Serpentis [ser] and +1 capacity. Cannot be put on a vampire with superior Serpentis [SER].
name: Serpentis

card_text:
Master.
Put this card on a ready vampire you control. After any Methuselah plays a Gehenna card, you may draw two additional cards from your library if this vampire is ready. Discard down to your hand size afterward. A vampire can have only one Servitor of Irad.
flavor_text:
There will come a time when an Elder Darkness will stir deep below a city which has forgotten and will surprise the Elder, its children.
The Book of Nod
name: Servitor of Irad

card_text:
[ser] Only usable if this vampire blocks an employ retainer action, before block resolution. This action is successful (and the cost is paid), but this vampire steals the retainer and combat does not occur.
[SER] Only usable if this vampire blocks a recruit ally action, before block resolution. This action is successful (and the cost is paid), but this vampire steals the ally and combat does not occur.
name: Set's Call

card_text:
+1 stealth action.
[ser] Ⓓ Burn an ally or retainer controlled by any Methuselah to put this card in play; it becomes an animal ally with 3 life, 2 strength and 0 bleed. This ally cannot play action cards and cannot have or use equipment or retainers.
[SER] As above, but burn a vampire with capacity 2 or less to put this card in play.
name: Set's Curse

card_text:
Unique Nod fragment.
+2 hand size. Any vampire can steal this equipment as a Ⓓ action.
name: Shaal Fragment

card_text:
Unique equipment.
Before range is chosen in a round of combat, you may put the Shackles on any minion opposing the vampire with this card; you still controls this card, however. Combat ends. The Shackled minion does not unlock as normal during his or her unlock phases; he or she burns 2 blood during each of your unlock phases. Any minion may burn this card as a Ⓓ action.
name: Shackles of Enkidu

card_text:
Demon with 2 life.
[obt] Shade inflicts 1 damage on the opposing minion each round of combat during normal strike resolution at close range.
[OBT] As above, but Shade has 3 life.
flavor_text:
Yet even your darkest shade a canvas forms
Whereon my eye must multiply in swarms
Familiar looks of shapes no longer there.
Charles Baudelaire, "Obsession"
name: Shade

fr-FR.name: Corps d'ombre
fr-FR.card_text:
[obt] Frapper : fin de combat.
[OBT] Comme ci-dessus et si ce vampire a été bloqué en effectuant une action ni politique ni de morsure, l'action continue comme si elle n'avait pas été bloquée.
fr-FR.flavor_text:
L'ombre troublante de quelque invisible puissance
flotte, bien qu'invisible, parmi nous
Percy Bysshe Shelley, "Hymne à la beauté intellectuelle"

es-ES.name: Cuerpo sombrío
es-ES.card_text:
[obt] Ataque: el combate termina.
[OBT] Como antes, y si este vampiro fue bloqueado mientras realizaba una acción que no era de sangrado ni política, la acción continúa como si no hubiera sido bloqueada.
es-ES.flavor_text:
La abrumadora sombra de algún poder no visto
Entre nosotros flota, aun sin verse.
Percy Bysshe Shelley, "Himno a la belleza intelectual"

card_text:
[obt] Strike: combat ends.
[OBT] As above, and if this vampire was blocked while performing a non-bleed non-political action, the action continues as if unblocked.
flavor_text:
The awful shadow of some unseen Power
Floats, tho' unseen, amongst us.
Percy Bysshe Shelley, "Hymn to Intellectual Beauty"
name: Shadow Body

card_text:
[obf][pot] [COMBAT] Maneuver, only usable to get to close range, or press, only usable to continue combat.
[OBF][POT] [ACTION MODIFIER] Only usable after a combat resulting from a block. Not usable if the blocking minion is ready. This vampire burns 1 blood to continue the action as if unblocked.
name: Shadow Boxing

card_text:
Changeling with 3 life. 1 strength, 1 bleed.
When the Satyr enters play, you can put a combat card from your hand on him. Once each combat, the Satyr can use the ability of that card as if played from your hand. If the card requires a vampire (e.g., costs blood or requires a Discipline), he can use it as a vampire with the basic level of 1 of the Discipline(s) (if any).
name: Shadow Court Satyr

card_text:
Only usable before range is determined.
[cel][obf] This vampire gets first strike this round.
[CEL][OBF] As above, and this vampire's strikes cannot be dodged this round.
name: Shadow Feint

card_text:
[dom] Ⓓ Move a card played by another Methuselah on an ally in your ready region to another ally.
[val] As [dom] above, or move a card played by another Methuselah on a vampire in your ready region to another minion on whom the card could be played. That minion cannot be a vampire older than the vampire with the card.
[VAL] As [val] above, and this action is at +1 stealth.
name: Shadow of Taint

card_text:
[pro] Put this card on the acting vampire. The vampire with this card gets an optional maneuver each combat. A vampire may have only one Shadow of the Beast.
[PRO] As above, and this vampire gets an optional press each combat.
name: Shadow of the Beast

card_text:
Only usable before range is chosen.
[pro] This vampire gets an additional strike (limited) with +1 strength during this round of combat.
[PRO] As above, with an optional press.
name: Shadow of the Wolf

card_text:
Only usable at long range.
[obt] Strike: 3R damage.
[OBT] Strike: 4R damage.
name: Shadow Parasite

fr-FR.name: Jeu d'ombres
fr-FR.card_text:
[obt] +1 en discrétion.
[OBT] +2 en discrétion.
fr-FR.flavor_text:
Tu fermeras l'œil, pour ne point voir, par la glace,
Grimacer les ombres des soirs
Arthur Rimbaud, "Rêvé pour l'hiver"

es-ES.name: Juego de sombras
es-ES.card_text:
[obt] +1 de sigilo.
[OBT] +2 de sigilo.
es-ES.flavor_text:
Cerrarás los ojos
para no mirar por los cristales
la noche y sus negras muecas.
Arthur Rimbaud, "Sueño para el invierno"

card_text:
[obt] +1 stealth.
[OBT] +2 stealth.
flavor_text:
You will close your eyes,
in order not to see, through the glass,
The evening shadows making faces.
Arthur Rimbaud, "A Dream for Winter"
name: Shadow Play

card_text:
[obt] Maneuver.
[OBT] Only usable before range is determined. Burn 2 blood to set the range for this round.
name: Shadow Step

card_text:
[obt] Strike: strength ranged damage, with 1 optional maneuver.
[OBT] As above, with 1 optional press.
name: Shadow Strike

card_text:
+1 stealth action.
[obt] Ⓓ Inflict 1 unpreventable damage on any minion or retainer.
[OBT] As above, and put this card on the target minion; you still control this card. The attached minion gets -1 stealth. Burn this card during your unlock phase.
name: Shadow Twin

card_text:
+1 stealth action.
[aus][obt] Ⓓ Put this card on an ally or younger vampire. The attached minion gets -2 intercept and cannot perform directed actions or use ranged strikes. Any minion can burn this card as a +1 stealth action.
[AUS][OBT] As above, and the action to burn this card costs 1 additional blood or life.
name: Shadowed Eyes

card_text:
Master.
Put this card on a Black Hand vampire. This Black Hand vampire can enter combat with any younger non-Black Hand vampire as a Ⓓ action. A vampire can have only one Shakar.
flavor_text:
Ar-Rashid said, A true assassin has no ego, which is well, for he receives no glory.
The Admonitions
name: Shakar

card_text:
Unique contract. Trifle. Requires a Black Hand vampire.
Put this card on a ready minion. Every Black Hand vampire is considered chosen for this contract. Any Black Hand vampire can enter combat with this minon as a +1 stealth Ⓓ action. Burn this card if this minion is not ready.
name: Shakar: the Hunt

card_text:
Unique mage with 2 life. Requires a ready Laibon.
This Laibon has +1 intercept. When acting, this Laibon can shuffle this retainer back into his owner's library to get +1 stealth.
name: Shaman

card_text:
Zombie with 3 life. 0 strength, 0 bleed.
[nec] After this ally enters play, remove an ally or vampire in your ash heap from the game or burn this ally. This ally gets +1 strength for each life it has. This ally can enter combat with a minion as a Ⓓ action. It cannot gain life (instead, any life it would gain goes to the blood bank).
[NEC] As above, but this ally has 4 life.
name: Shambling Hordes

card_text:
[COMBAT] [2 CONVICTION] Only usable before strikes are chosen.
Burn this card. The opposing monster takes an amount of damage equal to his or her strength, then combat ends. Not usable on an infernal minion, a vampire with capacity above 7, nor a vampire who has Memories of Mortality or Humanitas.
flavor_text:
All honor's wounds are self-inflicted.
Andrew Carnegie
name: Shame

card_text:
Master: unique location. Hunting ground.
During your unlock phase, you may move 1 blood from the blood bank to a ready vampire you control. A vampire can gain blood from only one hunting ground card each turn.
flavor_text:
The desperate no longer care when death stalks their streets. Some think of it as a blessing.
Nigel the Shunned, Nosferatu antitribu
name: Shanty Town Hunting Ground

card_text:
[pro] [COMBAT] Cancel a combat card requiring Obtenebration [obt], Protean [pro] or Vicissitude [vic] as it is played, and its cost is not paid. The opposing minion cannot play that card again this action.
[PRO] [REACTION] As above, but cancel an action modifier card requiring any of those Disciplines.
name: Shape Mastery

card_text:
[chi] Choose one or two allies or younger vampires controlled by your predator and/or prey. The chosen minions cannot block or cast votes or ballots for the rest of the current minion phase.
[CHI] As above, but choose three allies or younger vampires.
name: Shared Nightmare

card_text:
Only usable by a ready vampire not involved in combat.
[for] Choose a vampire in combat. For the remainder of combat, that vampire may play cards that require Fortitude [for] as if he or she has the basic level of Fortitude.
[FOR] As above, but the chosen vampire may play cards as if he or she has the superior level of Fortitude [FOR].
name: Shared Strength

card_text:
+1 stealth action. Requires an infernal Baali with capacity 9 or more.
Put this card on this Baali. A vampire with capacity 6 or more can burn the Edge to burn this card as a Ⓓ action. If this Baali has three Shatter the Gate, burn them all to give each other Methuselah 1 shattered counter. A Methuselah with any shattered counters burns 3 pool during their unlock phase.
name: Shatter the Gate

card_text:
Only usable when this vampire successfully blocks an ally or younger vampire bleeding you.
[dem] Put this card on the acting minion and end the action (with no combat). The minion with this card gets -1 bleed. He or she may burn it as an action that costs 1 blood. A minion may have only one Shattered Mirror.
[DEM] As above, and this reacting vampire doesn't lock for successfully blocking the action.
name: Shattered Mirror

card_text:
Requires an anarch.
[chi] +1 stealth action. Ⓓ Look at another Methuselah's hand and discard a card from it.
[dem] +2 stealth action. Burn an event (undirected, no matter who controls the event).
[pro] Ⓓ Inflict 2 unpreventable damage on a ready minion.
name: Shattering

card_text:
[pot] Strike: destroy equipment.
[POT] Strike: destroy equipment with first strike.
name: Shattering Blow

card_text:
[pro] Ⓓ Inflict 1 unpreventable damage on an ally or retainer.
[mel] Ⓓ Discard a Shattering Crescendo to inflict 2 unpreventable damage on each of up to 2 minions controlled by a single Methuselah.
[MEL] As [mel] above, but for 3 unpreventable damage each.
name: Shattering Crescendo

card_text: This vampire gains 4 blood. Put this card on this vampire. This vampire does not unlock as normal. Burn this card during your unlock phase.
flavor_text:
No more be griev'd at that which thou has done:
Roses have thorns, and silver fountains mud,
Clouds and eclipses stain both moon and sun,
And loathsome canker lives in sweetest bud.
Shakespeare, "Sonnet 35"
name: Sheepdog

card_text: Ⓓ Put this card on a ready unique non-wraith non-zombie minion who does not already have a Shell Break. If the attached minion is about to be burned, move this card to this acting Giovanni; it becomes a wraith retainer with 2 life who is immune to non-aggravated damage and whose employer gets +1 bleed and +1 intercept.
name: Shell Break

card_text:
Only usable when the action is announced.
[san] Lock X other ready Blood Brothers you control of the same circle as this one to give this Blood Brother +X stealth (even if stealth is not yet needed). If the action is successful, you may unlock one of those Blood Brothers.
[SAN] As above, but unlock an additional one of those Blood Brothers if the action is successful.
flavor_text: If you chase two rabbits, both will escape.
name: Shell Game

card_text:
+1 stealth action.

Put this card in play. Your hand size is one card larger. During your unlock phase, a True Brujah you control gains 1 blood from the blood bank. Any vampire can call a referendum to burn this card as a +1 stealth political action; in that referendum, you get one additional vote.
flavor_text:
Treat them as allies, but remember that the motivations of a snake are never truly known.
Nu, True Brujah, at the second 20th-century assembly.
name: Tabriz Assembly

card_text:
Only usable as an action to recruit or employ an animal is announced.
[ani] If this action is successful, the animal gets +1 strength (for an ally) or inflicts +1 damage (for damage-dealing retainers).
[ANI] As above, and the animal gets 1 additional starting life.
name: Tainted Spring

card_text:
Only usable if a vampire controlled by your predator is about to successfully hunt.
The hunting vampire gets +2 hunt this action and put this card on them; you still control this card. The attached vampire must burn 1 additional blood to announce a bleed action (if it is not canceled as played) against you.
name: Tainted Vitae

card_text:
Only one Tajdid can be played in a game.
Until the end of the game, the Blood Curse no longer prevents Assamites from committing diablerie.
name: Tajdid

card_text:
[abo] [REFLEX] Cancel a frenzy card played on this vampire as it is played.
[abo] Skin. Play when this vampire burns a minion. Put this card on this vampire and unlock him or her. This vampire may bleed an additional time this turn and gets +1 bleed and +1 stealth when bleeding. Burn this card during your discard phase. A minion can have only one skin.
name: Taking the Skin: Minion

card_text:
Skin.
[abo] [REFLEX] Cancel a frenzy card played on this vampire as it is played.
[abo] +1 intercept, and put this card on this vampire. This vampire has flight [FLIGHT]. Burn this card during your next unlock phase. A minion can have only one skin.
[ABO] As above, and this vampire gets an optional maneuver each combat.
name: Taking the Skin: Vulture

card_text:
Unique mage with 3 life. 0 strength, 0 bleed.
Talaq may strike for 1R damage. Talaq may play cards that require basic Quietus [qui] or basic Thaumaturgy [tha] as a vampire with a capacity of 3. Talaq gets an optional maneuver each combat.
name: Talaq, The Immortal

fr-FR.name: La tronçonneuse de Talbot
fr-FR.card_text:
Arme unique.
Frapper : 3 points de dégâts. Si son possesseur est disponible durant votre phase de redressement, cette arme inflige 3 points de dégâts qui ne peuvent être prévenus à un serviteur disponible que vous contrôlez. Son possesseur ne peut pas chasser. Son possesseur peut entrer en combat contre un serviteur en action (D) à +1 en discrétion. Son possesseur reçoit 1 poursuite (obligatoire), seulement utilisable pour continuer le combat durant le premier round et peut prévenir 1 point de dégâts durant chaque combat.

es-ES.name: La motosierra de Talbot
es-ES.card_text:
Arma única.
Ataque: 3 de daño. Si el portador está preparado durante tu fase de enderezamiento, esta arma inflige 3 de daño imprevenible a un siervo preparado que controles. El portador no puede cazar. El portador puede entrar en combate con un siervo con una acción (D) con +1 de sigilo. El portador obtiene 1 acoso (obligatorio), sólo utilizable para continuar el combate durante el primer asalto, y puede prevenirse de 1 de daño por combate.

card_text:
Unique weapon.
Strike: 3 damage. If the bearer is ready during your unlock phase, this weapon inflicts 3 unpreventable damage on a ready minion you control. The bearer cannot hunt. The bearer can enter combat with a minion as a +1 stealth Ⓓ action. The bearer gets 1 press (mandatory), only usable to continue combat during the first round, and can prevent 1 damage each combat.
name: Talbot's Chainsaw

card_text:
Melee weapon.
Strength+1 damage each strike. A Ravnos may use this weapon to strike: destroy weapon with first strike instead.
flavor_text:
Any tool is a weapon if you hold it right.
Ani DiFranco
name: Talith

card_text:
Unique master.
Put this card on a Gangrel antitribu you control. Damage from this vampire's hand strikes is aggravated. Ⓓ actions cost this vampire an additional blood. This vampire's controller may use a master phase action to burn this card.
flavor_text:
Their fatal hands
No second stroke intend.
John Milton, "Paradise Lost"
name: Talons of the Dead

card_text:
[abo] [REFLEX] Cancel a frenzy card played on this vampire as it is played.
[abo] Strike: hand strike at +1 damage. This combat, this minion cannot cancel frenzy cards nor press to end.
[ABO] As above, but strike: burn equipment.
name: Taming the Beast

card_text:
Only usable if a minion attempts to block.
[pot] Cancel the action and unlock this vampire. (The action is not blocked. Do not lock the blocking minion.)
[tem] As [pot] above, and take the action card, if any, back in your hand (discard down afterward).
[TEM] As [tem] above, and this vampire gets +1 stealth on their next action this turn.
name: Tangle Atropos' Hand

card_text:
Unique equipment.
This vampire can look at the top three cards of any Methuselah's library and burn up to one of those as a +1 stealth action that costs 1 blood. If that action is successful, this vampire unlocks at the end of the turn. This vampire gains 1 blood when a Gehenna event is played.
name: Tapestry of Blood

card_text:
Unique mage with 2 life. 0 strength, 0 bleed.
Tara can strike: 1R damage. Tara can burn an equipment on a Ravnos as a Ⓓ action; that Ravnos gains blood equal to the cost of the equipment, 1 blood instead if the equipment has no cost.
name: Tara, The Hollow One

card_text:
Aim. Play when choosing a strike.
The opposing minion may discard two combat cards [COMBAT] to cancel this card. If any damage from this strike is successfully inflicted on the opposing minion, he or she gets -1 strength this action, and you may destroy a weapon he or she has. A minion may play only one aim each strike.
name: Target Hand

card_text:
Aim. Play when choosing a strike.
The strike does +2 damage. The opposing minion may discard a combat card [COMBAT] to cancel this card. If any damage from this strike is successfully inflicted on the opposing minion, he or she cannot use any additional strikes or presses this round, and you may set the range for the next round. A minion may play only one aim each strike.
name: Target Head

card_text:
Aim. Play when choosing a strike.
The opposing minion may discard two combat cards [COMBAT] to cancel this card. If any damage from this strike is successfully inflicted on the opposing minion, he or she may use maneuvers or presses only if they require Obfuscate [obf] , Thaumaturgy [tha] or Flight [FLIGHT] this action. A minion may play only one aim each strike.
name: Target Leg

card_text:
Aim. Only usable as this minion chooses a strike. A minion can play only one aim each strike.
You can target a retainer on the opposing minion with this strike (instead of the opposing minion). Or you can target the opposing minion directly as usual, but if any damage from this strike is successfully inflicted, this strike inflicts +1 damage. The opposing minion can discard two combat cards to cancel this card as it is played.
name: Target Retainer

fr-FR.name: Cibler les points vitaux
fr-FR.card_text:
Visée. Seulement utilisable lorsque ce serviteur choisit sa frappe. Un serviteur ne peut jouer qu'une seule visée par frappe.
Si au moins 1 point de dégâts de cette frappe est infligé avec succès au serviteur opposé, il subit +2 points de dégâts de cette frappe et ne peut pas poursuivre ce round-ci. Il peut défausser deux cartes de combat pour annuler cette carte lorsqu'elle est jouée.

es-ES.name: Apuntar a los puntos vitales
es-ES.card_text:
Puntería. Sólo utilizable cuando este siervo elija un ataque. Un siervo puede jugar sólo una puntería por ataque.
Si este ataque inflige daño con éxito al siervo oponente, este último recibe +2 de daño de este ataque, y no puede acosar en este asalto. El siervo oponente puede descartarse de dos cartas de combate para cancelar esta carta al ser jugada.

card_text:
Aim. Only usable as this minion chooses a strike. A minion can play only one aim each strike.
If any damage from this strike is successfully inflicted on the opposing minion, they take +2 damage from this strike, and they cannot press this round. They can discard two combat cards to cancel this card as it is played.
name: Target Vitals

card_text:
Unique mortal with 1 life.
The minion with this retainer gets +1 bleed.
name: Tasha Morgan

card_text:
Only usable at long range.
[qui] Strike: 1R aggravated damage.
[QUI] Strike: 2R aggravated damage.
name: Taste of Death

fr-FR.name: Gorgée de vitæ
fr-FR.card_text:
Seulement utilisable à la fin d'un round de combat. Non utilisable par un vampire en train d'être brûlé ou d'aller en torpeur. Un vampire ne peut en jouer qu'un seul exemplaire par round.
Ce vampire gagne autant de points de sang que de points de sang perdus par le vampire opposé à cause de dégâts ce round-ci.

es-ES.name: Saborear la Vitae
es-ES.card_text:
Sólo utilizable al final de un asalto de combate. No utilizable por un vampiro que se esté quemando o entrando en letargo. Un vampiro puede jugar sólo un ejemplar de esta carta por combate.
Este vampiro gana tanta sangre como sangre haya perdido el vampiro oponente debido al daño en este asalto.

card_text:
Only usable at the end of a round of combat. Not usable by a vampire being burned or going to torpor. A vampire can play only one Taste of Vitae each round.
This vampire gains blood equal to the amount of blood lost by the opposing vampire to damage this round.
name: Taste of Vitae

card_text:
+1 stealth action. Requires a Seraph.
Put this card on this acting Seraph. This ready Seraph may lock this card to unlock another Black Hand vampire. A minion may have only one Tattoo Signal.
name: Tattoo Signal

card_text:
[ani] Ⓓ Enter combat with any vampire, with an optional maneuver in that combat.
[ANI] Choose a ready vampire controlled by your predator and another controlled by your prey (not usable when only one other Methuselah is in the game). The chosen vampires enter combat. If only one is ready at the end of that combat, he or she gains 4 blood.

card_text:
[aus] Reduce a bleed against you by 1.
[AUS] Reduce a bleed against you by 2.
name: Telepathic Counter

fr-FR.name: Distraction télépathique
fr-FR.card_text:
[aus] +1 en interception.
[AUS] Seulement utilisable si un serviteur est en train de vous mordre, après avoir renoncé à bloquer. Inclinez ce vampire qui réagit. Redirigez la morsure vers un autre Mathusalem autre que le contrôleur du serviteur qui agit (ce Mathusalem peut tenter de bloquer).

es-ES.name: Distracción telepática
es-ES.card_text:
[aus] +1 de intercepción.
[AUS] Sólo utilizable si un siervo te está sangrando, tras renunciar a bloquear. Gira a este vampiro reactivo. Cambia el objetivo del sangrado por otro Matusalén que no sea el controlador del siervo activo (ese Matusalén puede intentar bloquear).

card_text:
[aus] +1 intercept.
[AUS] Only usable if a minion is bleeding you, after blocks are declined. Lock this reacting vampire. Change the target of the bleed to another Methuselah other than the acting minion's controller (that Methuselah can attempt to block).
name: Telepathic Misdirection

fr-FR.name: Pistage télépathique
fr-FR.card_text:
[aus] Poursuivre, seulement utilisable pour continuer le combat. Si un autre round de combat a lieu, ce vampire reçoit 1 manœuvre optionnelle ce round-là.
[AUS] Seulement utilisable si les deux combattants sont toujours disponibles et que le combat doit prendre fin. À la place, démarrez un nouveau round.

es-ES.name: Rastreo telepático
es-ES.card_text:
[aus] Acoso, sólo utilizable para continuar el combate. Si hay otro asalto de combate, este vampiro obtiene 1 maniobra opcional en ese asalto.
[AUS] Sólo utilizable si ambos combatientes aún están preparados y el combate está a punto de terminar. En lugar de eso, un nuevo asalto comienza.

card_text:
[aus] Press, only usable to continue combat. If another round of combat occurs, this vampire gets 1 optional maneuver that round.
[AUS] Only usable if both combatants are still ready and combat would end. Instead, start a new round.

card_text:
Only usable during a referendum.
[aus] Cancel the referendum. If you played a political card to call this referendum, take the card back into your hand (discard afterward). Any votes and ballots cast are lost.
[AUS] Force a vampire to abstain. This can cancel that vampire's votes and ballots.
name: Telepathic Vote Counting

card_text:
Requires a ready titled Sabbat vampire.
Choose a Sabbat vampire. If this referendum is successful, put this card on the chosen vampire. This vampire is a Templar. He or she may enter combat with a ready vampire controlled by another Methuselah as a +1 stealth Ⓓ action. Any Sabbat vampire may call a referendum to burn this card as a +1 stealth political action.
flavor_text:
I don't have to kill anyone? Then why call for me?
Talley, The Hound, Lasombra
name: Templar

card_text:
Master: unique location. Hunting ground.
During your unlock phase, you may move 1 blood from the blood bank to a ready vampire you control. A vampire can gain blood from only one Hunting Ground card each turn.
name: Temple Hunting Ground

card_text:
[ser] Ⓓ Put this card on a ready vampire; you still control this card. During your master phase, you can add 1 counter to this card. During your minion phase, if the number of counters on this card equals or exceeds the amount of blood on the attached vampire, you can burn the counters to unlock and take control of them until the end of the turn.
[SER] As above, and this card comes into play with 1 counter.
name: Temptation

card_text:
Master. Requires a ready justicar.
Choose a vampire. Methuselahs may bid pool for control of that vampire. The winner pays the bid to the blood bank and takes control. Methuselahs may be credited up to 5 pool on the bid: winner pays 1 pool toward his or her debt during his or her discard phase until the debt is repaid. Only 1 Temptation of Greater Power can be played in a game.
flavor_text:
The Toreador's loyalty was easily won with cheap trinkets and even cheaper promises.
Gangrel, Newark 2002 Storyline
name: Temptation of Greater Power

card_text: Choose a ready unlocked infernal Baali you control. Add 3 blood to a younger infernal vampire in your uncontrolled region.
name: Tend the Flock

fr-FR.name: Forme ténébreuse
fr-FR.card_text:
[obt] +1 en discrétion.
[OBT] Comme ci-dessus et les serviteurs sans Obténébration [obt] doivent brûler 1 point de sang pour tenter de bloquer (les alliés ne peuvent pas brûler de points de sang).
fr-FR.flavor_text:
Soyez comme une ombre dans la nuit noire ; invisible, inaudible, qu'il n'y ait aucune trace de vos entrées et sorties.
Les Admonestations.

es-ES.name: Forma tenebrosa
es-ES.card_text:
[obt] +1 de sigilo.
[OBT] Como antes, y los siervos sin Obtenebración [obt] deben quemar 1 de sangre para intentar bloquear
es-ES.flavor_text:
Sé como una sombra en una noche oscura; invisible, silenciosa, no dejes señales de tus idas o venidas.
Las advertencias

card_text:
[obt] +1 stealth.
[OBT] As above, and minions without Obtenebration [obt] must burn 1 blood to attempt to block (allies cannot burn blood).
flavor_text:
Be as a shadow on a dark night; unseen, unheard, let there be no sign of your coming in or going out.
The Admonitions

card_text:
Unique master.
Put this card in play. Whenever a ready minion is burned or sent to torpor, his or her controller burns 1 pool. Any Methuselah can burn this card by discarding two master cards as a master phase action.
flavor_text:
Even the war ghouls look nervous.
Assamites, Seekonk 2002 Storyline.

card_text:
Requires a ready Laibon. Not usable if you control any ready non-Laibon vampires.
Reduce a bleed against you made by a non-Laibon controlled by your predator by 1, or burn a blood to cancel a card that would retarget a bleed to you played by a non-Laibon as it is played (no cost is paid).
