card_text:
Frenzy.
[ani] Only usable before range is determined on the first round. During this combat, the opposing minion cannot use maneuvers to maneuver to close range, cannot use presses to continue combat and cannot use equipment.
[ANI] Only usable before range is determined. Combat cards cost the opposing vampire an additional blood this combat. A vampire may play only one Terror Frenzy at superior each combat.
name: Terror Frenzy

card_text:
Mortal with 1 life. 2 strength, 1 bleed.
Terrorists may take a +1 stealth action to go through your library, find a Bomb, and equip them with it. Pay the cost to equip as normal. Reshuffle your library afterwards.
flavor_text: In times of war, the laws are silent.
name: Terrorists

card_text:
Unique equipment.
The vampire with this equipment has superior Daimoinon [DAI] and is infernal. Cards that require Daimoinon [dai] cost this vampire 2 less blood. During your master phase, if this vampire is locked, burn this equipment.
name: The Textbook Damnation

fr-FR.card_text:
Mage unique avec 2 points de vie. 0 en force, 2 en morsure.
Thadius Zho peut frapper à toute portée : 2 points de dégâts. Il reçoit 1 manœuvre optionnelle durant chaque combat. Il peut brûler 1 point de sang de n'importe quel vampire en action (D) à +1 en discrétion.

es-ES.name: Thadius Zho
es-ES.card_text:
Mago único con 2 de vida. 0 de fuerza, 2 de sangrado.
Thadius Zho puede atacar: 2 de daño a distancia. Obtiene 1 maniobra opcional por combate. Puede quemarle 1 de sangre a cualquier vampiro con una acción (D) con +1 de sigilo.

card_text:
Unique mage with 2 life. 0 strength, 2 bleed.
Thadius Zho can strike: 2R damage. He gets 1 optional maneuver each combat. He can burn 1 blood from any vampire as a +1 stealth Ⓓ action.
name: Thadius Zho

card_text:
+1 stealth action.
[dom] Put this card into play and choose a card you are contesting with another Methuselah. Your cost to avoid yielding the contested card is now paid by your prey. (You still decide whether you will yield.) Any minion may burn this card as a Ⓓ action.
name: Thanks for the Donation

card_text:
Master: Discipline.
Put this card on a vampire. This vampire gains 1 level of Thaumaturgy [tha]. Capacity increases by 1: the vampire is one generation older. Cannot be placed on a vampire with superior Thaumaturgy [THA].
name: Thaumaturgy

fr-FR.name: Vol de vitæ
fr-FR.card_text:
[tha] Frapper à toute portée : voler 1 point de sang ou de vie (convertie en sang).
[THA] Frapper à toute portée : voler 2 points de sang ou de vie (convertie en sang).
fr-FR.flavor_text:
Le sang, c'est la vie !
Le sang, c'est la vie !
Bram Stoker, "Dracula"

es-ES.name: Robo de Vitae
es-ES.card_text:
[tha] Ataque a distancia: roba 1 de sangre o vida (convirtiéndose en sangre).
[THA] Ataque a distancia: roba 2 de sangre o vida (convirtiéndose en sangre).
es-ES.flavor_text:
¡La sangre es la vida!
¡La sangre es la vida!
Bram Stoker, "Drácula"

card_text:
[tha] Ranged strike: steal 1 blood or life (becoming blood).
[THA] Ranged strike: steal 2 blood or life (becoming blood).
flavor_text:
The blood is the life!
The blood is the life!
Bram Stoker, "Dracula"
name: Theft of Vitae

card_text:
Usable by a locked vampire.
Unlock a gargoyle creature ally or a ready slave Gargoyle you control.
name: Their Master's Voice

card_text:
Master: unique location.
Locations cost you 1 less blood or pool.
flavor_text:
Money can't buy friends, but it can get you a better class of enemy.
Spike Milligan
name: Therbold Realty

card_text: Choose a ready Blood Brother you control. Move a unique Blood Brother of the same circle from your uncontrolled region to your ready region. Not usable if they would contest a card in play.
name: Thicker than Blood

card_text:
Only usable at close range before strikes are chosen. A vampire can play only one Thin Blood each round.
[qui] The opposing vampire burns 1 blood.
[QUI] The opposing vampire burns 2 blood.
name: Thin Blood

card_text:
Requires a ready non-sterile vampire of capacity less than 3.
Put this card into play; it becomes a 1-capacity vampire. This vampire is clanless and sterile. This vampire is not considered unique, must hunt this turn and is the same sect as the acting vampire. Cards that cost blood cost this vampire twice as much blood to play. During your unlock phase, you may lock this vampire to look at the top two cards of any Methuselah's library.
name: Thin-Blooded Seer

card_text:
+1 stealth action.
Add 2 blood to a Gangrel in your uncontrolled region.
name: Thing

card_text:
+1 stealth action. Requires a ready non-Sterile prince or justicar.
Put this card in play; it becomes a non-unique 1-capacity vampire of the same clan as the acting vampire. You may go through your library (shuffle afterward), ash heap or hand to find a Discipline card for this vampire. Move up to 2 blood from the acting vampire to this vampire. This vampire cannot take any actions this turn.
flavor_text: Thou shalt only sire another with the permission of thine elder.

card_text:
Gehenna.
After the end of a Methuselah's minion phase, each ready vampire he or she controls with capacity less than the number of Gehenna cards in play who did not hunt in that minion phase burns 1 blood.
flavor_text:
Night after night. Rising, hunting, killing, feeding. Nothing more than ambulatory corpses without the good sense to lie down and be still.
Felton, Tremere

card_text:
Requires a Laibon with capacity above 4. Only usable when the action is announced.
The acting vampire gets two additional votes in any referendums conducted during this action (even blood hunt referendums). Any younger vampire successfully blocking this action burns 1 blood (before combat, if any). If he or she cannot, the block fails and the action continues as if unblocked.

card_text:
Only usable before range is determined on the first round.
[dom] Opposing minion takes 1 additional damage in the first round of combat during normal strike resolution.
[DOM] Opposing minion cannot play any strike cards for the duration of this combat.
name: Thoughts Betrayed

card_text:
+1 stealth action.
Burn a card played by another Methuselah on a vampire you control. Lock that vampire.
name: Threading the Path of Orpheus

card_text:
Only usable during a bleed action.
[dom] +1 bleed (limited).
[DOM] +2 bleed (limited).
flavor_text:
As others might with tenderness
Rule your life and your youngness
I shall rule you with a fear.
Baudelaire, "The Ghost"
name: Threats

card_text:
Requires a ready unlocked Blood Brother of the same circle as another one you control in combat.
Only usable before range is determined. The range this round is automatically close, and the Blood Brother in combat gets an optional press, only usable to continue combat.
name: Three's a Crowd

card_text:
Master: unique location. Hunting ground.
Lock during your master phase to move a blood from the blood bank to this card. Lock during your unlock phase to move 1 blood from this card to your pool or to a ready vampire you control. A vampire can gain blood from only one hunting ground card each turn.
name: Threestar Cab Company

card_text:
[ser] Ⓓ Burn 2 blood from a ready titled vampire.
[SER] As above, and lock the target vampire.
flavor_text:
For there's no greater evil than a lack of leadership. That destroys whole cities, turns households into ruins, and in war makes soldiers break and run away.
Sophocles, "Antigon"
name: Thrones Crumble

card_text:
[pot] Strike: 1R damage, with an optional maneuver.
[POT] Strike: 2R damage, with an optional maneuver.
flavor_text:
Just be glad we aren't back in the days when most gates were made out of wood.
Angela Decker, Pander
name: Thrown Gate

card_text:
Only usable at long range.
[pot] Strike: 3R damage.
[POT] As above, with an optional press.
name: Thrown Sewer Lid

card_text:
[ani] Ⓓ Move 1 blood from a minion controlled by your prey to this vampire.
[ANI] As above, and put this card on the acting vampire. This vampire gets +1 bleed when bleeding your prey. Any minion may burn this card as a Ⓓ action. A vampire may have only one Tier of Souls.
name: Tier of Souls

card_text:
Weapon. This weapon can be used to strike only once each round.
[myt] Strike: 2R damage.
[MYT] As above, or strike: 1R damage, with 1 optional maneuver each combat.
name: Tinglestripe

card_text:
Requires a ready Sabbat vampire with a capacity above 6.
Successful referendum means you steal 1 pool from each Methuselah who does not control a vampire with a capacity above 6.
name: Tithings

card_text:
Master: unique location.
When this card is played or the controller of this card changes, the controller chooses a vampire in his or her uncontrolled region. For each blood counter you transfer to the chosen vampire during your influence phase, move one counter from the blood bank to the Tomb. At the end of your influence phase, if the total number of counters on the chosen vampire and on the Tomb equals or exceeds that vampire's capacity, you may move the vampire to the ready region. Burn this card (and the counters on it) when this vampire leaves the uncontrolled region.
name: Tomb of Rameses III

card_text:
[ser] Strike: steal 1 blood or life (becoming blood).
[SER] Strike: steal 2 blood or life (becoming blood).
flavor_text:
No matter what he hope or plan,
There is no moment left when man
Is not subject to the constant
Warnings of this odious Serpent.
Charles Baudelaire, "The Serpent's Tooth"
name: Tongue of the Serpent

fr-FR.name: Grand bal Toréador
fr-FR.card_text: Choisissez deux Toréadors disponibles que vous contrôlez, mettez cette carte en jeu et inclinez un des deux. Le Toréador incliné ne se redresse pas normalement. Les actions qui ne sont pas des morsures de l'autre Toréador ne peuvent pas être bloquées. N'importe quel serviteur peut brûler cette carte en action (D) ; les Nosferatus reçoivent -1 en discrétion durant cette action.

es-ES.name: Gran baile Toreador
es-ES.card_text: Elige a dos Toreadores preparados que controles, pon esta carta en juego, y gira a uno de los dos. El Toreador girado no se endereza normalmente. Las acciones que no sean de sangrado del otro Toreador no se pueden bloquear. Cualquier siervo puede quemar esta carta con una acción (D); los Nosferatu obtienen -1 de sigilo en esa acción.

card_text: Choose two ready Toreador you control, put this card in play, and lock one of the two. The locked Toreador does not unlock as normal. The other Toreador's non-bleed actions cannot be blocked. Any minion can burn this card as a Ⓓ action; Nosferatu get -1 stealth during that action.
name: Toreador Grand Ball

fr-FR.name: Justicar Toréador
fr-FR.card_text:
Titre.
Choisissez un Toréador disponible. Si le référendum passe, cette carte est mise sur le Toréador choisi pour représenter le titre unique de la Camarilla de Justicar Toréador. Durant ce référendum, chaque Toréador disponible reçoit +1 voix.

es-ES.name: Justicar Toreador
es-ES.card_text:
Título.
Elige a un Toreador preparado. Si el referéndum prospera, esta carta se pone en el Toreador elegido para representar el título Camarilla único de Justicar Toreador. En este referéndum, cada Toreador preparado obtiene +1 voto.

card_text:
Title.
Choose a ready Toreador. Successful referendum means this card is put on the chosen Toreador to represent the unique Camarilla title of Toreador Justicar. In this referendum, each ready Toreador gets +1 vote.
name: Toreador Justicar

card_text:
Only usable in combat with a Toreador, Toreador antitribu, ally or younger vampire.
[pre] Strike: combat ends.
[mel] Strike: combat ends, and if this vampire was blocked while performing an action other than a political action or bleeding, the action continues as if unblocked.
[MEL] Strike: combat ends, and if this vampire was blocked, the action continues as if unblocked.
name: Toreador's Bane

card_text:
Not usable during the first round of combat.
[nec] Strike: 1R damage.
[NEC] Strike: 1R aggravated damage.
flavor_text:
Suppose the yesterdays ate up our grand tomorrows?
If the old madness came this way?
Paul Verlaine, "Sagesse", Book One
name: Torment the Soul

card_text:
Only usable before range is determined.
[pot] This vampire has a strength of 2 for the remainder of combat.
[POT] This vampire has a strength of 3 for the remainder of combat.
name: Torn Signpost

card_text:
Gehenna. Do not replace until a vampire moves from torpor to the ready region.
Actions taken by vampires in torpor cost an additional blood. Rescuing an older vampire from torpor costs an additional blood.
flavor_text:
There is no after for us, and yet there is an after if kine survive.
Anonymous Malkavian, Das Buch von der Grabkrieg
name: Torpid Blood

card_text:
[cel] Additional strike (limited).
[CEL] Strike: combat ends. If this vampire was blocked while performing an action, the action continues as if unblocked.
name: Torrent

card_text: Only usable when the opposing vampire goes into torpor; not usable by a vampire going into torpor. Combat ends. You may look at the opposing vampire's controller's hand.
flavor_text:
To chase one's victim, to prepare one's plan minutely, to slake an implacable vengeance, and then to go to bed... There is nothing sweeter in the world.
Josef Stalin
name: Tortured Confession

card_text:
[dem] Ⓓ Put this card on an ally or a younger vampire. The minion with this card has -1 stealth. During this minion's unlock phase, add a counter to this card. Burn this card when it has 3 counters on it.
[DEM] As above, and the minion with this card cannot play action cards.
name: Total Insanity

card_text:
Usable by an acting minion or any ready unlocked minion.
[dem] Cancel a non-combat card requiring Dementation [dem], Dominate [dom] or Presence [pre] as it is played, and its cost is not paid. Lock this vampire.
[DEM] As above, but do not lock this vampire.
name: Touch of Clarity

card_text:
Only usable when a bleed against you is successful or a referendum passes. Play after resolution.
[pot] This vampire inflicts 1 damage on the acting minion. Only one Touch of Pain can be played each action.
[POT] As above, but for 2 damage.
name: Touch of Pain

card_text:
[aus] +1 intercept.
[mel] Give a minion you control (even this one) +1 intercept.
[MEL] Give a minion +1 intercept.
flavor_text:
As we stand on the edge of darkness
Let our chant fill the void
That others may know ...
Tibetan Book of the Dead
name: Tourette's Voice

card_text:
Unique location.
Lock after resolution of a successful action requiring Necromancy [nec] to gain 1 pool.
name: Tower of London

card_text:
Master. Requires a ready Sabbat vampire with a capacity above 4.
Burn a Sabbat vampire with a capacity below 4 that has been put into play since your last turn (not usable on a vampire that has been contested).
flavor_text:
Toy is a national treasure. We'd never let him go.
Preacher, Malkavian antitribu
name: Toy Chest Test

card_text: Play when the opposing minion burns blood or life due to damage. Put this card on the opposing minion. This Salubri antitribu gets +1 intercept when attempting to block the minion with this card. If the vampire with this card is Tremere or Baali, this Salubri antitribu can enter combat with him or her as a Ⓓ action. The minion with this card may burn it as a +1 stealth action. A vampire can play only one Tracker's Mark each combat.
name: Tracker's Mark

card_text:
Requires a prince, justicar, or Inner Circle member.
Choose a ready Caitiff. If this referendum is successful, burn that Caitiff.
flavor_text:
The tradition finally becomes holy and inspires awe.
Friedrich Nietzsche, "Human, All Too Human"
name: Tradition Upheld

card_text:
Master: archetype. Trifle.
Put this card on a vampire you control. Once per turn, when this vampire casts his or her votes or ballots against a referendum and the referendum fails, he or she gains 1 blood from the blood bank. A vampire can have only one archetype.
flavor_text:
We are stubborn, self-destructive conformists. Any other view of our species is just a self-congratulatory delusion.
Michael Crichton, "The Lost World"
name: Traditionalist

card_text:
Master.
Put this card on a Toreador. Lock that Toreador. The Toreador suffering the Tragic Love Affair does not unlock during the unlock phase. The Toreador's controller may burn 1 pool during his or her master phase to transfer this card to another Toreador. A Methuselah can burn the Edge to burn this card.
name: Tragic Love Affair

card_text:
+1 stealth action.
[ani] Ⓓ Steal an animal retainer controlled by another Methuselah.
[ANI] Put this card on this acting vampire. When this vampire is acting or in combat, cards that require Animalism cost other vampires an additional blood, and animal retainers employed by other minions lose their abilities. A vampire can have only one Trainer.
name: Trainer

card_text:
Only usable by a ready vampire not involved in combat.
[dom] Cancel a frenzy card as it is played (no cost is paid).
[DOM] As above, and the target of the frenzy card gets an optional press, only usable to end combat.
flavor_text:
Enough! Be seated and be quiet, both of you.
Don Michael Antonio Giovanni, Giovanni "Prince" of Las Vegas
name: Tranquility

card_text:
Unique master.
Put this card on a Laibon with at least three Aye and three Orun. During your unlock phase, this Laibon gains 1 blood. Allies and younger vampires must burn 1 blood or life to attempt to block this Laibon or to target this Laibon with a Ⓓ action. Burn this card if this minion is not ready or has fewer than three Aye or three Orun.
name: Transcendent Laibon

card_text: Successful referendum means you steal 1 pool from each Methuselah who has more pool than you do.
name: Transfer of Power

card_text:
[nec] Only usable after resolution of a successful action. Add 1 blood to a ready vampire.
[thn] As [nec] above, but add 1 life to a ghoul or 1 blood to a ready vampire.
[THN] Only usable after combat if this vampire is still ready and successfully inflicted any damage on the opposing minion during that combat. Put 1 transfusion counter on the opposing minion. If the opposing minion has 3 of your transfusion counters, burn them to steal the opposing minion. Only one Transfusion can be played at superior each turn.
name: Transfusion

fr-FR.name: Piège
fr-FR.card_text:
Seulement utilisable avant l'étape de manœuvre durant le premier round de combat.
Mettez cette carte en jeu avec 3 compteurs. Chaque fois qu'une carte est jouée durant ce combat, réinitialisez le nombre de compteurs sur cette carte à 3. Durant l'étape de poursuite de chaque round de ce combat, ce Piège brûle automatiquement 1 compteur sur lui pour fournir 1 poursuite pour continuer le combat (l'un ou l'autre des combattants peut poursuivre pour arrêter le combat). Brûlez cette carte à la fin du combat.

es-ES.name: Trampa
es-ES.card_text:
Sólo utilizable antes de determinar la distancia durante el primer asalto del combate.
Pon esta carta en juego con 3 fichas. Cada vez que se juegue una carta en este combate, restaura el número de fichas de esta carta a 3. Durante la etapa de acosos de cada asalto de este combate, esta /Trampa/ automáticamente quema 1 de sus fichas para proporcionar un acoso para continuar el combate (cualquiera de los dos combatientes puede acosar para terminar el combate). Quema esta carta al final del combate.

card_text:
Only usable before range is determined during the first round of combat.
Put this card in play with 3 counters. Each time a card is played this combat, reset the number of counters on this card to 3. During the press step of each round this combat, this Trap automatically burns 1 counter from itself to provide 1 press to continue combat (either combatant can press to end combat). Burn this card at the end of combat.
name: Trap

card_text:
+1 stealth action. Requires a ready magaji.
Put this card in play. When a vampire successfully takes a Ⓓ action against you, that vampire takes 1 unpreventable damage (after resolving the action). Any vampire may burn this card (and take no damage from it) as a Ⓓ action. A Methuselah may have only one Travelers Obey the Tenets.
name: Travelers Obey the Tenets

card_text:
Only usable during a referendum before any votes and ballots are cast.
[pre] If the referendum passes, the controller of the vampire calling the referendum burns 1 pool.
[PRE] As above, and any other Methuselahs who cast votes or ballots in favor of the referendum burn 1 pool when the votes are tallied.

card_text:
Unique equipment.
The Ravnos with this equipment gets +1 bleed. Once each combat, this Ravnos may dodge as a strike.
name: Treasured Samadji

card_text:
[dem] [ACTION] Unlock an ally or younger vampire.
[obe] As [dem] above, with +1 stealth.
[OBE] [REACTION] Cancel a card played by another Methuselah that would be placed on a vampire with Dementation [dem] he or she does not control. Usable even if there is no action.

card_text:
Master.
Put this card on a prince who has successfully bled you since your last turn. Each time this prince unlocks, he or she takes 1 point of damage (damage not preventable). This prince may burn this card as a Ⓓ action.

card_text:
Unique. Requires both Follower of Set and Tremere.

card_text: If this referendum is successful, each Methuselah burns X+1 pool, where X is the number of Assamites he or she controls.

card_text:
Unique master.
Put this card in play. Tremere get +1 stealth when attempting actions that require Thaumaturgy [tha]. Any minion may burn this card as a Ⓓ action; Malkavians get -1 stealth when attempting that action.

card_text:
Title.
Choose a ready Tremere. If this referendum is successful, put this card on the chosen Tremere to represent the unique Camarilla title of Tremere Justicar. In this referendum, each Tremere gets 1 extra vote.
name: Tremere Justicar

card_text:
Requires a Sabbat vampire.
Choose a vampire who cast any votes in the most recent referendum (must be since your last turn). Successful referendum means that vampire takes X damage, where X is the number of votes he or she cast in that previous referendum.
name: Tribunal Judgment

card_text:
Master.
Move 1 blood from each of your ready vampires to your pool.
flavor_text:
All these lives I will give you, ay, and many more and greater, through countless ages...
Bram Stoker, "Dracula"
name: Tribute to the Master

card_text:
+1 stealth action.
[chi] Move 1 blood from an uncontrolled minion in your prey's uncontrolled region to your pool or to a vampire in your uncontrolled region.

card_text:
+1 stealth action.
Ⓓ Put this card on a Ventrue who is not at full capacity. A Ventrue suffering Triole's Revenge must hunt once each minion phase as his or her first action. If the Ventrue hunts while at full capacity, he or she is burned. Any Ventrue can take an action to burn this card.

card_text:
Only usable during a bleed action.
[nec] Remove thirteen cards in the target Methuselah's ash heap from the game to get +1 bleed (limited).

[AUS][NEC] As [aus][nec] above, but for +2 bleed (limited).

card_text:
Master. Trophy.
When this card is moved to a vampire, that vampire gains 4 blood, becomes Sabbat and unlocks, or that vampire can choose to burn this card instead. The vampire with this card is Black Hand. If he or she was already Black Hand when receiving this card, he or she is a Seraph.

Master. Trophy.

You solve this problem for me... and I will join my voice with yours when it comes time to formalize our new structure.

card_text:
Master. Trophy.
The vampire with this card gets +2 stealth when attempting diablerie. Blood hunts cannot be called against this vampire. If this vampire successfully diablerizes another vampire, burn this card at the end of the action.

card_text:
Master. Trophy.
When this card enters play, choose a Discipline. The vampire with this card has the chosen Discipline at the superior level.
flavor_text:
They taught you to hear them dead people? Think you could teach me?

card_text:
Master. Trophy.
The vampire with this card has +1 intercept. Once each action, this vampire can burn 1 blood to unlock and attempt to block.

The Camarilla will formally acknowledge the supremacy of Clan Giovanni in Boston and its immediate environs.
Jacques Gauthier, Toreador

Master. Trophy. Hunting ground.

card_text:
Master. Trophy.
The controller of this vampire gets +2 hand size. A vampire may have no more than two Trophy: Libraries.

The greatest university of all is a collection of books.
Thomas Carlyle

card_text:
Master. Trophy.
Put 2 counters on this card. When the vampire with this card announces an action, he or she may burn a counter from it to make the action unblockable. Burn this card when it has no counters.

card_text:
Master. Trophy.
If this card would be moved to a non-sterile vampire, that vampire's controller takes control of it instead, and it becomes a non-unique vampire of the same clan as that vampire with 2 capacity. He or she may go through his or her library (shuffle afterward), ash heap or hand to find a Discipline card for this new vampire. Move 2 blood from the blood bank to this new vampire.

card_text:
Master. Trophy.
During your unlock phase, if this card is on a vampire, you may search your library (shuffle afterward) or hand for a retainer. This vampire employs that retainer (he or she must meet the requirements, if any). Pay the cost as normal. This is not an action.

card_text:
Master. Trophy.
The vampire with this card gets +2 bleed. A vampire may have only one Trophy: Revered.
flavor_text:
It is hard to free fools from the chains they revere.
Voltaire

card_text:
Master. Trophy.
While the vampire with this card is ready, he or she cannot be the target of other Methuselahs' actions.

Khalil Ravana, Ravnos

Master. Trophy.
When this card is placed on a vampire, put five counters on it. The vampire with this card can use these counters to pay some or all of the blood or pool cost of equipment. Burn this card when the last counter is removed.

card_text:
Unique master.
Put this card on a non-infernal mortal ally you control, or pay 2 pool to put this card on any non-infernal minion you control. Infernal minions cannot block or strike this minion. Burn this card if this minion becomes infernal.

card_text:
[obf][pre] Only usable during a bleed action. +1 bleed (limited).

card_text:
Requires a titled non-Red List vampire.

In this referendum, the chosen minion's controller gets 2 additional votes for every Red List minion in play. Any titled vampire may call a referendum to burn this card as a +1 stealth political action. Burn this card if the minion is no longer Red List.

card_text:
Requires a Black Hand vampire.
Only usable when a vampire who is not Black Hand is bleeding you. Reduce the bleed amount by 2.

card_text:
[ser] Only usable during a bleed action. +2 bleed (limited).
[SER] Only usable after resolution of a successful action. Unlock this vampire.
flavor_text:
A lie gets halfway around the world before the truth has a chance to get its pants on.

card_text:
[aus][qui] Ⓓ Bleed with +1 bleed. If this action is blocked, the blocking minion's controller discards 2 cards at random before block resolution. Those cards are not replaced until after this action.
[AUS][QUI] As above, but bleed with +2 bleed.

card_text:
Requires a ready non-Sterile Ravnos with a capacity above 4. +1 stealth action.
Put this card in play; it becomes a 2-capacity Ravnos with one level of Chimerstry [chi]. You may move a master: Discipline card from your hand to this vampire (pay cost as normal). This vampire is not considered unique, must hunt this turn and is the same sect as the acting Ravnos.

card_text:
Werewolf with 3 life. 1 strength, 1 bleed.
The Runner may play cards that require Animalism [ani] as a vampire and may burn 1 life to get +1 stealth. If he successfully bleeds, you may look at the target Methuselah's hand. A vampire stealing life from the Runner takes 1 damage for each point stolen. If the Runner has 2 or fewer life during your unlock phase, he gains 1 life.

aka: Tutu the Doubly Evil One (Bane Mummy)
card_text:
Unique mummy with 3 life. 2 strength, 1 bleed.
Once each combat, Tutu can strike: dodge. During your minion phase, Tutu can unlock. Tutu can steal an equipment from a vampire in torpor as a Ⓓ action. If Tutu is burned, shuffle him into his owner's library.
name: Tutu the Doubly Evil One

card_text:
Master.
Put this card in play with 4 counters. When you put a non-titled, non-Anarch vampire in play from your uncontrolled region, you may burn a counter from this card to make that vampire Anarch. You may burn a counter from this card to add a blood to an anarch as a master phase action. Burn this card when it has no counters.

card_text:
Master: unique location.
Lock to give a Gangrel antitribu you control +1 stealth.
flavor_text:
Now he goes along the darksome road,
Thither whence they say no one returns.
Catallus, "Carmina"

card_text:
[pot] Only usable as damage from a hand or melee weapon strike is resolved; only usable if this vampire inflicts 3 or more damage. He or she inflicts an additional point of damage. Only one Twisting the Knife may be played by a vampire during a strike phase.
[POT] As above, with an optional press.
name: Twisting the Knife

card_text:
Master: out-of-turn. Trifle.
Play when a minion controlled by a Methuselah other than your predator is bleeding you after blocks are declined. That minion is now bleeding his or her prey. The next card that would change the target of this bleed is canceled as it is played.

card_text:
Unique wraith with 1 life. 0 strength, 1 bleed.
Tye can burn a non-ready minion as a Ⓓ action; if that action is successful, you can move a library card from your ash heap to your hand (discard down afterward). He is immune to non-aggravated damage.

card_text:
Only usable before range is determined.
[ser] This vampire gets +1 strength this combat.
[pot][ser] As [ser] above, and this vampire can prevent 1 damage each round.
[POT][SER] As [pot][ser] above, with 1 optional press this round.
name: Typhonic Beast

card_text:
Master.
Put this card on a Nosferatu antitribu. The vampire with this card is no longer considered to be a Nosferatu antitribu. He or she is now a Pander, and any Nosferatu antitribu with a different controller may enter combat with him or her as a Ⓓ action. The vampire with this card may burn it as a Ⓓ action that costs 2 blood.

card_text:
[ani] +1 stealth action. Move 1 or more blood from this vampire to any other vampire.
[obe] As [ani] above, and unlock this acting vampire.
[OBE] Ⓓ Put this card on an ally or a younger vampire. The minion with this card cannot take actions, block or play reaction cards. During this minion's unlock phase, this card is burned unless this acting vampire burns 2 blood.

card_text:
Event. Do not replace as long as this card is in play.
During your discard phase, burn one other event at random. Any other Methuselah may use a discard phase action and burn X pool to burn this card, where X is the number of other events in play.

card_text:
Only usable when the action is announced.
[pro] This vampire's hand strikes inflict +1 damage, aggravated, until the end of the action.
[PRO] As above, but the hand strikes inflict +2 damage, aggravated.

card_text: +2 stealth. Not usable if any non-mandatory actions have been performed this turn.

I ran so fast that time and youth at last ran out,
I never stopped to think what life was all about,
And every conversation I can now recall,
Concerned itself with me, and nothing else at all
Charles Aznavour, "Yesterday, When I Was Young" (translated by Herbert Kretzmer)

card_text:
[for] Only usable when this vampire should go into torpor. Instead, this vampire gets an optional press,  will not go to torpor until combat ends but is still considered wounded and can be burned as normal. If three rounds of combat pass with no cards played, combat ends. This vampire is sent into torpor after combat.
[FOR] Prevent 2 damage.
flavor_text:
The cry is still, "They come!"
William Shakespeare, "Macbeth", act V, scene 5

card_text:
[pot] Strike: hand strike or use a melee weapon strike. This strike is at +1 damage.
[POT] Strike: hand strike or use a melee weapon strike. This strike is at +2 damage.
flavor_text:
Dead flesh isn't always subject to the mortal laws of physics.

card_text:
[obf] +1 stealth.
[thn] +1 stealth, and put this card on this vampire. During any action after this one, this vampire can burn this card to get +1 stealth.

Only usable during a referendum before votes and ballots are cast.
[aus][pre] Choose a younger vampire. That vampire abstains.

flavor_text:

card_text:
Animal with 1 life. 0 strength, 0 bleed.

card_text:

+1 stealth action. Requires a ready anarch. Choose a vampire in your uncontrolled region.

card_text:

fr-FR.card_text:
Seulement utilisable par un vampire incliné. À ne pas remplacer jusqu'à votre phase de redressement.
Ce vampire se réveille (il n'a pas besoin d'être redressé pour jouer des cartes de réaction et tenter de bloquer jusqu'à la fin de l'action).

es-ES.name: Despertar con frescura
es-ES.card_text:
Sólo utilizable por un vampiro girado. No la reemplaces hasta tu fase de enderezamiento.
Este vampiro se despierta (ignora el requisito de estar enderezado para jugar cartas de reacción e intentar bloquear hasta el final de la acción).

card_text:
Only usable by a locked vampire. Do not replace until your unlock phase.
This vampire wakes (they ignore the requirement to be unlocked for playing reaction cards and attempting to block until the end of the action).
name: Wake with Evening's Freshness

card_text:
Choose X ready Blood Brothers you control who belong to the same circle as this acting vampire (including this acting vampire). Each chosen vampire must burn a blood, or this card has no effect.
[san] Only usable as a bleed action is announced. Choose X ready Blood Brothers you control of the same circle as this Blood Brother, including this Blood Brother. Each chosen Blood Brother burns 1 blood to give this Blood Brother +X bleed (limited).
[SAN] As [san] above, but usable any time before the action is resolved.
name: Walk of Caine

fr-FR.name: Marcher dans les flammes
fr-FR.card_text:
Non utilisable durant le premier round de combat.
[tha] Frapper à toute portée : 1 point de dégâts aggravés.
[THA] Frapper à toute portée : 2 points de dégâts aggravés.
fr-FR.flavor_text:
Maintenant que vous voilà flammes, je vous dirai comment il faut brûler,
Et purger l'éther de vos ennemis.
John Keats, "Hypérion"

es-ES.name: Paseo por las llamas
es-ES.card_text:
No utilizable durante el primer asalto del combate.
[tha] Ataque: 1 de daño agravado a distancia.
[THA] Ataque: 2 de daño agravado a distancia.
es-ES.flavor_text:
Ahora que sois llamas, os diré cómo quemar
Y purgar el éter de nuestros enemigos.
John Keats, "Hiperión"

card_text:
Not usable during the first round of combat.
[tha] Strike: 1R aggravated damage.
[THA] Strike: 2R aggravated damage.
flavor_text:
Now ye are flames, I'll tell you how to burn
And purge the ether of our enemies.
John Keats, "Hyperion"
name: Walk of Flame

card_text: Flip a coin. If it comes up heads, this action is unblockable. If it comes up tails, the Malkavian antitribu takes one damage. This damage is not preventable.
flavor_text:
Those golden times
And those Arcadian scenes that Maro sings...
William Cowper, "The Winter Evening"
name: Walk through Arcadia

card_text:
Unique werewolf with 4 life. 3 strength, 0 bleed.
Walks-With-Might gets +1 intercept against Followers of Set. Master cards cost you 1 additional pool to play. Each strike or damaging effect made against him inflicts 1 less damage on him.
name: Walks-With-Might

card_text:
Master: unique location.
Lock during an undirected action to give a minion you control +1 intercept for the current action. Lock to select a minion you control. Once this turn, the chosen minion may move a counter from an investment card controlled by any Methuselah to your pool as a +1 stealth Ⓓ action.
name: Wall Street Night, Financial Newspaper

card_text:
[ACTION MODIFIER][REACTION] Only usable during a referendum. Usable by a locked vampire. This Akunanse gets an additional vote in this referendum.
[ACTION MODIFIER] Only usable when this Akunanse successfully hunts. He or she gains 1 additional blood.
flavor_text:
By coming and going will a bird weave its nest.
Ashanti proverb
name: Wanderer's Counsel

card_text:
Ghoul with 5 life. 4 strength, 0 bleed.
When War Ghoul enters play, burn an ally or retainer you control. She can enter combat with any ready vampire controlled by another Methuselah as a Ⓓ action. She may prevent 1 damage each round. Lock and burn War Ghoul to burn any location; you cannot use this ability during combat.
name: War Ghoul

card_text:
+1 stealth action. Requires an archbishop, priscus, cardinal or regent.
Ⓓ Put this card on a vampire who is not an archbishop, priscus, cardinal or regent. Any vampire may enter combat with that vampire as a +1 stealth Ⓓ action.
name: War Party

card_text:
[pre] +1 stealth action. Unlock a younger non-infernal vampire.
[val] +1 stealth action. Rescue a non-infernal vampire from torpor.
[VAL] Ⓓ Diablerize a vampire in torpor. Vampires cannot cast votes or ballots in favor of the blood hunt unless they are Baali, Tremere or Tremere antitribu.
name: Warding the Beast

card_text:
Master: out-of-turn.
Play on a minion targeted by a Ⓓ action to give that minion +1 intercept. Alternatively, play on a minion in combat. That minion gets an optional strike: dodge this round.
flavor_text:
The storm is coming, he tells me.
Calebros, Nosferatu
name: Warning Sirens

card_text: Choose a younger ready vampire. If this referendum succeeds, put this card on that vampire. Any ready vampire may enter combat with this vampire as a Ⓓ action that costs 1 blood.
name: Warrant

fr-FR.name: Le terrier
fr-FR.card_text:
Seulement utilisable durant une action dirigée contre vous (ou une carte que vous contrôlez).
+2 en interception, avec +1 en interception supplémentaire si ce Nosferatu est titré.

es-ES.name: Entramado de túneles
es-ES.card_text:
Sólo utilizable durante una acción directa contra ti (o una carta que controles).
+2 de intercepción, con +1 de intercepción adicional si este Nosferatu tiene título.

card_text:
Only usable during an action directed at you (or a card you control).
+2 intercept, with an additional +1 intercept if this Nosferatu is titled.
name: The Warrens

fr-FR.name: Gare de Varsovie
fr-FR.card_text:
Lieu unique.
Vous pouvez incliner cette carte lorsqu'un Nosferatu annonce une action non dirigée ; après résolution de l'action, si cette action a été réussie, redressez le Nosferatu qui agit. Vous pouvez brûler cette carte (même si elle est inclinée) pour déplacer un Nosferatu en torpeur vers la région disponible.

es-ES.name: Estación Varsovia
es-ES.card_text:
Lugar único.
Puedes girar esta carta cuando un Nosferatu anuncie una acción indirecta. Tras resolverse la acción, si ésta ha tenido éxito, endereza al Nosferatu activo. Puedes quemar esta carta (aunque esté girada) para pasar a un Nosferatu en letargo a tu zona preparada.

card_text:
Unique location.
You can lock this card as a Nosferatu announces an undirected action; after action resolution, if that action was successful, unlock the acting Nosferatu. You can burn this card (even if it is locked) to move a Nosferatu in torpor to the ready region.
name: Warsaw Station

card_text:
Master: unique location. Hunting ground.
During your unlock phase, you may move 1 blood from the blood bank to a ready vampire you control. A vampire can gain blood from only one hunting ground card each turn.
name: Warzone Hunting Ground

fr-FR.name: Rejet
fr-FR.card_text:
Hors-tour. Triviale. À ne pas remplacer jusqu'à votre phase de redressement.
Annulez une carte de maître lorsqu'elle est jouée par votre prédateur ou votre proie et son coût n'est pas à payer. Ce Mathusalem reçoit +1 action de phase de maître immédiatement, ou au début de sa prochaine phase de maître si la carte annulée est une carte de maître hors-tour.

es-ES.name: Eliminar
es-ES.card_text:
Fuera de turno. Nimiedad. No la reemplaces hasta tu fase de enderezamiento.
Cancela una carta heril jugada por tu depredador o presa al ser jugada, y su coste no se paga. Ese Matusalén obtiene +1 acción de fase heril inmediatamente, o al principio de su siguiente fase heril si la carta cancelada es una heril fuera de turno.

card_text:
Out-of-turn. Trifle. Do not replace until your unlock phase.
Cancel a master card played by your predator or prey as it is played, and its cost is not paid. That Methuselah gets +1 master phase action immediately, or at the start of their next master phase if the canceled card is an out-of-turn master.
name: Wash

fr-FR.name: Wasserschloss Anif, Autriche
fr-FR.card_text:
Lieu unique.
Durant votre phase de maître, un Tremere que vous contrôlez peut déplacer 1 de ses points de sang vers cette carte. Vous pouvez l'incliner durant votre phase d'influence pour déplacer tous les compteurs sur cette carte vers un Tremere dans votre région incontrôlée. N'importe quel serviteur peut brûler cette carte en action (D) ; les Malkaviens reçoivent +1 en discrétion durant cette action.

es-ES.name: Palacio del Agua Anif, Austria
es-ES.card_text:
Lugar único.
Durante tu fase heril, un Tremere que controles puede pasar 1 de sangre de sí mismo a esta carta. Gírala durante tu fase de influencia para pasar todas las fichas de esta carta a un Tremere de tu zona incontrolada. Cualquier siervo puede quemar esta carta con una acción (D); los Malkavian obtienen +1 de sigilo en esa acción.

card_text:
Unique location.
During your master phase, a Tremere you control can move 1 blood from themselves to this card. Lock during your influence phase to move all counters on this card to a Tremere in your uncontrolled region. Any minion can burn this card as a Ⓓ action; Malkavians get +1 stealth during that action.
name: Wasserschloss Anif, Austria

card_text:
Master: unique location.
Lock during your discard phase to move a card from your ash heap to the bottom of your library.
name: Waste Management Operation

card_text:
Requires a Black Hand vampire. Only usable when attempting to block a Ⓓ action.
+1 intercept.
flavor_text:
One who is prepared and waits for the unprepared will be victorious.
Sun Tzu, "The Art of War"
name: Watch Commander

card_text:
Master: watchtower. Requires a ready Seraph.
Put this card in play. You may use a master phase action to draw three cards (discard down to your hand size afterward). Burn this card if another watchtower enters play.
name: Watchtower: Chosen are Called

card_text:
Master: watchtower. Requires a ready Seraph.
Put this card in play. During your discard phase, you may lock this card to unlock any ready Black Hand vampire. Burn this card if another watchtower enters play.
name: Watchtower: Four Ride Forth

card_text:
Requires a Seraph. Watchtower.
In this referendum, each ready Seraph gets 2 additional votes. If this referendum is successful, put this card in play. Lock this card to move 1 blood from the blood bank to a Sabbat vampire in your ready region or your uncontrolled region (not usable during combat). Burn this card if another watchtower enters play.
name: Watchtower: Greatest Fall

card_text:
Master: watchtower. Requires at least one Gehenna card in play and a ready Seraph.
Black Hand vampires get +1 stealth and may strike for 2R damage. A ready Black Hand vampire you control may lock to cancel a Gehenna card as it is played. During your unlock phase, burn X pool or burn this card, where X is the number of Gehenna cards in play (minimum of 1). Burn this card if another watchtower enters play.
name: Watchtower: The Wolves Feed

card_text:
+1 stealth action. Requires a non-sterile Follower of Set with capacity 5 or more.
Put this card in play. It becomes a 1-capacity (non-unique) Follower of Set of the same sect as the acting Follower of Set and must hunt this turn. You can search your library (shuffle afterward), hand, and/or ash heap for a master Discipline card and put it on this new vampire.
name: Waters of Duat

card_text:
This is a +1 stealth action.
[dem] Ⓓ Lock an ally.
[DEM] Lock all allies.
flavor_text:
To see clearly is poety, prophecy, and religion -- all in one.
John Ruskin
name: Wave of Insanity

card_text:
Only usable before range is determined. A vampire can play only one Wave of Lethargy each round.
[qui] Cards providing maneuvers and/or presses cost the opposing vampire 1 additional blood to play this round.
[QUI] As above, and strike cards cost the opposing vampire 1 additional blood to play this round.
name: Wave of Lethargy

card_text:
Unique weapon.
Strike: 2R aggravated damage. Not usable against a vampire with Celerity [cel], an ally, or a retainer. Burn after use.
name: Waxen Poetica

card_text:
[qui] Strike: burn one Master Discipline card on the opposing vampire (Remove excess blood).
[QUI] As above, and the opposing vampire also takes one damage.
name: Weakness

card_text:
Only usable before range is determined on the first round.
[tha] Both combatants and each of their retainers take 1 unpreventable damage before range is determined each round. A vampire may play only one Weather Control each combat.
[THA] As above, but the amount of damage inflicted increases by 1 in each subsequent round.
name: Weather Control

card_text:
+1 stealth action.
Put this card in play in your uncontrolled region with 3 training counters. During your unlock phase, burn 1 training counter from this card. You can burn training counters from no more than two Web of Knives Recruit cards each unlock phase. After the last training counter is burned, move this card to your ready region; it becomes a 3-capacity (non-unique) Independent Assamite with Celerity [cel], Obfuscate [obf], Potence [pot], Quietus [qui] and 3 blood who is Blood cursed.
name: Web of Knives Recruit

card_text:
Master.
Put this card in play with 10 nightmare counters. Ravnos get +1 bleed and +1 strength and do not hunt as normal. A Ravnos may steal a blood from another Ravnos as a +1 stealth hunt action. During each Methuselah's unlock phase, he or she may move a nightmare counter from this card to a Ravnos. If this card has no counters, each Ravnos burns a blood for each nightmare counter or is burned, then burn this card and the counters. Only one Week of Nightmares may be played in a game.
name: Week of Nightmares

card_text:
Unique location.
+1 hand size. During your unlock phase, a ready Black Hand vampire you control can gain 1 blood. Any Assamite can burn this card as a Ⓓ action that costs 1 pool.
name: Weeping Stone

card_text:
[aus][ser] Only usable during a bleed action. +1 bleed (limited).
[AUS][SER] Only usable as a directed action is announced. After action resolution, if this action was successful, put 1 corruption counter on a minion controlled by (any of) the target Methuselah(s).
name: Weigh the Heart

fr-FR.name: Canne lestée
fr-FR.card_text:
Seulement utilisable avant l'étape de manœuvre durant le premier round de combat.
Mettez cette carte avec 5 compteurs dessus sur ce serviteur ; elle devient un équipement arme de mêlée qui peut frapper : force+1 points de dégâts. Pour chaque point de dégâts infligé par cette frappe (même prévenus), brûlez 1 compteur de cette carte. Brûlez cette carte si elle n'a plus de compteurs. Un serviteur ne peut en avoir qu'un seul exemplaire.

es-ES.name: Bastón lastrado
es-ES.card_text:
Sólo utilizable antes de determinar la distancia durante el primer asalto del combate.
Ponle esta carta a este siervo y pon 5 fichas en esta carta; se convierte en un arma blanca (equipo) que puede atacar: fuerza+1 de daño. Por cada punto de daño infligido por este ataque (incluso si es prevenido), quema 1 ficha de esta carta. Quema esta carta cuando no tenga fichas. Un siervo puede tener sólo un ejemplar de esta carta.

card_text:
Only usable before range is determined during the first round of combat.
Put this card with 5 counters on it on this minion; it becomes a melee weapon equipment that can strike: strength+1 damage. For each damage inflicted by this strike (even if prevented), burn 1 counter from this card. Burn this card if it has no counters. A minion can have only one Weighted Walking Stick.
name: Weighted Walking Stick

card_text:
Equipment.
During any Methuselah's unlock phase, you may look at the top card of that Methuselah's library. If that card is a master card, this vampire may burn 1 blood to burn that card.
name: Weirding Stone

card_text:
[pot] Strike: 4R damage; only usable at long range. Not usable first round of combat.
[POT] As above, with an optional press.
flavor_text:
We shall discuss your breach of the Masquerade later...
Tusk, The Talebearer, Nosferatu
name: Well-Aimed Car

card_text:
+1 stealth action. Requires a Laibon.
Put this card on this Laibon. If his or her capacity is 5 or more, he or she unlocks. Once each combat, this Laibon may prevent 1 non-aggravated damage from the opponent's strike. A minion can have only one Well-Marked.
name: Well-Marked

card_text:
Unique mortal with 3 life. 0 strength, 0 bleed.
Wendell can strike: 2R damage. He inflicts +2 damage with melee weapons. He gets 1 optional maneuver each combat. He can enter combat with any minion as a Ⓓ action. If Wendell has 2 or less life during your unlock phase, he gains 1 life. During your unlock phase, Wendell inflicts 2 unpreventable damage on a ready vampire you control.
name: Wendell Delburton

card_text:
Unique werewolf with 3 life. 3 strength, 0 bleed.
Werewolf Pack is not affected by damage from melee weapons.
flavor_text:
Has the red wolf trotted east and east and east,
Far from the far, far other end of the day,
To fear a few fangs?
D.H. Lawrence, "The Red Wolf"
name: Werewolf Pack

card_text:
[nec] Move a library card from your ash heap to your hand (discard down afterward).
[NEC] As above, and this is a +1 stealth action.
artist: Dave Roach, Pete Burges & John Kent
name: Whispers from the Dead

card_text:
Unique Master.
Put this card in play. Every Nosferatu burns 1 additional blood to unlock during his or her controller's unlock phase. Any Methuselah can burn this card by burning 1 pool and spending four transfers during his or her influence phase.
flavor_text:
And the bastard childer of Nosferatu still roam the dark places of the Earth hunting their favored cousins...
Tusk, The Talebearer, Nosferatu
name: Whispers of the Nictuku

card_text:
[abo] [REFLEX] Cancel a frenzy card played on this vampire as it is played.
[abo] Frenzy. Only usable before range is determined on the first round. During this combat, the opposing vampire cannot use maneuvers to maneuver to close range and cannot use presses to continue combat.
[ABO] As above, and this vampire gets an optional maneuver this round.
name: Whistling Up the Beast

card_text:
Transient.
During your next discard phase, you must burn this card, and you may either burn a vampire in torpor or, by locking a ready werewolf ally you control or discarding a White Nights Massacre from your hand, burn all vampires in torpor.
name: White Nights Massacre

card_text:
Weapon.
2R aggravated damage each strike. If White Phosphorus Grenade is used at close range, the minion with this equipment takes 1 aggravated damage. Burn after use.
flavor_text:
The sky is darkening like a stain;
Something is going to fall like rain,
And it won't be flowers.
W.H. Auden, "The Witnesses"
name: White Phosphorus Grenade

fr-FR.name: Panorama élargi
fr-FR.card_text:
Triviale.
Mettez cette carte en jeu. Vous pouvez utiliser 1 transfert pour piocher 1 carte de votre crypte et retirer ensuite une carte de crypte dans votre région incontrôlée de la partie. Vous pouvez utiliser 4 transferts pour brûler cette carte et gagner 2 points de réserve.

es-ES.name: Perspectiva más amplia
es-ES.card_text:
Nimiedad.
Pon esta carta en juego. Puedes usar 1 transferencia para robar 1 carta de tu cripta y luego retirar del juego una carta de cripta de tu zona incontrolada. Puedes usar 4 transferencias para quemar esta carta y ganar 2 de reserva sanguínea.

card_text:
Trifle.
Put this card in play. You can use 1 transfer to draw 1 card from your crypt and then remove a crypt card in your uncontrolled region from the game. You can use 4 transfers to burn this card and gain 2 pool.
name: Wider View

card_text:
+1 stealth action.
Put this card on the acting Ahrimane. This Ahrimane gets +1 strength and -1 stealth and gets an optional maneuver each combat. He or she cannot use equipment and cannot have retainers (any retainers on this vampire are burned). A vampire can have only one The Wildebeest.
name: The Wildebeest

card_text:
+1 stealth action. Requires a ready primogen.
Put this card on the acting primogen. During the referendum of a political action, this primogen can burn 1 blood to gain 1 vote. This primogen can burn this card to play a card that requires a prince as if he or she were a prince. This primogen can burn this card when a prince enters torpor to receive (and contest) the same title as that prince. A vampire can have only 1 Will of the Council.
name: Will of the Council

card_text:
[chi] Allocate X+1 points among one or more minions. Each point represents -1 intercept for that minion this action.
[CHI] Only usable as the action is announced. Choose X-1 allies or younger vampires. The chosen minions cannot block or play reaction cards this action.
name: Will-o'-the-Wisp

card_text:
This equipment card represents a location and does not count as equipment while in play. Unique.
The vampire with this location has superior Dementation [DEM]. At the end of your master phase, if you did not play a master card from your hand this phase, this vampire burns 1 blood.
flavor_text:
I am glad that it is old and big. I myself am of an old family, and to live in a new house would kill me.
Bram Stoker, "Dracula"
name: Winchester Mansion

card_text:
[tha] Strike: dodge.
[THA] Strike: dodge with an additional strike: dodge this round.
name: Wind Dance

card_text: [FLIGHT] Only usable when another minion you control enters combat with a minion without flight. Lock this minion. In that combat, this minion may make a hand or melee weapon strike (with or without a strike card) on the opposing minion during normal strike resolution (as if at close range). Dodge will avoid this strike, and damage prevention effects can treat this as a strike from an opposing minion. This minion may be the target of effects that inflict damage or steal blood as a retainer could be.
name: Winged Second

card_text:
+1 stealth action.
Put this card on this acting Akunanse. If this action is successful, unlock the acting vampire at the end of the turn. While this Akunanse is ready, your hand size is one card larger. A vampire may have only one Wise Spider.
flavor_text:
To travel is to see. To travel is to learn.
Hasani, Akunanse
name: Wise Spider

card_text:
[ani] Strike: 1R damage.
[thn] Strike: hand strike. Place this card on the opposing minion. The minion with this card has -1 strength. Burn this card during his or her controller's next discard phase.
[THN] As [thn] above, and the minion with this card cannot play cards that require any Disciplines.
name: Withering

card_text:
Master: unique location.
Lock to give any minion +1 intercept for the current action. If that minion doesn't successfully block the action, burn 1 pool after the action resolves.
name: WMRH Talk Radio

card_text:
[pro] For the remainder of the round, this vampire's hand damage is aggravated.
[PRO] Press.
flavor_text:
How cheerfully he seems to grin,
How neatly spread his claws...
Lewis Carroll, "Alice in Wonderland"
name: Wolf Claws

card_text:
Animal with 2 life.
[ani] When the minion with this retainer is in combat, the opposing minion takes 1 damage during strike resolution (if the range is close).
[ANI] As above, but Wolf Companion has 3 life.
flavor_text:
It is you -- my equal, my companion and close friend.
Psalms 55:13 (NLT)
name: Wolf Companion

card_text:
Melee weapon.
Strike: strength damage. If more than 1 damage is inflicted on an opposing vampire by this weapon in a given combat, that vampire is sent to torpor. In that case, this card is transferred to that vampire, and he or she doesn't unlock as normal during the unlock phase as long as he or she remains in torpor.
name: Wooden Stake

card_text:
Requires an anarch.
[dom] Ⓓ Burn half the blood counters on an uncontrolled minion in your prey's uncontrolled region (round down).
[obf] +1 stealth action. Ⓓ Burn a location.
[vic] Ⓓ Burn 4 blood from a ready, titled, non-Anarch vampire.
name: The World's a Canvas

card_text:
Gehenna. Do not replace until your next discard phase.
Requires at least one other Gehenna card in play. Put 10 counters on this card. Burn 1 counter whenever another Gehenna card is put in play. A vampire whose capacity is greater than X is treated as if his or her capacity is X (minimum of 1), where X is the number of counters on this card.
name: Wormwood

card_text:
Requires an Inner Circle member.
Choose a ready justicar. If the referendum is successful, put this card on that justicar. The justicar loses his or her title, and his or her capacity decreases by 1. (A vampire's capacity cannot go below 1.)
name: Wrath of the Inner Circle

card_text:
Equipment.
The vampire with this equipment is considered a Camarilla vampire.
name: Writ of Acceptance

card_text:
[dem] Reduce a bleed against you by 2.
[DEM] Only usable during the polling step of a political action. This vampire gets +4 votes against the referendum.
name: Wrong and Crosswise

card_text:
Master: out-of-turn.
Only usable when a vampire successfully hunts. Put this card on that vampire. During this vampire's minion phase, he or she must hunt, even if at capacity. Any vampire may burn this card as a +1 stealth Ⓓ action.
name: XTC-Laced Blood

card_text:
Master: unique location. Requires a ready Sabbat vampire.
When a political action is successful, before the referendum, lock this card and a ready unlocked Sabbat vampire you control to have that vampire enter combat with the acting vampire. If the acting vampire is still ready at the end of combat, the Sabbat vampire takes 2 damage, and the referendum is conducted as normal.
name: Yawp Court

card_text: Choose one or more Methuselahs who are not chosen for any other Year of Fortune in play. If this referendum is successful, put this card into play. Each chosen Methuselah gets +1 hand size. Any vampire can call a referendum to burn this card as a +1 stealth political action.
name: Year of Fortune

card_text:
Unique location.
If a ready Assamite you control is the target of a directed action or is chosen by the acting Methuselah in the terms of a referendum, you can lock this location to unlock the acting minion and have the action or referendum fail. Only usable as the directed action is announced or during the polling step of the referendum before votes and ballots are cast.
name: Yoruba Shrine

card_text:
Unique mortal with 3 life. 2 strength, 0 bleed.
The Young Bloods can burn 2 blood from a locked vampire with a capacity less than 8 as a +1 stealth Ⓓ action. If a vampire controlled by another Methuselah burns the Young Bloods in combat or as an action, he or she gains 2 blood.
name: Young Bloods

card_text:
While in play, this equipment card represents a location and does not count as equipment. Haven. Unique.
Lock as an action directed at this Lasombra is announced to have that action fail. Lock to give this Lasombra +1 stealth. A vampire can have only one haven.
name: Zaire River Ferry

card_text:
Only usable by a ready unlocked Ravnos other than the acting minion.
Allies and vampires younger than this modifying Ravnos get -1 intercept on this action.
flavor_text:
Belladonna, n. In Italian a beautiful lady; in English a deadly poison. A striking example of the essential identity of the two tongues.
Ambrose Bierce, "The Devil's Dictionary"
name: Zapaderin

card_text:
Only usable after resolution of an unsuccessful action.
[cel] Unlock this vampire at the end of the turn.
[CEL] Unlock this vampire.
name: Zephyr

card_text:
+1 stealth action. Requires a ready Sabbat vampire.
Put this card on this acting vampire and move 1 blood from the blood bank to this vampire. This Sabbat vampire can burn this card any time after this turn ends to unlock. A vampire can have only one Zillah's Tears.
flavor_text:
Caine's Promise is not intended for everyone, but only for his true childer, Zillah's childer, born of her tears.
Blackhorse Tanner, Ventrue antitribu

fr-FR.name: Vallée de Zillah
fr-FR.card_text: Ajoutez 4 points de sang à un vampire de capacité 8 ou plus dans votre région incontrôlée.
fr-FR.flavor_text:
Et chaque nuit, trois nuits durant, Zillah s'abreuva du sang de son Sire, bien qu'elle l'ignorât. La troisième nuit, Caïn annonça qu'il allait épouser Zillah, la plus douce de ses Infantes, et elle accepta.
Le Livre de Nod

es-ES.name: Valle de Zillah, El
es-ES.card_text: Añade 4 de sangre a un vampiro de tu zona incontrolada con capacidad 8 o más.
es-ES.flavor_text:
Y cada noche, durante tres noches, Zillah bebió de su Sire, sin saberlo. Y, a la tercera noche, Caín anunció que se casaría con ella, su chiquilla más dulce, y ella aceptó.
El libro de Nod

card_text: Add 4 blood to a vampire in your uncontrolled region with capacity 8 or more.
flavor_text:
And each night, for three nights, Zillah drank from her Sire, though she did not know it. And, on the third night, Caine announced he would marry Zillah, his sweetest Childe, and she agreed.
The Book of Nod
name: Zillah's Valley
